1b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul na mkha' mdog 'dul ba'i bzod
1b2(mdo sde): shi pa'i snying po'i mdo gnyis bzhugs so//
2a1(mdo sde): sam tsa nga
2a2(mdo sde): d+hi kha ga dzu ti bi na ya ka na ti
2b1(mdo sde): na ma ma ha ya na su ta// brod skad du// 'phags
2b2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par sbed pa'i tshul/ nam mkha' mdog
2b3(mdo sde): gis gdul bi'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa
3a1(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang
3a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phog 'tsha'o// /
3a3(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i des gtsog na/
3b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byed pa can na/ rnyog pa sel ba zhes bya
3b2(mdo sde): bu'i byed pa can gyi grong rdal du/ snang ba 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i/
3b3(mdo sde): ri la/ drang srong rta rlung zhes bye ba dka' thub la gnas paM na/
3b4(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'ad ni brgya phrag pad dang brecu gsam gyi dge
4a1(mdo sde): 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
4a2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul chags pa
4a3(mdo sde): med pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par sprul pa/ tshad med pa'i byams
4a4(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis stobs rjes su thob pa/ tshad med
4b1(mdo sde): pa'i snying rje chen pos sems can gyi chu bo kun tu 'chang bar rnam par sprul pa/ tshad
4b2(mdo sde): med pa'i dga' ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ sems can thams cad la bde ba 'dun
4b3(mdo sde): bu'i chur rab tu 'bab pas kun tu ngoms pa/ tshad med pa'i btang snyoms kyi ye shes
4b4(mdo sde): kyis chos thams cad na mkha' dang mnyam par 'jug pa la mkhas pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa
4b5(mdo sde): dang / lhag mthong dang / rig pa dang / ye shes kyi rlabs kyis/ ma rig pi/
5a1(mdo sde): mun pa'i mun pa chen po rnam par 'jig pa lA mkhas pa/ bsdu bu rnam
5a2(mdo sde): bzhis sems can rnams chu bo bzhi las bsgral bar bya ba'i ye shes dang / sems
5a3(mdo sde): can thams cad la mtshungs par sems pa'i phyir/ byams pa dang / khong khro ba
5a4(mdo sde): med pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi lam yongs su dog pa/ chos kyis yang dag par 'jug
5a5(mdo sde): pa/ ye shes chen po la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten la mchog gi lam yang dag pa
5b1(mdo sde): ston pa/ sems can rnam par rgyas shing / dge ba'i rtsabs yongasu sred pa'i chub skam zhing ye shes kyi las kyi mtha' la rab tu 'jug
5b2(mdo sde): pa mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa zla ba lta bu/ sems can thams cad kyi sems mtshungs par/
5b3(mdo sde): shes pa'i bsam pa mngon par yang dag par 'gu ba'i phyir/ thabs la mkhas pa 'phel ba yang dag par ston pa/ nam mkha' dang
5b4(mdo sde): mtshungs pa'i gzungs kyis tshad med pa'i snod ches rin po ches yongs su bkang zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phyir/
5b5(mdo sde): skye bo thams cad kyis nye bar 'tshe ba/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis rkang pa'i shugs chen pos chos kyi sa la mi zab mo'i rjes
5b6(mdo sde): su zhugs pa/ mtshungs pa'i chos kyis gzhan gyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa/ bskal pa brgya stong grangs med pa'i
6a1(mdo sde): mthar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thug pa med cing / rgyun ma bcad pa'i yon tan thams cad 'byung ba/ rlung
6a2(mdo sde): dang mtshungs pa'i sems 'jig rten po dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ bag chags thams cad rjes
6a3(mdo sde): su 'brel pa/ nyon mongs pa rab tu spangs pa tshad med grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang bzod pa rnam par rtse ba la mkhas pa sha
6a4(mdo sde): stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rta dang glang po che mi dkar ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba
6a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ri rab zla ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par springs pa mi zad pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems
6a6(mdo sde): dpa' ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mig sngon poshes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dur smrig seng
6b1(mdo sde): ge sgra 'byin ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor gyi 'od kyi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab mtshams shes bya ba dang /
6b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan rnam par sprul pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' glog gi phung po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sem
6b3(mdo sde): dpa' yon tan gyi gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab stobs kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub
6b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' gtogs 'dod mthu bo che zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / de la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag
6b5(mdo sde): bcu dang / sngon du 'gro ba drang srong rta thul dang / dang song stong phrag sum cu dang / lha phran brgya stong phrag brgyad kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
6b6(mdo sde): la yongs su bskor nas lhan cig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa legs par 'ongs pa la bka' stsal pa/ legs par
6b7(mdo sde): 'ongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri bshams pa de la bdag 'dug ste/ nyan thos rnams la nyan thos kyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro// bcom
7a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs par 'ongs pa phyir mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/
7a2(mdo sde): pho brang zlum po byas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa rnam par bltas te/ pho brang zlum par bshams pa
7a3(mdo sde): nyid du bzhugs so// de nas dge slong gzhan dag kyang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bus nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de
7a4(mdo sde): logs su thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ces bgyi bi na gang
7a5(mdo sde): lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du brtag par brtags pa ni ji lta bu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
7a6(mdo sde): dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag 'jig rten 'jig rten ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du brtags pa
7a7(mdo sde): brtags pa'i ji tsam zhes dge slong khyed de skad 'dri 'am/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no// de'i phyir dge slong khyed legs par nyon la yid la zung
7b1(mdo sde): shig ngas bshad do// btsun pa de bzhin no zhes gsol to// dge slong de bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces
7b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// dge slong 'jig rten de zhes bya ba ni 'jigs rten rnam pa gnyis te/ snod kyi 'jig rten dang / 'du byed kyi 'jig rten no// dge slong de la snod
7b3(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten no gang / 'du byed kyi 'jig rteni ni gang zhe na/ si'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ji tsam pa ni snod ces
7b4(mdo sde): bya'o// dge slong de la nang gi si'i khams yod de dge slo la nang gi sa'i khams gang zhe na/ gang nang gi sra ba'i sra ba nyid zin pa ni/ 'di lta ste rus pa dang /
7b5(mdo sde): sen mo dang / se'i bar du ste/ 'di dag nang gi sa'i khams shes bya'o// de la phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang zhes/ gang lus kyi phyi rol kyi khams ni/ 'di
7b6(mdo sde): lta ste/ mgron bu dang / baM ser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye du ru dang / rdo dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbrab dang / bram bu dang / gseg
7b7(mdo sde): mi dang / gyo ma dang / shing dang / rtswa dang / sman dang / phyag dar dang / 'di dag ni phyi rol gyis braM khams shes bya'o// dri'i khams gang zhe na/
7b8(mdo sde): rol kyi chu'i khams kyang yod de/ de la nang gi dri'i khams gang zhe na/ lus 'di la chu ngango chu'i khams kyi khris pa dang / bad kan dang / rnag dang / khrag
8a1(mdo sde): dang / khris pa dang / glad pa dang / glang rgyas dang / mchi ma dang / dngul dang / ngar snabs dang / snabs dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang /
8a2(mdo sde): gcin yod pa de dag kun tu len pa 'di ni nang gi chu'i khams shes pa'o// de la pha rol gyi chu'i khams gang zhe na/ gang lus kyi phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ni 'di lta ste/ chu dang chu'i
8a3(mdo sde): khams kyi snum pa dang / 'o ma dang zho dang dar ba dang / bu ram dang / shing gi ro dang / 'chang dang / rtsa ba mo dang / bu ram chang dang / me tog 'chang dang / lus kyi chu'i kham
8a4(mdo sde): ji tsam pa kun tu len pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi chu'i khams so// de la nang gi me'i khams gang zhe na/ lus 'di la gang skye bo'i mdog gi dro ba kun tu len pa des/ lus 'di dro ba
8a5(mdo sde): nyid dang / gdud pa dang / rims dang / yongs su tshig pa dang / des zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / nyal ba de'i yang dag par yongs su smin par 'gyur
8a6(mdo sde): ba 'di ni/ nang gi me'i khams shes bya'o// de la phyi rol gyi me'i khams gang zhe na/ gang mes gdung ba dang / nyi mas gdung ba dang / nor bu'i gdung ba dang / 'bru dang sman
8a7(mdo sde): dang / shing dang / rtsa'i dro ba dang / lci ba'i dro ba dang / phyag dar gyi dro ba dang / 'di dag ni phyi rol gyi me'i khams shes bya'o// de la nang gi rlung gi khams gang zhe na/
8a8(mdo sde): gang lus 'di la gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung dang / thur du rgyu ba'i rlung dang / mazhu bi'i rgyu ba'i rlung dang / yan lag dang nying lag tu rgyu ba'i rlung dang / 'di ni nang gi rlung rnams shes
8b1(mdo sde): bya'o// de phyi rol gyi rlung gang zhe na/ gang phyi rol tu yang dag par rgyu ba'i rlung dang / rnam par rgyu ba'i rlung dang / gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung dang / grang ba dang do ba dang dmu rlung phrad
8b2(mdo sde): pa mang po dang / sa 'dzin pa'i rlung dang / phyi rol kyi rlung gi khams gang yang rung ba 'di ni/ phyi rol gyi rlung gi khams shes bya ste/ de ltar phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba chen po
8b3(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di ni/ snod kyi 'jig rten zhes bya'o// 'di gang gi snod ce na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i sdod do// dge slong phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag la gang
8b4(mdo sde): mos pa'am/ dga' ba 'am/ byams pa'am/ chags pa 'am/ rgya che ba 'am/ ngi'ir bya ba 'am/ bdag gir bya ba de thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes so sor
8b5(mdo sde): bslab par bya'o// gang la la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byang ba'i phyi dang / nang gi 'am/ che ba 'am/ 'phro ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ bzang po 'am//
8b6(mdo sde): gang ring ba 'am/ gang nye ba 'am/ 'byung ba chen po de thams cad de bzhin du so sor bslab par bya'o// gang la la 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag bdag gi ma yin/ bdab
8b7(mdo sde): kyang de'i ma yin/ de yang bdag ma yin no// zhes de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dge slong dag dge slong gang la la
8b8(mdo sde): 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag la de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis shin tu rten par byed do// shin tu yid la byas pa'i dge slong de sred pa dang / rgyud pa dang / lus
9a1(mdo sde): kyi sbyor ba rgyan gcod cing sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed pa ste/ dge slong dag de la 'du byed kyi 'jig rten gang zhe na/ nye bar lon pa'i//
9a2(mdo sde): phung po lnga ni 'du byed ces bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs nye bar len po'i phung po dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes/
9a3(mdo sde): pa nye bar len po'i phung po ste/ dge slo dag 'di ni 'du byed kyi 'jig rten no// dge slong dag sems can ji tsam pa gang sems can gyi bsdu bas yang dag par bsdus pa
9a4(mdo sde): de thams cad phung po 'di dag gis bsdus pa dang ldan pa 'di ni 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhes bya'o// dge slong dag nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de la gang mos pa 'am/ dga'
9a5(mdo sde): ba 'am/ byams pa 'am/ chags pa 'am/ rgya che ba 'am/ nga yir bya ba 'am/ bdag gir bya ba de thams cad spang bar bya'o// zhes so sor bslab par bya'o//
9a6(mdo sde): gang chung zad 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba 'am/ phyi'i 'am/ nang gi 'am/ che ba 'am/ phra ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ gang ring ba
9a7(mdo sde): 'am/ gang nye ba'i gzugs de thams cad bdag gi ma yin/ bdag kyang de'i ma yin/ zhes de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta bzhin du blta bar bya'o// /
9a8(mdo sde): gang la la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / phyi 'am/ nang gi 'am/ che ba 'am/ phra ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ ring ba 'am//
9b1(mdo sde): gang nye ba'i tshor ba dang / gang la la 'du shes dang / gang la la 'ang byed dang / gang chud zad rnam par shes pa de thams cad ni bdag gi ma yin/ bdag kyang de'i ma yin//
9b2(mdo sde): de yang bdag gi mi yin no zhes de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta bar bya ba 'di ni/ dge slong dag snod kyi 'jig rten dang / 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhes bya'o// /
9b3(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba 'khor der 'das par gyur te 'dug pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' phung por rnam par 'jig pa la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa phung po
9b4(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po lnga po 'di 'jig rten du bstan pa na 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'du shes dang /
9b5(mdo sde): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po lnga po de dag ni ji lta bu/ gzugs kyi phung po ni gang 'dod pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag
9b6(mdo sde): par gzhol ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang mig dang gzugs kyi 'gog pa yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ gzugs dang / gzugs
9b7(mdo sde): med pa'i khams kyi mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / snga ba dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi
9b8(mdo sde): mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral bas yang dag par gzhol ba ni gang / ci gzugs kyi phung po 'dod pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /
10a1(mdo sde): bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus yid dang / mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba
10a2(mdo sde): yang dag par gzhol ba dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par rdzogs pa 'am/ 'on te tshor ba dang /
10a3(mdo sde): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'dod pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / gzugs dang / gzugs
10a4(mdo sde): med pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhal ba dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral
10a5(mdo sde): ba yang dag par gzhol ba 'am/ ci 'das pa gzugs kyi phung po 'am/ mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / rna ba dang sna dang /
10a6(mdo sde): lce dang lus dang / yid nas mig gi bar da'am/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / tshor ba dang /
10a7(mdo sde): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ 'on ted 'byung ba gzugs phung po 'am/ mig dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang
10a8(mdo sde): bral ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i mig nas yid kyi bar du yang dag par gzhol ba zhig ge ma/
10b1(mdo sde): 'on te tshor ba nas yid kyi bar du'am/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa gzugs kyi phung po 'am/ mig dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / de rna bas yid kyi bar du yang
10b2(mdo sde): dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig par byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu 'god pa
10b3(mdo sde): chos ltos/ mig gi bu gar gzugs kyi phung po dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba 'phos pa yang ma yin/ mig gi bu gar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
10b4(mdo sde): par shes pa'i phung po dang / 'dod chags dang ba 'phos pa 'am ma yin/ skye mched ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog cing ldang ba'ang ma yin/ phung po ni gang gi lam dang / dbyangs
10b5(mdo sde): dang / sgra dang / brjod pa las yang dag par shin tu 'das pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni skad cig ma ste/ dngos po dang bral ba'o// chos thos
10b6(mdo sde): cad ni dbyangs med pa'o// dbyangs dang bral ba'o// chos cad ni na mkha'i lam ste/ mtshan ma med pa'o// chos thams cad ni yi ge med pa ste/ smon pa med pa'o// chos
10b7(mdo sde): thams cad ni skye ba med pa ste stong pa'o// chos thams cad ni thob pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni thob pa med pa'o// tshig med pa'o// chos thams cad ni rtog pa dang
10b8(mdo sde): bral ba'o// mi khom pa'o// chos thams cad ni chags pa dang bral ba'o// rkyen med pa'o// chos thams cad ni spor ba dang bral ba'o// dmigs pa med pa'o// /
11a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni lta ba dang bral ba'o// mtshad nyid dben pa'o// chos thams cad ni dmigs pa dang bral ba'o// bdag med pa'o//
11a2(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni bdag dang bral ba'o// brjod du med pa'o// chos thams cad ni yi ge dang bral ba'o// rab tu zhi ba'o// chos thams cad ni chos nyid mi thob pa'o//
11a3(mdo sde): mi snang ba thob pa'o// chos thams cad ni snang ba dang bral ba'o// shin tu yul med pa'o// chos thams cad ni yul dang bral ba shin tu rtsa ba med pa'o// chos
11a4(mdo sde): thams cad ni dbang po med pa'o// shin tu rang bzhin med pa'o// chos thams cad ni spyod pa rnam par dag pa'o// gnyen po med pa'o// chos thams cad ni sems med pa'o//
11a5(mdo sde): chags pa dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni shin tu 'phos pa'o// phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni 'jungs pa med pa'o// spros dang bral po//
11a6(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni shin tu bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o// g.yo ba dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni sgrib pa med pa'o// rdul dang bral ba'o// shin tu bral ba'o// /
11a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad na nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'o// stobs chung ba'o// chos thams cad ni rtsom pa dang bral ba'o// dngos po med pa'o// chos thams cad ni dngos po
11a8(mdo sde): dang bral ba'o// byed pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni las ni mi ston pa'o// tsher ba med pa'o// chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang ldan pa'o// thos pa med pa'o//
11b1(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni dbyangs dang bral ba'o// gzung du med pa'o// chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis sdug pa'o// shes pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni tshor ba chags
11b2(mdo sde): pa med pa'o// smig rgyu lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni 'du shes dang bral ba'o// brag cha lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa'o// gzugs brnyan lta bu'o//
11b3(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni rab tu snang ba'i 'od rnam par dag par chu zla lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan dang bral ba'o// gzugs la rten pa'o// chos thams cad ni sprin
11b4(mdo sde): mi dmigs pa'o// na mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan no// bstan du med pa'o// dngos po dang bral bya'o// mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan
11b5(mdo sde): nyid dang bral ba'o// mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid gcig pa dang / mtshan nyid med pi bar du'o// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// chos thams cad ni
11b6(mdo sde): bdag med pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag tu mi dmigs pa'o// ngar sems dpa' med do// rten med pa'o// brjod du med pa'o// chos thams cad ni yi ge med
11b7(mdo sde): pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'du byed thams cad na skad cig ma zad pa dang bral ba'o zhes/ nyon mongs pa dang 'khrug pa med par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa
11b8(mdo sde): med pa/ spros pa med pa bzod pa bsgom par bya'o// 'di la rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa de'i dbang gi bzod pa bsgom pa na/ yang dag par spyod pi tshul na
12a1(mdo sde): mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba thob po// bzod pa 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skad cig ma gcig dang yang dag par
12a2(mdo sde): ldan pa tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las lhag par lus yongs su sprul to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyogs bcu stong pa dang /
12a3(mdo sde): rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang rdul shin tu snyed kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char gtor ba ni 'di lta ste/ zas kyi char 'am/ skem
12a4(mdo sde): gyi char ram/ gos sam/ lhab lhab bam/ dri ma 'am/ me tog gam/ rin po che sna tshegs kyi char yang rab tu 'ong ngo // gang sems can zas dang skem de yongs su zos
12a5(mdo sde): pas zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa'i sems can de/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med pa'i stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang / tshul
12a6(mdo sde): khrims thob bo// khyim kyi bcings pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs te/ byang nas ri'i sul dang / khyim med pa stong pa'i nags chal stug por gnas par
12a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// drang srong gi cha byad kyis rtsa dang rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la mi bzad par mes shing brtson 'grus
12a8(mdo sde): brtsom pa la spro bar byed do// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la nad dang / shu ba dang zug rngu dang / mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang bdag med par
12b1(mdo sde): yid la byed do// mngon par shes pa lnga thob po// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gos nas rin po che yongs su spang ba'i bar du yongs su/
12b2(mdo sde): spong bar byed do// de shes pas zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob pa nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du gzhol bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de lta
12b3(mdo sde): de bzhin du gang yang dag par smod pa'i tshul na mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di dag thob pa de snyed pas me tog na mkha' la gtor pi'i me tog phyogs bcu'i
12b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig ma gcig gis song ba'i me tog re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
12b5(mdo sde): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi sgo brjod pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni dbyangs med pa'o// bdud bzhi'i yul las 'da' ba'o// chos
12b6(mdo sde): thams cad ni na mkha'i la mo// gnas yang dag par spong ba'o// yi ge med pa'o// chos thams cad chags pa yang dag par gzhol ba'o// mi skye ba'o// chos tham
12b7(mdo sde): cad ni nyon mongs pa yang dag par gzhol ba'o// ma 'gag pa'o// chos thams cad sngon gyi dam tshig mi gtong ba'o// mtshan nyid med pa'o// chos thams cad ni
12b8(mdo sde): chags pa yang dag par gtong ba'o// rkyen med pa'o// chos thams cad ni kun tu sbyor ba yang dag par gtong ba'i gnas med pa'o// chos thams cad rtsom pa med pa'o//
13a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni bdag gir bya ba dang / nga'ir bya ba yang dag par gtong ba'o// chos thams cad ni dben pa'o// 'du'adzi
13a2(mdo sde): yang dag par gtong ba'o// bdag med pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag dang bral ba nas brjod du med pa'i bar du'o// rab tu zhi ba'o// rab tu zhi bya'o// mi snang
13a3(mdo sde): ba thob pa'o// mi gnas pa'o// shin tu yul med pa'o// shin tu rang bzhin med pa'o// gnyen po med pa'o// kha zas med pa'o// shin tu 'thor ba'o// /
13a4(mdo sde): 'jungs pa med pa'o// shin tu bsam gtan byed pa'o// shin tu skabs pa med pa'o// shin tu 'ang ba med pa'o// nyam chung ba'o// dngos po med pa'o// byed
13a5(mdo sde): pa med pa'o// tshor ba med pa'o// zag pa med pa'o// 'dzin pa med pa'o// rnam par shes pa med do// smig rgyu lta bu'o// brag cha lta bu'o// mig yor lta bu
13a6(mdo sde): 'o// nu zla lta bu'o// gzugs brnyan lta bu'o// na mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// dngos po med pa'o// mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan
13a7(mdo sde): nyid dang bral dang / mnyam pa'i mtshani nyid dang / mtshan nyid gcig dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i bar du'o// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// ngar sems
13a8(mdo sde): dpa' med pa'o// gzung du med pa'o// brjod du med pa'o// chos thams cad na skad cig ma'o// 'du byed zad pa dang bral ba'o// zhes bzod pa'i sems
13b1(mdo sde): bsgom par bya'o// chos thams cad ni skad cig ma zhes zhi ba'i sems bsgom par bya'o// mnyam pa'i sems dang / rnam par zhi ba'i sems dang / 'dzin pa/
13b2(mdo sde): med pa'i sems dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang / chos pa med pa'i sems dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i sems dang / rten med
13b3(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang / mnyam par gzhag pI sems dang / sdug bsngal gyi sems bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du nye bar zhi ba stong pa phyi dang nang gi 'jig pa brjod pa'i
13b4(mdo sde): chos kyi sgo dang / tshad med grangs med pa'i chos kyi sgo ma tog de dag la 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sems can de yang chos kyi sgo de thos nas zang zad med pa'i dga' ba dang bde
13b5(mdo sde): ba thob pa de/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med pa/ stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang tshul khrims thob pa'o// khyim gyi bcings pa thams
13b6(mdo sde): cad dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang dag par spangs ste/ byang nas ri'i sral dang / khyim med pa stong pa nyi nags tshal lhag por gnas par 'gyur ro// drang srong gi cha
13b7(mdo sde): byed kyi 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / rtsi'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga de dag la mi zad pa re mos shing brtson 'grus brtsom pa la spro bar
13b8(mdo sde): byed do// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rngu dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par yin
14a1(mdo sde): la byed do// mngon par shes pa lnga thob po// tshangs pa dang 'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang
14a2(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba'i bzod pa bsgom pa de ni ming mi dmigs/ sems can mi dmigs/ srog mi dmigs/ gso ba mi dmigs/ gang zag mi dmigs/ gzugs
14a3(mdo sde): mi dmigs/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'ad shes ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa 'dim dmigs/ mig mi dmigs/ rna ba mi dmigs/ sna 'ang ma
14a4(mdo sde): yin/ lce 'ang ma yin/ lus kyang mi dmigs so// yid mi dmigs so// gzugs mi dmigs/ sgra ma dmigs/ dri mi dmigs/ ro mi dmigs/ reg mi
14a5(mdo sde): dmigs/ chos mi dmigs/ yid mi dmigs/ lus mi dmigs/ tshig mi dmigs/ sems mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid mi stsogs pa/ mtshan ma med pa la/
14a6(mdo sde): thugs pa khams su ma gtong ba med pa/ mngon par 'du byed pa ma skyes pa/ ma sgoms pa/ ma byang ba'i bzod pa 'di smras so// ma byas pa/ bya ba med pa de sngon
14a7(mdo sde): gyi mtha' la bya ba med pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' la 'das pa med/ dbus kyi mtha' la yang dag par med pa gi gnas pa mi dmigs/ yid la mi byed pa'i bzod pa sgom
14a8(mdo sde): pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul namakha'i mdog gis 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i bzod pa thob po// byang chub sems dpa'
14b1(mdo sde): bzod pa 'di thob pas ji lta bur gong du bshad pa'i rtsal 'di 'dra ba bya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa 'di bstan pa ston cing brjod pa na/
14b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba legs so zhes bya ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag cing mi smra bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das cad
14b3(mdo sde): mi gsungs pas zhal gyis bzhes par gyur pa dang / de nas dge slong drug cu tsam 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu phung po rnam par 'jig pa ji la bsems te//
14b4(mdo sde): rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgyu ma 'dra ba'i 'du byed thams cad ston/ gal te gzugs bdag med pa/ mi snang ba/ kun nas bldang ba med pa/ yid la mi byed pa/ mi rtag pa/
14b5(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog pa/ dmigs pa med pa 'am/ rgyu ba med pa 'am/ 'on te 'di lta ji sems can nam srog gam/ skye ba 'am/ gso ba 'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes
14b6(mdo sde): pa 'am/ shed can nam byed pa po 'am/ tshor ba po 'am/ tshor ba gzhan nam/ skye ba 'am/ yang dag par skye ba 'am/ gang mi dga' ba dang / mi 'byung ba med
14b7(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang tu byung / snying rje chen po ni gang na chos bshad pa su zhig/ chos kun shes pa ni gang zhig/ bslabs
14b8(mdo sde): pa sdom pa ni gang na gnas/ gal te phung por mi 'gyur na/ de ltar khams dang skye mched rnams kyang dge ba rnams chos kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par mi 'gyur na//
15a1(mdo sde): legs par mi 'gyur na/ legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu ni gang du smin/ de bzhin gshegs pa
15a2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang du 'byung / nyan thos dang / rang rgyal rnams dang / lha dang mi rnams dang / gang gzhan yang sems
15a3(mdo sde): can gyi lus skye mched drug gis gzung ba ni gang du byang / bdag ni bstan pa las langs te 'gro bar snyam mo// de nas dge slong drag cu tsam stan las langs te
15a4(mdo sde): dong nas/ dge slong gzhan dag kyang cang mi smra bar gyur pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa bcom ldan 'das la ngo tsha zhing mi spobs
15a5(mdo sde): pa dang gnod par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag la na mar me 'khor de nyid du 'dus par 'gyur ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa
15a6(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smras so// don gyi dbang gang mthong ba na/ 'khor smra ba dang bcas pa la chos tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo yang dag par ston/ rigs kyi bu
15a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gzhan la gang zag lnga rnams la chos kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / dad pa med pa la dad pa'i gtam dang / gtam ngan pa
15a8(mdo sde): 'jungs pa la gting ba'i gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang // tshul khrims ngan pa la tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / gtan ngan pa dang /
15b1(mdo sde): le lo la brtson 'grus kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / 'tshal ba'i shes rab la shes rab kyi gtam dang / gtam pa ngan pa'o// zhes 'di
15b2(mdo sde): ltar gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gzhan la bstan pa mtshams med par byed pa nam zla stong pa'i gtam mi smra bar bya'o// log pa
15b3(mdo sde): lta ba'i lus rnams lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o// brkam pa rnams la tsher ba nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o// nga rgyal dang
15b4(mdo sde): dregs pa dang / kha zas la chags pa rnams la/ sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o// ngo tsha ba'i chos kyi rtsa spong ba rnams la/
15b5(mdo sde): chos dran pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o// mi thob par 'dod pa rnams la lhar skye ba'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o// 'dod pa spyod pa'i lhar skye
15b6(mdo sde): ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin skye ba'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o// gzugs la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba gzung ba rnams la/
15b7(mdo sde): 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha dang dpal mi sba bar bya'o// gzugs med pa'i khams su skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la/ gzugs la spyod pa'i skye
15b8(mdo sde): ba'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o// gzugs la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba rnams la/ 'dod pa sbed pa'i lha'i bde ba mi smra bar bya'o// nyan thos kyi theg
15'a1(mdo sde): pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mi smra bar bya'o// rang sangs
15'a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg par yang dag par zhugs pa la/ nyan thos kyi yon tan dag mi smra bar bya'o// theg pa chen po la yang dag pa zhugs pa rnams la/ sangs
15'a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yon tan mi smra bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la/ bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi mi
15'a4(mdo sde): smra bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la/ tha dad pa'i yang dag par shes pa bzhi mi spa
15'a5(mdo sde): bir bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor smra ba med pa la rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo zhi ba stong pa nyid kyi gtam mi smra bar bya'o// nyan thos dang rang
15'a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas theg pa pa'i 'khor rnams pa 'di lta bu'i smra ba dang bcas pa'i mdun du/ yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul na mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod
15'a7(mdo sde): pa zab mo 'di mi smra bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po de thams cad dang ldan pas/ mgrin gcig tu legs so//
15'b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar me la/ legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis spro ba yang
15'b2(mdo sde): dag par bskyed do// legs so legs so shes rab che// rnam par shes pas mchog chod pa// mtshan nyid thabs dang chos
15'b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi// dus ni khyod kyis rab tu shes// 'khor rnams shes pa ca 'dra ba// de 'dra ba'i tshul du ston par byed// nya
15'b4(mdo sde): thos rang rgyal theg pa la// chos 'di la rnam par mi byed do// na mkha'i mtshungs shing mnyam pa yi// byang chub sems dpa'i
15'b5(mdo sde): mdun dag tu// chos 'di rab tu bstan pas na// tshul 'di kun tu shes par 'gyuraro// na mkha'i ji ltar mtho med la//
15'b6(mdo sde): dma' ba med cing gzugs med pa// shes rab pha rol phyir spyod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid med// bskal pa
15'b7(mdo sde): grangs med dwagis// 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i spyan snga ni// smra ba med pa'i 'khor rnams la// khyod kyis chos 'di thos pa dang // ji ltar rgyal ba
16a1(mdo sde): s+ya/ bstan pa'i/ grags pa chen po'i bzod pa 'di/ brtson 'grus brtan pa'i sems can la/ 'jigs pa med pa'i 'di rab bstan/ byang chub sems
16a2(mdo sde): dpa' rab dag cing / yon tan rgya mtshos mtha' med pa/ skal ba ldan pa'i mdun du ni/ chos 'di yang ni rab tu bstan/ nyan thos theg pa mngon brtson dang / rang rgyal dag gi mngon dag
16a3(mdo sde): la/ chos 'di rab tu bstan pas na/ de nyid 'tshang rgyar mi 'gyur ro// mi shes pas ni spong ba dang / mos pa med par skyes pas na/ bsod nams mang po 'byung med kyi/ ngan 'gror yang ni
16a4(mdo sde): myur du 'gro// ting 'dzin bzod pa'i gzungs kyis ni// gal te de lus 'byung byas te// byang chub lam la brtson bya phyir// la la thabs dang de bral ba// 'khor dang gang zag rnam
16a5(mdo sde): kyis kyang sems kyis rtog par mi byed do// 'chal pa'i shes rab snod min la// stong pa'i zhi ba smra bar byed// de yang myur du spongs pas ni/ mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs pa dag/ gzhan
16a6(mdo sde): dag gi ni gnas bcu la// myur du yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur// dmyal ba yi dgas byol song de// lha ma yin dang lus srul po// gnod sbyin srin po gtum po yang // yang dang yang ni 'dir skye'o//
16a7(mdo sde): mir gyur dga' byed thob pa dge// gal te ji ltar thob na yang / sman pa'i gdol pa rnams dang ni// 'on pa lang bzhar ba dang // rtag tu nad dang nyam chung ba// skur pa 'debs shing
16a8(mdo sde): 'tshed pa med// zas dang skom dang bral ba ste// mkhas pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur// pha dang ma la bkur sti med// nyes par byas pa rtag tu spyod// sems can rnams la snying rje med//
16b1(mdo sde): ngan 'gor yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dir ni rab tu song ba'i// dge slong drag cu tsam 'di dag/ yid kyis rtog zhe sdang ba// ngan 'gror yang ni myur du 'gro/ lus dbang byas pa'i sems cad 'di//
16b2(mdo sde): gang gis bzod pa 'di bstan cing // thams cad don gyi rjes shes pa// des ni dge slong de song ngo // ye shes thabs dang ldan pa dang // pha rol sems la lta ba'i// 'jig rten la sgron 'dzin pa//
16b3(mdo sde): sems can kun la phan par smra// thams cad don gyi rjes shes pa// thog mar yang ni 'khor ltos la// ji 'dra 'gyur ba'i 'khor rnams la// de 'dra bar ni chos kyang shod// de nas byang chub sems
16b4(mdo sde): dpa' lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ji lta bur nyan thos kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri bshams te/ nyan thos 'dul ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis
16b5(mdo sde): yongs su shes so// rigs kyi bu yang 'dis sngon ma thos pa yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul namakha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa'i bstan par na// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur bdag
16b6(mdo sde): la thugs rtse ba'i slad du// yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa'i yon tan gyis dmigs pa/ sbyor ba rgya chen pos bshad par bdag kyang / bcom
16b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab cing / bdag dang sems can gzhan la yang thugs brtse ba'i slad du rjes su bzung bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar mes/ byang
16b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu gang gi dus la bab par shes// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar me stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa/
16'a1(mdo sde): / gcig tu byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon bstod do// thub pa tshangs pa rab tu dga' mdzad pa// ye shes nyams pa'i 'gro
16'a2(mdo sde): la smon pa 'dzin// grol dang rig pa khyod ni dang bar mdzad// rdul dang bral ba'i chos kyi sgo 'di ston// rgyal ba nyid ma 'gro la mar me mdzad// sems can du ma la ni snang mdzad pa// lam
16'a3(mdo sde): rnams rab stor la ni khyod ston pa// mchog gi chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pa mdzad/ nam mkha'i rang bzhin yongasu dag pa'i thugs// thugs dam mi g.yo ci ltar ri brtan bzhin// thub pa 'jig
16'a4(mdo sde): rten zla ba 'od 'dra ba// tshul mdog bzod pa 'di dge ba yang ston// snying rje gnas shing 'gro lnga mdzad pa// khyod kyi chog shes pa ni mchog tu che// rga 'chi nad gsum rab tu zhi mdzad pa// bzod
16'a5(mdo sde): pa mchog gi yon tan 'di yang ston/ thub pa seng ge mu stegs 'jig par mdzad// 'gro ba dga' mdzad ka la bing ka'i skad// mu stegs can ni 'khor mangs rnam 'jig pa// mar me'i bzod
16'a6(mdo sde): pa 'di yang ston par mdzod// sa dang mnyam pa bzod pa mchog gi thugs/ bde ba sdug bsngal reg la khri mi mdzad// mthon po ma yin da lha mtho min pa// yongs min gzug te bzod pa 'di
16'a7(mdo sde): yang gsungs// ye shes mchog gis nga'i nga rgyal gyi// rlung langs lta bu'i nyon mongs dgra yang gtong // des ni bzod pa'i dam pa 'di thob pa// lam gyi me'i sa sred pa'i chu yang
16'a8(mdo sde): skams khyod kyis lta ba lcug ma sred chu tshig/ klung lta bur ni chos kyi char gtor ba// des ni 'khor 'di dga' bar gyur pa ste// yongasu smin la gzigs shing bzod pa'i gsungs//
16'b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams la rnam grol yon tan skyed// bzod pa'i mchog gi yon tan 'di ston cing // gang gi bsam pa dri ma med bzod 'gyur// de 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di mtha' yas// spyod yul nam mkha'i
16'b2(mdo sde): mdog gis 'dul ba yin/ thub pas 'das pa 'di gsungs dang // da ltar gyi yang bzod pa 'di gsungs pa/ thugs rjer dgongs khyod bzod pa 'di yang gsungs// bcom ldan 'das
16'b3(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen lag la cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yA
16'b4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gang na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan par nga yang dgongs so// snyam lha phran gyis gsol pa/ spos
16'b5(mdo sde): kyi ngad ldan pa'i ri la/ sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzod pa 'di bstan nas/ ji lta bu spos kyi ngad ldan pa'i ri la sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/
16'b6(mdo sde): yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di bshad par 'gyur ro zhes/ bzod pa 'di bstan nas/ bdag nyid ye shes bstan pa la 'jog go// de nas
16'b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das skar ma da'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin des/ bcom ldan 'das drang srong gyi rdul zhugs dang / spyod lam dang / mtshan
16'b8(mdo sde): ma dang dbyibs kyang snang ste/ drang srong de yang rgan po dang / rgas pa dang / 'khogs pa dang / skra ril po ral pa 'chang ba dang / ag tsom ring po dang / dbyug pa dang / ril ba dang / gtsang
17a1(mdo sde): @ma 'dzin me'i sbyin sregs chen po 'bar ba byed do// de las kyang 'od kyi phung po kha dog sna tshogs dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / kha dog brgya stong
17a2(mdo sde): du ma dang / kha dog brgya po shin tu yongasu dag pa dri ma med pa'i 'od 'byung ngo // de'i 'od snang bas phyogs bcu'i stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa'i
17a3(mdo sde): skar ma dang / rin po che dang / glog dang 'od dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin gyi 'od kyang mi mngon mi snang ngo // sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dgas
17a4(mdo sde): kyi lta ba yang mi mngon mi snang ngo // de'i drang srong thub pam gtogs par sems can rnams kyi sgra dang / brjod pa dang / dbyangs dang / tshig dang yi ge dang / chung ngu na sa dang / chu
17a5(mdo sde): dang me dang rlung gi sgra yang mi grag go// de'i tshe na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa na/ sems can gang la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thad
17a6(mdo sde): drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang / lus dang mtshan ma dang / dbyibs kun tu snang ngo // yang theg pa rnon po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang rang rgyal
17a7(mdo sde): ba'i drang srong gyi kun tu mi snang ngo // yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong des/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas mi mthong zhing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
17a8(mdo sde): kyi theg pa pa yang mi mthong ngo // de'i tshe na gang nyan thos 'khor der 'dug pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong zhing / de byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par mi mthong ngo / gang
17b1(mdo sde): 'dir 'dug pa 'dus par gyur pa gzhan du na cung zad gzugs snang ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // snang ba brgya chen pos ni 'jig rten thams cad khyab par yang dag par rjes
17b2(mdo sde): mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des kun shes ko'u di n+ya la smras pa/ gnas brtan ko'u da na bcom ldan 'das gang na/ ko'u di n+yas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na zhes
17b3(mdo sde): bya ba ni mi shes so// mi mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des/ 'od srung chen po la smras pa/ sbyangs pa smra ba'i nang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das
17b4(mdo sde): da ltar gang na pa soms shig/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na zhes bya ba mi shes so// mi mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
17b5(mdo sde): dA ti'i bu smras pa/ gnas brtan sha ra da ti'i bu shes rab dang ldan pa'i nang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba soms shig/ sha ri'i
17b6(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' med pas/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na zhes bya ba mi shes so// mi mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des/ me'u 'gal
17b7(mdo sde): ya na la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal ya na/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i nang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba soms shig/
17b8(mdo sde): me'u 'gal ya nas smras pa/ gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ de nyid na bdag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
18a1(mdo sde): kyis rjesu shes kyang / bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs pa gang du bzhud ces bya ba ni mi mthong ngo // mi shes so// de nas nyan thos chen po des/
18a2(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la smras pa/ lha'i mig gi nang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud gang na gnas/ spyod
18a3(mdo sde): pa ni ci 'dra/ ci 'drar spyod/ khyod kyi lha'i mig gis ltos/ ma 'gags pas smras pa/ kho bos 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis/ mtha' yas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
18a4(mdo sde): zhing rnam par bltas na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs/ gang du bzhud ces bya ba bdag kyang mi shes so// mi mthong ngo // des smras pa/ yang tha dad yang dag par
18a5(mdo sde): shes pa thob pa'i nyan thos kyi ye shes gang la yang mi 'jug go/ bzod pa 'thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes de la 'jug go// bdag gis bcom ldan 'das da ltar
18a6(mdo sde): gang du bzhud/ gang na bzhugs shes byang chub sems dpa' la 'dri snyam pa dang / de nas nyan thos chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang yang dag par rjesu mi
18a7(mdo sde): mthong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di la rigs kyi bu gzhan gyis phung po bshad par byas pa de na/ dge slong drug cu tsam po spyan las langs te dong
18a8(mdo sde): bas/ tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das thugs mi 'gyes nas/ btang snyoms shing 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas rigs kyi bu dang thabs gcig spyod do// bdag
18b1(mdo sde): cag ni rang rang gi spyil por zhugs shing bsam gtan bya snyam ste/ de nas nyan thos chen po de rang rang gi sgril por zhugs nas bsam gtan byed do// de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na phyogs
18b2(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can de bdag drang srong gi cha byad du mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag
18b3(mdo sde): cag drang srong du gyur pa na/ gang drang srong las shing tu khyad par 'phags pa de bdag cag gi mkhan por bzung ngo zhes/ bdag cag rnam par blta bar bya'o zhes snyam pa de thams cad rnyog pa sel ba
18b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba byed pa can gyi grong rdal na/ drang srong chen po shag kya thub pa/ rgas pa 'khogs pa 'dug pa rnams me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sman dang / zas dang / skom pa rnam pa sna tshog kyi me la
18b5(mdo sde): gtor pa dag ring ba dag mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ drang srong chen po 'di nus pa chen po 'di'i mthus snang ba chen po 'byung ngo // drang srong 'di gang na ba de log su nye bar 'gro zhing / drang
18b6(mdo sde): srong chen po brtul zhugs dang spyod pa'i rjesu bslab par bya'o// snyam mo de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du nye bar dang //
18b7(mdo sde): de na byang chub sems dpa' drang srong ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs dbang du byas pa de/ sems rtse gcig pa'i stobs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i kyi phyir brtson
18b8(mdo sde): ba de nyid kyi tshe/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin
19a1(mdo sde): @pa la la theg pa chen po yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad drang srong shag kya thub pa'i thad du nye bar dong ngo // 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de/ bcom ldan 'das ji
19a2(mdo sde): lta bur spos kyi ngad ldan pa'i ri la bzhud nas de na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di ston pa'i phyir/ chos can gyi 'khor lo gnyis la yang 'jug pa'i bco
19a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis thugs kyis shes so// bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir lam brgyan pa spang bar bya zhing / lam des dang srong gi mchog spos kyi ngad ldan pa'i ri la nye bar 'gro bar bya'o snyam ste/
19a4(mdo sde): de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / snyen dga' bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / nor mdog dang / 'jog po dang / yid yod la stsogs pa klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag drag cu tsam lhan cig tu drang srong gi cha byad kyis/
19a5(mdo sde): lha rdzas kyi rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bye dur+ya dang / shel dang / byi ru dang / a sman gar ba dang / mu sa la gal ba la stsogs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la'i 'phreng ba gser gyi shing
19a6(mdo sde): la dngul gyi lo ma me tog dang 'bras bu dngul gyi shing la/ gser gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu nas mu ra sa gal ba'i shing gi bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras
19a7(mdo sde): bu'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan kyis lam de brgyan par sprul to// shing ta la'i 'phreng ba de la lha rdzas kyi gos stong phrag bye ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo // lha de dag kyang drang srong gi cha/
19a8(mdo sde): byad kyis bka' thub kyi gnas nas/ spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri'i bar du lam gyi zheng dpag tshad bcu pa sbyangs so// lam gyi mu gnyis su lha rdzas kyi gser nas mu sa gal ba'i du rin po che sna bdun
19b1(mdo sde): gyi stegs bur sprul to// gser gyi shing rta la la dngul gyi snying po 'thung nas/ mu sar gal ba'i bar du smra bar bya'o// 'og logasu byed dur bzang po nas/ gong log su gnas su shel gyi bar rgya chen
19b2(mdo sde): pos smra bar bya'o// sprin gyi lha'i bu drang srong gyi cha byad kyis lam gyi mu gnyis su rdzing rnyog pa rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas can gyi rdzing de dag la gser gyi bye ma brdal ba/ rdzing de dag la yang
19b3(mdo sde): lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pun da ri ka dang / tsam ba ka dang / a sho ka dang / muts+tsha kun dang / man dzu sha ka' dang / pa ti li dang ba ri shi ka 'gan d+ha na pa
19b4(mdo sde): ri dang / sum dang / a ma mra dang / 'dzam bu dang / mr-in la dang / mchog tu dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogasu mngon par sprul to// sa bla gnam gyi gnod sbyin drang srong gi cha byad kyis lam sbyong bar byedado//
19b5(mdo sde): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i yul yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ lam gyi mu gnyis la/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan mchog 'dzin to// rgyal mtshan gyi mchog de dag la/
19b6(mdo sde): lha rdzas kyi gos dang / da sha dang rgyan rab tu 'phyang ngo // 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi khang bu rtsegs ma mngon par sprul to// khang bu
19b7(mdo sde): rtseg ma de dag phyogs bzhi kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyis so// khang bu rtseg ma de la yang lha rdzas kyi du sha sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo //
19b8(mdo sde): me tog sna tshogs kyis kun tu gtor to// khang bu rtseg ma de lha rdzas kyi rol mo rgya chen po yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis rol mo bkrol ba dang / klu'i sgra
20a1(mdo sde): @bsgrags pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad sgras khyab par 'gyur to// klu'i bu mo brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad mdzes pas/
20a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ drang srong gi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi char bab po// dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad
20a3(mdo sde): kyis 'di lta ste/ ngalha rdzas kyi me tog man da ra ba dang / man dar ba chen po dang / tsam pa ka dang / pa ri ya tra dang / mdzo sha dang / mdzo sha po dang / ro tsa dang / ro tsa ka chen po dang / bal la dang / bal
20a4(mdo sde): la chen po dang / cag kra dang / tsag chen po 'od dri ma med pa/ 'dab ma brgya pa/ mdab ma brgya stong pa/ kun nas 'od/ kun nas dri/ kun nas rnam par rgyu ba'i dri/ rtag tu me tog 'od snang ba/ kha dog
20a5(mdo sde): mtha' med pa/ bltar 'os pa/ mig gis mngon par dga' ba/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lam mdzes par byas so//
20a6(mdo sde): char pa'i sprin gyi lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa'i char rab tu phab bo// klu glang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis
20a7(mdo sde): yang dag par gnas shing 'di lta ste/ mu tig sngon po'i char dang / 'go shir sha snying po'i char la stogs te char sna tshogs rab tu phab po/ gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
20a8(mdo sde): gyi khams 'dir sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lha 'am/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ klu 'am klu'i dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
20b1(mdo sde): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / grul bum gyi dbang po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i bar du de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis
20b2(mdo sde): me tog sna tshogs dang / 'phreng ba sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / rol mo dgrol ba sna tshogs dang / brdung ba dang / klu sna tshogs yongs su bzung nas/ bcom ldan
20b3(mdo sde): 'das spyan mi 'dzus pa'i zhal la rnam par blta ba'i phyir 'khod do// gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lha'i bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ nam mkha' lding
20b4(mdo sde): gi bu mo 'am/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo 'am/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo de dag thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi pha rol mo brdung ba dang /
20b5(mdo sde): dkrol ba dang / klu yongs su bzung ste/ dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog gi gos gi chad khyad kyis rab tu phab bo// mi 'am ci'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong
20b6(mdo sde): gi cha byad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa sna tshogs kyi las kyi phyir brtson no// tshangs pa'i dbang po sngon byang chub snyems bskyed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya skyong du ma yang gi cha byad kyis
20b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la stod cing spyan sngar 'khod do// brgya byin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis phyag 'tshal bar byed do// mi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yA
20b8(mdo sde): stod cing phyag 'tshal lo// dri zo'i dbang po brgya stong dum yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rab tu gsal ba'i sems kyis zhal la rnam par blta'o// klu'i dbang po brgya stong dum yang drang
21a1(mdo sde): srong gi cha byad kyis/ dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi bye ma'i char chen po rab tu 'babs so// lha ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis phyogs
21a2(mdo sde): bzhir rlung mchog tu 'jam pas kun ta reg pa/ mchog tu dri zhim pa mchog tu 'jam pa gtong ngo // gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi gdugs
21a3(mdo sde): 'dzin to// gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong dum yang drang srong rgan por gyur nas/ gser gyi dbyug pa'i gdugs 'dzin cing bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas lo gsu 'khod do// bcom
21a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du blta'o// gral bum brgya stong du ma yang drang srong rgan po'i cha byad kyis gser gi dbyug pa'i thugs 'chang zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yon log su
21a5(mdo sde): 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du blta'o// nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis nam mkha' lding gi dkyil du gser gi 'phreng ba 'byang
21a6(mdo sde): bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi chu bo'i char chen po mngon par rab tu 'bebaso// klu'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad
21a7(mdo sde): kyis mu tig dmar po'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebaso// dri za'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mu tig dkar po'i char mngon par rab tu 'babaso// gnod
21a8(mdo sde): sbyin gyi bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis tsan dan phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu 'bab so// lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis brgyan
21b1(mdo sde): gyi char mngon par rab tu 'bab so// nam mkha' lding gi bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gi char mngon par rab tu 'bebaso// lho 'phye chen/
21b2(mdo sde): bo'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis nam mkha'i dkyil brgyan par byed do// sa'i gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dbyangs gtong bar byed do// bar
21b3(mdo sde): snang gi gnod sbyin brgya stong du yang / drang srong gi cha byad kyis nam mkha' la phyin to// bdud brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lha lhung ldegs kyi sgra 'byin pa 'jug go// drang srong
21b4(mdo sde): lha brgya stong phrag brgya cu rtsa bzhi rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i rtul zhugs yang dag par spyod pa dang / drang srong stong phrag brgya cu rtsa bzhi rang bzhin/ gyis brtan pa ni brtul zhugs yang
21b5(mdo sde): dag par spyod pa dag lha rdzas kyi me tog man da ra ba chen po blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir rlog pa sel ba nas/ spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri'i bar du mtshams sbyor ba rab
21b6(mdo sde): tu 'byin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bzhud pa'i zhabs kyis me tog gi snying po kun tu gnod par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba brgya stong kyi cha byad kyi sa me tog gi chu bo'i char
21b7(mdo sde): mngon par rab tu 'beb so// dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dam yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rol mo dkrol bas drang srong thub pa'i sku la 'od gzer bye ba brgya stong 'byungango // de nas
21b8(mdo sde): lha yon tan can zhes bya ba spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la gnas pa/ lha phran brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig drang srong kyi cha byad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
22a1(mdo sde): @thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'grin gcig tu tshig su bcad pa 'di dag mngon par stod to// sems can mi srung grol byed
22a2(mdo sde): rkang gnyis mchog/ mi mnyes rgyal ba gzugs ngan 'dren mdzad cing // sdug bsngal gzir la bde ba'i mchog/ rgyal rga rkang gnyis dam pa 'dir gshegs gsol/ sred pa rab
22a3(mdo sde): spangs rnam thar gsum ston cing / 'gro la dus gsum nang na ye shes kyis// bslab pa gsum ston dri ma gsum spangs pa// khams gsum las 'das thub pa 'dir gshegs
22a4(mdo sde): gsol/ 'gro la phyin ci log gzhi rnam par grol/ 'khor gzhi dag gis shabs la bsnyen bkur cing // 'gro la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rab ston// zla ba bas kyang lhag pa 'dir
22a5(mdo sde): gshegs gsol// thub pa phung po lnga 'di rab ston pa// 'dod pa lnga la skye bo rnam grol zhing // 'phags pa'i shes rab yan lag lnga ston pa// 'gro ba lnga'i brtson ra rnam par dkrol/ dbang
22a6(mdo sde): po drug 'dus gnas pa skyon med cing // srid lus drug las shin tu rnam par grol shes// sum cu rtsa drug dran ston sems can mchog/ spos kyi ngad ldang ri 'dir gshegasu gsol// rgyal ba mnyam
22a7(mdo sde): gzhag rab ta dul ba'i thugs// shin tu bsgoms pas byang chub dam pa mchog/ ye shes sems can bye ba rab dal mdzad// kha lo rab sgyur spos ngad ri 'dir spon// rgyal ba ye shes sems
22a8(mdo sde): can rab ston pa// ye shes kyis ni 'jig rten snang mdzad nas// khyod ni mun pas sgribs la ye shes ston// thub pa dgon pa'i gnas 'dir gshegasu gsol/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sangs
22b1(mdo sde): rgyas 'byung ba dag/ 'di la sngon gyur la la thar 'dod cing // mi'i dbang po byang chub 'dir thob pa// mi'i 'dren mkhan khyod ni 'dir gshegasu gsol// sbyin dang 'dul ba gtong zhing dus
22b2(mdo sde): pa'i thugs// sems can nang na gtso bo stobs bcu'i mchog// sems can dbul lam gnyen pa 'phags pa khyod// spos kyi ngad ldang ri 'dir gshegasu gsol// dga' ba khyod kyis
22b3(mdo sde): sgo drug dkar mdzad cing // bar dga' rgyal ba bdud phyir shing la zhugs// dpa' bo tshul gcig tu na lam ston pa// thub pa 'dir gshegs bzod pa rab tu ston// ba ra na se 'khor lo
22b4(mdo sde): dam pa bskor// shes rab dam pa dag gis mchod cing gsungs// 'jig rten thams cad 'di la khur bor ba// spos kyi ngad ldang ri 'dir bzod pa gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha
22b5(mdo sde): dums bdun du bdar cing / byang chub sems dpa' dmas bskor nas/ ba dan las bzhengs pa dang // de nyid kyi tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lan drug tu g.yos so//
22b6(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang gang yang sems can
22b7(mdo sde): gzhan thams cad gang nam mkha' la rgyu ba 'am/ gang sa la rgyu ba 'am/ gang chu la rgyu ba de thams cad dran pa rgya chen po so sor thob bo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
22b8(mdo sde): lag mthil du skye ba snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par mthong ngo // mig gis gzugs la ni chung zad snang bar mi 'gyur ro// gang yang sems can dka' thub ngan pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa de yang /
23a1(mdo sde): ngo mtshar chen po thob po// 'di lta ste mi'i rtul zhugs can dang / zla ba'i rtul zhugs can dang / nyi ma'i rtal zhugs can dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi rtul zhugs can dang /
23a2(mdo sde): de la stsogs pa'i sems can gang la la lta ba nyam nga ba sna tshogs thob pa/ log pa lta ba can de thams cad dka' thub ngan pa spangs nas// phyogs dang phyogs mtsham su bltas so// ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen
23a3(mdo sde): kyis na/ rnam pa de lta bu'i sa g.yo ba 'di dang / snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po'i spyan snga na/ gang me'i phung po chen po 'dug pa de
23a4(mdo sde): yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam du mngon par sprul te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ma dag pa tshad med grangs med pa rnamasu gtor to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gang sangs rgyas
23a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar mer snang ba de me tog man da ra ba chen por kun tu gnas par 'dug par gyur to// 'khor ci tsam pa 'dug pa dang /
23a6(mdo sde): gang sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan sngar 'khod do// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs
23a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing du chu bo gang ga gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das te/ de na rgyal mtshan dang / ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dpas
23a8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong la chos kyang ston to// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dpal zhes
23b1(mdo sde): bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bza' shing ra ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de/ drang srong gi gzugs dang / lus dang / dbyibs kyis bdag mthong ngo // gzhan yang theg pa chen po la
23b2(mdo sde): yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu thams cad drang srong gi gzugs dang lus dang dbyibs kyis mthong ngo // mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal
23b3(mdo sde): la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis na/ gang me tog mer snang ba/ bye dUr+ya'i dbyig pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur/ theg pa chen 'di dag la yang dag
23b4(mdo sde): par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad 'dzin par grub/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyis/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag
23b5(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham/
23b6(mdo sde): na 'dug cing rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten du 'jug pa na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'khor bzhi dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston par byed do// de bzhin
23b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa de da ltar yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan pas 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
23b8(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs nas/ de'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul to// gsol pa/ bzod pa 'di thog ma 'am/ tha ma ji lta bu zhig/ bka' stsal pa/ bzod pa 'di ni mu stegs can thams cad la 'jug pa'o//
24a1(mdo sde): @de ltar mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can chu bo bzhis khyer ba rnams la sgrol bar byed pa'o// chu bo bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i chu bo dang / lta ba'i
24a2(mdo sde): chu bo dang / srid pa'i chu bo dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo 'di dag las sems can sgrol bar byed do// dad pa mi phyed pa bzhi yang dag par len tu 'jug pa// 'jug par byed pa/ so sor 'god par byed
24a3(mdo sde): pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa/ sems can rnams yang dag par len tu 'jug pa/ 'jug par byed pa/ so sor 'god par byed pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi la
24a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams sbyor bar byed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi phung pos sems can rnams 'dod pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// ting nge 'dzin kyi phung pos sems can rnams lta ba'i chu bo las
24a5(mdo sde): sgrol bar byed pa'o// shes rab kyi phung pos sems can rnams ma rig pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i phung pos sems can rnams srid pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed
24a6(mdo sde): pa'o// sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pas/ sems can rnams theg pa chen pos sgrol bar byed pa'o// chos la dad pa mi phyed pas/ sems can rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed
24a7(mdo sde): 'o// dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pas/ sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed pa'o// 'phags pa yid du 'ong ba'i tshul khrims kyis/ lta bar song ba thams cad spong ba la ston
24a8(mdo sde): bar byed pa'o// sbyin pas sems can rnams che ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o// ngag snyan pas lta ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o// don byed pas sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i
24b1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o// sbyin pas sems can rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu sgrol bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la
24b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal tu gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir/ bdag cag nye bar mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gyi rgyal mtshan
24b3(mdo sde): gyi dpal des/ yang rigs kyi bu gang gi dus la bab par shes na zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de nas rigs kyi bu ye shes dpal dang / bza' shing ra ba dpal de gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'
24b4(mdo sde): bye ba phrag drug cu lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal de la drang srong gi cha byad kyis rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ g.yas phyogs nas
24b5(mdo sde): bskor ba byas te 'khod do// skad cig ma gcig tsam gyis mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das drang srong shakya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag
24b6(mdo sde): 'tshal te 'khod par gyur to// de la stsogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa rnams drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / rnam
24b7(mdo sde): par ma dag pas tshad med grangs med pa 'dir skad cig ma gcig gis lhag so// de bzhin du g.yas phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang 'ga'i bye ma snyed las
24b8(mdo sde): shin tu 'das te/ de na ri rab kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi/
25a1(mdo sde): zhing de na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' glog gi mchog ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis
25a2(mdo sde): drang srong gi cha byad dang / lus dang gzugs dang dbyibs kyis bdag mthong ngo // sngon ma byung ba'i thub pa chen po gzhan yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
25a3(mdo sde): ri ra ba chen po de la yongasu zhus pa/ de bzhin du ji lta bur gong du bshad pa nas/ de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di las shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ de na 'dus pa zhes
25a4(mdo sde): bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod par mthong
25a5(mdo sde): ba dang / ku mu ta'i glang po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa dang / byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang 'ga' gsum gyi bye ma snyed
25a6(mdo sde): shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ don rgyan gcig ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de na
25a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang / tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong bshad pa nas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
25a8(mdo sde): 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang 'ga' gcig gi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ de na me tog chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi
25b1(mdo sde): khams der/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang / byang chub
25b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas/ yang steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang 'ga' bdun gyi bye ma snyed
25b3(mdo sde): nas shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ de na 'od snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i snying
25b4(mdo sde): bo zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings dang bdud rtsi dbyangs shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' gnyis kyang ji snyed gong
25b5(mdo sde): du bshad pa de bzhin no// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' drang srong gi cha byad 'dzin pas/ mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa 'di kun tu rgyas nas/ de bzhin gsheg
25b6(mdo sde): drang srong chen po shakya thub pa gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do// mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang
25b7(mdo sde): dag par bzhugs pa ni/ drang srong gi cha byad mis ma gyur pa'o// rgyan de dag la nyan thos sam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
25b8(mdo sde): bas kyang mi mthong na/ sems can gzhan gyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po gdan de la bzhengs te/ thub pa dbang po'i
26a1(mdo sde): @'gros dang / tshangs pa dbang po'i 'gros dang / tshangs pa drang srong gi 'gros dang gnya shing tu lta ba'i 'gros dang / nye bar zhi ba'i 'gros dang rab tu zhi ba'i 'gros dang /
26a2(mdo sde): dge slong rnams mos pa chen po'i 'gros dang / lha dga' ba'i 'gros dang / gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i 'gros dang / lha ma yin dga' bar byed pa'i 'gros dang / klu dul ba'i 'gros dang / rgyal ba
26a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'gros dang / rnam par grol ba'i 'gros dang / ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'gro su bzhud cing / sangs rgyas chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'gros dang / rgyan chen po'i 'gros dang /
26a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs chen po'i 'gro su bcom ldan 'das spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la me tog gi ze ba la zhabs 'deg pa dang / 'dor bas bzhud nas spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la byon to//
26a5(mdo sde): bka' thub kyi gnas gtsang ma/ dri tha dad pa med cing dri ma med pa'i phyogasu 'gre sil gyi lha mo chen mo 'od 'dren pa zhes bya ba gang na ba de/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ glang po'i rnam par
26a6(mdo sde): lta ba'i tshul gyis/ rnam par bltas par gyur pa de'i dus na yang 'di brjod do// la la gang 'dir brtan dang ldan pa la/ byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems bskyed pa/ bdag gis yang dag spong
26a7(mdo sde): pa bstan pa'i phyir// de dag thams cad bdag gi mdun du 'ong // byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs spangs med gang // da dung du yang 'khor ba'i bde 'dod cing // chos la bdag med rab tu mi shes pa/
26a8(mdo sde): bdag de dag thams cad 'ong na ston// kun tu sbyor ba spangs med gang dag kyang // sgyu ma'i phung ltar shin tu sngon mthong zhing // thabs mkhas par yang ni mi shes pa// de dag tham cad 'ong na bdag ston to//
26b1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus ldan pa bsod nams mdzod mangs po// thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams 'dul zhing // shes rab pha rol phyin mchog rtag spyod pa// bzod nyan thos phyir de dag thams cad 'ong /
26b2(mdo sde): gang gis sangs rgyas du ma sngon bsnyen bkur// 'dus byas thams cad 'di la rten pa med// chu zla lta bur rab tu sum ston pa// rang bzhin rnam par 'jug pa 'dir yang 'ong // gang rnams thabs
26b3(mdo sde): dang yang dag spyod phyir zhugs// thams cad dngos la sems parten med cing // mtshan ma spangs la rtog par 'gyur med pa// dran par byed pa dag ni 'dir yang 'ong // bdag gis bzod pa mchog
26b4(mdo sde): 'dir rab bstan nas// ji ltar sdug bsngal kun la mi gnas pa// chos kyi 'khor lo la yang khyod myur 'jug/ srid mtsho las kyang sems can rab thar byed// phyogs bcur thub pa'i dbang
26b5(mdo sde): po gang dag kyang // 'gro ba rnams la phan phyir 'khor lo bskor// da dung theg pa'i dam tshig gang 'dod pa// bdag gi gan du byang chub sems dpa' mthong // lan gnyi su yang 'khor lo bdag
26b6(mdo sde): skor te/ phyir mi ldog la sems can bye bkod pa// rnam par grol ba'i blo mtshan rab thogs shing // bdag bdag zhing rnamasu yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'ongs pa gang
26b7(mdo sde): dag kyang // byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir bzod pa bstan// nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa chen mthong ste// de bas mu stegs gzhan kun 'dir 'dul lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbyang
26b8(mdo sde): kyi dkyil 'khor de yang // de ltar bcom ldan 'das yi ge dang don dang / tshig brjod pa'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med par song ngo // den
27a1(mdo sde): sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad nyan cing // de phyogs bcur yang lta bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gis blta ba'i sems can de// sems
27a2(mdo sde): can gang gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de ltar yid du 'ong ba de ltar mngon par dga' ba/ de ltar zab cing sems kyi dbugs 'byin pa/ de ltar tshim pa/ de ltar 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro ba/ don dang
27a3(mdo sde): tshig dang yi ge brjod pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du smra bar bya ba ji lta bur der de phyogs bzhi kun tu bltas te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la drang sreng thab pa dbang po
27a4(mdo sde): zhi zhing thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi ba'i mchog thob pa/ gser gyi phung po ji ltar mthar ba la drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos mngon sum du phyag 'tshal te/ ha cang yang mi ring bar mthong ngo //
27a5(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ drang srong gi 'khor chen po 'di ni snying rje chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba zhig snyam ste/ gal te snying rje dang ldan par 'gyur ba de'i rjesu 'gro'o// drang srong
27a6(mdo sde): gi cha byad dang lus dang dbyibs kyis bdag gi lus su gyur pa de dag mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang drang srong du gyur na/ drang srong chen po de la 'di bsnyen bkar
27a7(mdo sde): ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o// de dag kyang sems bskyed ma thag pas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa las drang srong gi cha byad tshad med grangs
27a8(mdo sde): med/ bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med cing dag tu med pa/ chu bo 'ga' 'ga'i bye ma snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas zhing 'dir mngon par lhag so// byang chub sems
27b1(mdo sde): dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs kyis/ drang srong thub pa la mchod pa byas nas/ drang srong thub pa gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bston de 'khod do// la la smon lam/
27b2(mdo sde): gyi dbang dang / la la ngan tu spyod pa'i rkyen kyis gang yang ngan song du skyes pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus drang ba so sor thob nas/ drang srong gi cha byad kyis kun tu 'khod do// drang srong chen po
27b3(mdo sde): thub pa'i dbang po gang na pa de log su yang thal mo sbyar te 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di snyam du sems te/
27b4(mdo sde): shag kya thub pa bzhugs shing / ji lta bur 'khor yang dag par 'ongs pa la yang dag par spod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di gang na ston par 'gyur/ de nas
27b5(mdo sde): de nyid kyi tshe na/ shar phyogs kyi nam mkha'i lam las khang partsegs pa lha na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste dper na/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i
27b6(mdo sde): khang pa rtsegs pa lta bu/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu lhag so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po khang partsegs pa de mthong nas/
27b7(mdo sde): de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi khad+ma rtsegs pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba 'di 'dra bar sprul te/ drang srong thub pa gang
27b8(mdo sde): na bzhugs pa der bdag bzod pa 'di bstan snyam pa dang / de nyid kyi tshe na lho phyogs na nam mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs
28a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa'i mi mjed kyi bdag po'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ dbyangs zhi ga lta ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags pa mthong ngo //
28a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa rtsigs pa de 'dra
28a3(mdo sde): ba mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das de na bzhugs shing chos ston to// snyam pa dang / de nas de nyid kyi tshe na nub phyogs nas nam mkha'i lam las 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa glog gi
28a4(mdo sde): 'od ces bya ba'i khang brtsegs pa lda na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs
28a5(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis khang pa rtsegs pa 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa ri rab 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'di nyid kyi tshe/ byang phyogs
28a6(mdo sde): nas nam mkha'i lam las khang brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis khang pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa chen po rin po che ri rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa
28a7(mdo sde): brtsegs pa dor bar ldan pa/ khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so// de nas yang de'i tshe na khang brtsegs pa khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nam mkha' la 'khod do// de nas byang chub
28a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ khang partsegs pa de dag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir seng ge'i khri la rnam par ltas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir seng
28b1(mdo sde): go'i khri bshams pa'i khang brtsegs pa gang zhig snyam ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs/
28b2(mdo sde): kyi bu khang brtsegs pa 'di dag gang du lhags/ su'i byin gyis rlangs/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bas na/
28b3(mdo sde): chos kyi sgo chags pa thams cad rgyun chad pa'i phyir da dung mi sgrub kyi// de gnyis kyis 'khor ba 'khyil ba sgrub bo// rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o// 'di gnyis ni 'byung
28b4(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jig pa zhes bya ste/ gang mi skye mi 'byung de 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i 'du shes kyang med do// de la 'jig pa thams cad spangs nas mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob bo// 'khor ba'i/
28b5(mdo sde): rgyun bcad pa 'di ni gnyi su med pa'i chos kyi sgo'o// gang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bya ba 'di gnyis ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o// rigs kyi bu gang bdag tu 'gro 'dogs pa med pa dang / gas
28b6(mdo sde): srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las/ skyes pa dang / shed can dang / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i 'du shes su 'jug pa med pa 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o//
28b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gang skyes pa 'am/ ma skyes par rtogs pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang 'byung ba dang 'gog pa rnam par mi rtog cing / 'gro ba dang 'ong bar dmigs pa dang tha dad par bya ba med
28b8(mdo sde): pa dang / 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par byang 'di ni rigs kyi bu gnyi su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / phung po skye ba dang / 'jig
29a1(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang phung po yongasu shes shing skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa/ rlom sems thams cad bcom la gzugs
29a2(mdo sde): kyi 'gog par bcom pa lam 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// 'gul ba dang rlom zhing sems par rig pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang tshor ba'i 'gul ba med cing rlom
29a3(mdo sde): sems med pa/ g.yo ba med pa yid la byed pa 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang tshor bar shes pa dang / tshor ba kun 'byang bar shes pa dang /
29a4(mdo sde): tshor bar 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam du shes pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang yang tshor ba kun 'byung ba 'gog par 'gro ba mi shes pa dang / gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor
29a5(mdo sde): ba'i phung po'i mtshan nyid tha dad par mi shes pa dang / mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang / mtshan nyid gcig pa dang / mtshan nyid
29a6(mdo sde): mang por mi shes pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu gang phung po dang / khams dang skyed mched la nyan thos dang / rang byang chub
29a7(mdo sde): tu 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
29a8(mdo sde): theg pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rten par mi shes pa dang / yi ge'i tshig gi lam thams cad ni gnas med pa/ yi ge med pa/ spyod
29b1(mdo sde): pa med par rab tu shes pa 'di yang / rigs kyi bu gnyi su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang dge ba dang mi dge bar 'du shes kun tu shes pa dang / pha rol dang tshu rol tu shes
29b2(mdo sde): ba 'di ni gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang dge ba dang mi dge ba 'di yang mtshan ma med pa/ kun nas ldang ba ldang ba dang mi bzad pa kun tu rtogs pa 'di yang / rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i
29b3(mdo sde): chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang yang tshu rol na zag pa'o// pha rol ni phyin ci log de gang tshu rol dang pha rol la rtog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / dgrol ba 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang yang
29b4(mdo sde): tshu rol dang / pha rol la 'dzin pa med pa dang / dkrol ba med pa dang / ci la yang brtags pa med pa dang / btang ba med pa 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan
29b5(mdo sde): yang gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa 'am zhes rtog pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang yang khams dang skye mched la zag pa dang bcas pa zhes
29b6(mdo sde): rtog pa med pa dang / zag pa med pa'i 'du shes su bya ba 'am/ med pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du shes med min thob pa yang med pa yang med pa 'di yang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug
29b7(mdo sde): pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang phung po dang / khams dang skye mched la 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas su rtog pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o gang yang 'du byed skye mched thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam
