221a3(mdo sde): 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba dag gi kun tu sbyor bas ngan song gi lam dag las sgrol bar byed do// de dag sngon byas pa'i dad pa'i dbang po la goms pas dga' bar
221a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba nas/ shes rab kyi dbang po'i bar la goms pas dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar dang / smon lam dang / 'khor ba'i skyon dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bsgoms pa goms
221a5(mdo sde): ba la dga' bar 'gyur ba yin no// thos pa tsam gyis de dag gi tshe 'phel bar 'gyur ro// nad med pa 'phel ba dang / longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa 'phel ba dang / dge ba'i
221a6(mdo sde): bya ba 'phel ba dang / dge ba'i rdza ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa 'phel ba dang / shes rab 'phel ba dang / byams pa 'phel ba nas/ btang snyoms kyi bar 'phel ba dang /
221a7(mdo sde): legs par byas pa'i las 'phel ba mchog tu 'gyur ro// thos pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang dag rigs sngags kyi rten/
221a8(mdo sde): lung bstan pa chen po 'di bkur stir byas te/ nyon par byed cing / nyin zhag bdun du las gzhan mi byed par sems rtse gcig pas chos 'di dag rnam par sgom par byed pa'i
221b1(mdo sde): sems can de dag ni/ dgeb na 'ims kyilas dang ldan padag dang / legs par spyod pa gsus dang zhu bdag dang / dkon ma tshugs byab pa dang / smon ma sa
221b2(mdo sde): la mngon par dga' bdag dang / chos kyis gnas pa dang / dkon mchog gsum po gdung gsel bar byed pa dag tu 'gyur te/ sems can gang dag der sngon gyi /
221b3(mdo sde): nas mang bar 'gyur ba mtshams med pa nas/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba'i bar dag ni ma gtogs so// de nas shi 'phos nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mdzadu di
221b4(mdo sde): skyes shing skye bar 'gyur ba dag yin te/ gang dag sdig pa'i las rab tu chen po'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa sngon cad yongs su ma spyad pa'i sems can de dag gis rigs
221b5(mdo sde): sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po 'di thos na yang yon tan de lta bu de ga thob par 'gyur ro// thos pa tsam gyi mdo la yang de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa dpag tu med pa ma
221b6(mdo sde): lus par yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag gis kyang der chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mtha' dag bri bar bya'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun
221b7(mdo sde): po dag gi sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bdun yang bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa shakya thub pa'i nyan thos chos kyis gnas pa rnamasA kun dga' ra ba yang bya'o// der
221b8(mdo sde): sbyin bdag kyang rab tu gzhag par bya'o// dus dus su gso sbyong gi sdom pa la yang mngon par brtson par bya'o// chos mnyan par bya'o// der sems can gang dag
222a1(mdo sde): @dkon mchog gsum la dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po lta bu 'thob pa'i gnas de yod to// de dag gis skal pa byedab khrag khrig brgya stong
222a2(mdo sde): mang por ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal drag po rnam pa sna tshogs mong bar 'gyur ba de yang ris 'thun pa 'di nyid la mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mngon par 'grub par 'gyuraro//
222a3(mdo sde): kha cig la ni yun ring du nad 'byung ste/ des de'i sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las 'phangs pa dag kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// kha cig na ni yan lag bcad pas
222a4(mdo sde): yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// kha cig gi ni nor zad pas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// kha cig ni 'khor zhig pas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// kha cig ni longs
222a5(mdo sde): sprod dang / nye bar sprod pa dang 'brel bas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// kha cig gi ni 'khor dang bran dang lus la gnod pa byed pa dang / btson rar bzhag pas
222a6(mdo sde): yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// kha cig gi ni mi snyan pa dang / nyes par smra ba'i tshig thos pas yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ ris 'thun pa la de dag gis mi dge
222a7(mdo sde): ba'i las sngon byas pa rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu rigs sngags kyi gzhi lung ston pa chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba yin no// tad ya thA/
222a8(mdo sde): kha ga ba ri tshwa de/ garbA kA se/ gaN+Te re bi da d+ya// pra b+ha ga k+Sha/ k+Sha ba yo ge/ pra ti hA re/ sha ma ni si ka the/ sa ma mA g+ha dzaSh+Te/ ak+Sha ya ta twe/ k+Sha b+ha ba dze/ ni na da na/ d+he
222b1(mdo sde): She/ sa ma grar+N+Na She/ shai k+Sha d+ha She/ sa t+ya dza ba d+hA She/ sre'i n+ya ba dz+nyA She/ sa la la gu h+ya bya k+She ban ka she/ sa d+ha na kA ne/ sa ba da na na b+he bI ta pra bid te/ u pa ka ma na the/ a na
222b2(mdo sde): rme d+ya bra khe/ pra ti kra me ne/ sa ko b+he she/ sa lo tsa na ba me/ gro d+ha d+ha re kA sha sa She/ a sha kha ge/ na ya ku dze bi d+ya ba ne/ kla na ba ne/ u b+ha ba ne/ sa me ma ka re/ sha ri ya ba ne mo g+ha
222b3(mdo sde): dz+nyA Shau/ ha ri kro na ba na ya na mu khe/ sa rak+Sha ko le/ nA ra ya na dz+nye ShaM/ in dra ba sa ne/ oM a/ ya ba a a ra ba a dza re i/ ba ra ba sa me g+ha du kha ni sti ra ni ni drA he swA hA/
222b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu rigs sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po 'di ni yon tan che ba/ phan yon che ba/ sems can thams cad la phan pa byed pa/ khrus byed pa/ snang bar byed pa/ dran
222b5(mdo sde): bar byed pa/ nye bar zhi bar byed pa yin te/ de la gang dag sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed cing / ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni/
222b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / rkyen kyi rgyal ba thams cad
222b7(mdo sde): dang / dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad ni lha'i dbang po nas mi'i dbang po'i bar gyis bsams pa nas/ dad par
222b8(mdo sde): bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / mchod pa'i 'os su gyur pa yin no// shin tu bsrung bar bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin no// sems can de dag
223a1(mdo sde): ni phyi ma'i dus kyi ni/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rnam par shes pa tha ma la phyogs bcu kun nas mdun na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar
223a2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de la phyag rkyong bar mdzad cing / 'di skad du kye yon tan gyis phyug pa dag tshur sheg/ nged kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
223a3(mdo sde): yongs su dag par gnas par gyis shig/ der nged kyis sa bcu dag la gzhag par bya'o zhes kyang gsungs par mdzad do// de sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dga' ba dang /
223a4(mdo sde): mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pa 'phags pa'i des 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa ma yin pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing / de der yang sa bcu
223a5(mdo sde): dag thob par 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ rigs sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen 'di ni sems
223a6(mdo sde): can rnams kyi las zad par bya ba dang / rnam par dag pa thob par bya ba dang / byang grol gyi bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ de ltar don che ba dang phan yon che ba yin gyis long
223a7(mdo sde): la mi 'byed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song shig/ nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shakya thub pa la yang zhus shing / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
223a8(mdo sde): ba snang ba'i snying po dpal des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lags so// yang de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems
223b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pas kyang tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shakya thug
223b2(mdo sde): pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / snyen bskur bgyi ba dang / 'dus pa chen po de yang blta ba dang / nyi ma'i snying po'i chos gyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig
223b3(mdo sde): par bgyid pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags thos par 'tshal te/ bdag cag kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor
223b4(mdo sde): las langs nas/ ring po ma thos sa snga ma yang kun phyin lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'byed der bdag cag kyang mchi bar gnang
223b5(mdo sde): bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal rtsegs rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag thams cad lhan cig
223b6(mdo sde): 'thun par sred med kyi bu'i mdog dang rtags dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs dang / spyod pa dang / cha byad kyis khyed deng shig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal
223b7(mdo sde): lags so zhes kyang gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad
223b8(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu sred med kyi bu'i mdog dang / rtogs dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam dang / cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan
224a1(mdo sde): @'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po'i zhabs gnyis la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ de nas
224a2(mdo sde): chas te/ ud tsam gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'byed 'dir phyin to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'byed 'dir de dag phyin pa tsam gyi mdo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'byed
224a3(mdo sde): thams cad du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi char pa mngon par rab tu phab bo// de dag gling bzhi pa'i bar ma 'di ga la
224a4(mdo sde): ba dang / yul ma ga da'i zhing ga la ba de logs su dong ste/ dong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das shakya thub pa'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
224a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni da dung yang / rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang thabs cig chos kyis gnas pa'i gtam rab tu mdzad do// yang de'i tshe byang phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi
224a6(mdo sde): zhing gang ga brgyad cu bye ma snyed 'das pa de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing spos thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang
224a7(mdo sde): ldan par gnas pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la
224a8(mdo sde): chos kyang ston to// 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'das par gyur te 'dug go// de nas bya
224b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos steng gi nam mkha' la bltas so// des kyang der nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
224b2(mdo sde): grangs med dpag tu med pa/ byang phyogs kyi phyogs cha nas/ lho phyogs su 'dong ba mthong bar gyur to// des lho phyogs su rnam par bltas te/ snang ba chen po mthong nas/
224b3(mdo sde): des de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab du btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ting nge
224b4(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor las langs nas ring por ma lags te/ bdag gis ni steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs ma mchis/ dpag
224b5(mdo sde): tu ma mchis pa byang phyogs kyi cha nas/ lho phyogs su mchi ba dag mthong lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs su rnam par bltas te/ snang ba chen po mthong
224b6(mdo sde): nas bdag 'di snyam de sems te/ 'di la rgyu ni gang lags snyam lags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des/ byang chub sems dpa'o
224b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho phyogs kyi phyogs chan sangs rgyas kyi zhing
224b8(mdo sde): gang ga'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'byed ces bya ba yod to/ 'di ltar snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs
225a1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la 'dus pa chen po la chos
225a2(mdo sde): kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gi chos kyis gnas pa rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir da ltar theg pa gsum gyi rnam
225a3(mdo sde): par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'byed der bdud kyi yul rnam par gzhig pa dang / dri ma med par mdzad
225a4(mdo sde): pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i phyir dang / chos kyi tshul yun ring du gzhag pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'dus pa chen po byung bar gyur to// der
225a5(mdo sde): yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che tog gi gzugs sngags gsungs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su spyad nas gshegs so// de bzhin
225a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa shakya thub pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po yang dag par sgrub par mdzad de/ so sor yang dag par rig pa
225a7(mdo sde): bzhi dang yang dag par ldan pa/ mig gsum pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan kyang de na da dung sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'byed sa dang nam mkha' gang zhig de bzhin gshegs
225a8(mdo sde): pa'i shakya thub pa mchog ta snyan par gsung ba'i chos bstan pas tshim par ma gyur to// mchog tu snyan pa gsung ba shakya thub pa de yang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /
225b1(mdo sde): nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par byed pa'i gsungs sngags gshad
225b2(mdo sde): par bzhed do// de bzhin gshegs pa de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ phyogs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su
225b3(mdo sde): dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba zhes bya ba nas/ gang dag srid pa tha ma pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jig pa sgrib pa med pa'i
225b4(mdo sde): ye shes la mkhas pa dag 'di'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'byed du 'jug par gyur cig/ 'dir 'khod nas kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs kyi bsam gtan dag gis
225b5(mdo sde): gnas par gyur cig/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa chen po lhag par mthun dang ldan pa dang / bcu dang ldan pa dang / yon tan dang ldan pa dag du gyur cig/ 'dir
225b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan bzhin du thams cad dran pa dang ldan pa dag dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa dag dang / shes rob dang ldan pa
225b7(mdo sde): dag tu gyur cig/ 'di'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang sangs
225b8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing mi mched 'di'i nang du chud par gyur cig/ de'i nang du 'khod nas kyang / rang rang gi dge ba phyogs la stobs ji lta ba dang / ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du
226a1(mdo sde): 'khod nas// bsam gtan byed par gyur cig snyam dgongs so// bsam gtan byed pa de dag kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu dper na/ 'bru
226a2(mdo sde): mar gyi mar me lta bu byung ngo zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig gi lus las 'di 'di lta bu dper na/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i 'od lta bu byung ngo zhes bya ba'i
226a3(mdo sde): bar du sbyar ro// de nas da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'das pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'byed de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de ltar
226a4(mdo sde): gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na snyoms par zhugs par gyur la/ sngon chad der phyin pa na ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
226a5(mdo sde): de dag ni da ltar ting nge 'dzin las las nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'byed der chas so// der phyin nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa
226a6(mdo sde): chen po de yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gzungs sngags de yang thos par 'gyur ro// dkyil mo khrungs su 'dugs nas/ rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs kyi bsam gtan
226a7(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rtse bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod kyang da ltar ting nge 'dzin las langs nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'byed
226a8(mdo sde): der 'gro bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'byed de na yang / sems can dag mchog tu tshe thung ba dag yin/ nad mang bdag yin/ blo chung ba dag yin/
226b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu spyod pa chung ba dag yin/ bsod nams chung ba dag yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bya ba chol ba chung ba dag yin/ 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs par mi lha dag yin/ gongs
226b2(mdo sde): spyod dang nye bar spyod pa chung ba dag yin/ 'dod pa la chums pa dag yin/ mi dge ba spyod pa dag yin/ phrag dog dang ldan pa dag yin/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa spangs pa dag
226b3(mdo sde): yin te/ de dag phal cher mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pas ngan song du 'gro ba dag yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de na gang dag 'dren mar spyod pa'i sems
226b4(mdo sde): can yod pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ de nyid du sdig pa'i byed pa'i gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas/ sdig pa byed pa'i lus sprul po zhes bya ba'i bar dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba'i
226b5(mdo sde): phyir te/ sdig pa byed pa'i gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas lus sprul po zhes bya ba'i bar de dag kyang / der sa'i bcud kyi mdangs phrogs nas yongs su spyod par byed do// 'bru
226b6(mdo sde): dang sman dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang / ro rnams kyi mdangs phrogs nas kyang yongs su spod par byed do// de nas stobs dang ldan pa dag yin no// der
226b7(mdo sde): de dag mngal na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi mdangs dag 'phrog par byed do// mi rnams skyes pa tsam gyis me de dag la myur tu mdangs dag 'phrog par byed do// 'o ma'i
226b8(mdo sde): mdangs dag kyang 'phrog par byed do// bza' ba dang btang ba'i mdangs kyang 'phrog par byed do/ der de dag gis mi'i mngal du zhags pa'i mdangs phrogs shing /
227a1(mdo sde): n+ya/ skyes pa tsam gyi mod la mdangs 'phrogs pas/ de dag kyang mdangs la mi reg cing / bza' ba dang / btung ba nyams su yongs su spyad zin pa la
227a2(mdo sde): yongs su spyod par byed do// rgyu des de ni mi rnams mchog tu na dag dang / tshe thung ba dag dang / dran pa nyams pa dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams
227a3(mdo sde): ba dag dang / bsod nams dang bral ba dag dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba dang dang / longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dang bral ba dag dang / 'dod pa la
227a4(mdo sde): chums pa dag dang / kun spyod pa mi gtsang ba dag yin zhes bya ba nas/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pas/ ngan song du 'gro ba dag yin no zhes bya
227a5(mdo sde): ba'i bar yin no// rigs kyi bu sngon nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i smon lam 'di lta bu gyur te/ 'di ltar dbya ba la brtson pa dang / spro ba dang / brtul ba brtan par
227a6(mdo sde): gyur to// sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa ngas bsnyen bkur byas so// ngas thabs gang gis bud med sbrum ma bsrung bar nus pa yang
227a7(mdo sde): yongs su zhus so// nga'i brtson 'grus gang gis ma bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / mngal na yod pa bde legs su gyur pa yongs su zhus so// lha'am klu 'am gnod sbyin nam/
227a8(mdo sde): srin po 'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ grul bum 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za 'am/ srul po 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ mdangs 'phrogs
227b1(mdo sde): / ba 'am/ brjed byed dam/ rims nyin cig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa 'am/ ro langs gang yang dug gam/ sngags kyi sbyor ba 'am/ sman gyi sgor
227b2(mdo sde): bas/ lus dang sems la gnod par bya bar mi nus pa zhes so// gang gis kyang ma 'am/ mngal na yod pa dang / skyes ma thag pa dang / 'o ma 'thung ba dang / bza' ba dang / btang ba
227b3(mdo sde): yongs su spyod pa la gnod pa bya bar mi nus pa yongs su zhus so// gang gis kyang mdangs 'phrog pa 'am/ lus dkrugs pa 'am/ khams dkrugs pa 'am/ sems/ dkrugs
227b4(mdo sde): par bya bar mi nus pa yongs su zhus so// gang gi phyir sems can de dag tha mal par mngal na gnas pa yongs su zhus so// lus dang sems la rnam par tho btsams par bde
227b5(mdo sde): bar ma'i mngal nas gnod pa med par 'byung ba yongs su zhus so// bde bar 'o ma 'thung ba yongs su zhus so// bde bar bza' ba dang btung ba yongs su spyod pa yongs su zhes so// /
227b6(mdo sde): gnod pa chung ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / blo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pa'i bar dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom
227b7(mdo sde): ba mngon par dga' ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba yin pa dag kyang yongs su zhus so// ngas gsang sngags gang dag dang sman gang dag gis sems can de lta bu dag
227b8(mdo sde): yongs su smin par mdzad par spyod pa'i gsang sngags de dag ni gang yin/ sman de dag ni gang yin zhe na/ gzungs sngags gang gis ngas sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag
228a1(mdo sde): tu med yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi'i gzungs sngags
228a2(mdo sde): lung bstan pa chen po 'di sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang nga la bstan par gyur to// rtag tu brtson 'gras dang brtul ba brtan pa ngas rtag par
228a3(mdo sde): rgyun tu tshe rabs de dang de dag tu mngal na bu yod pa'i bud med la/ rig pa'i sbubs zhi ba/ gzungs sngags kyi gzhi rigs sngags 'dis bsrung ba byas so// bud med de mngal
228a4(mdo sde): na bu yod pa dang bcas te skyabs gsum la rnam par gzhag go// phyin cad lha 'am zhes bya ba nas/ bdud dam brjed byed dam/ mi dang mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ma'i
228a5(mdo sde): mngalan bu yod pa dang bcas te/ rnam par tho tsam pa 'am/ lus dkrug pa 'am/ khams dkrug pa 'am/ sems dkrug par bya bar mi nus so// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
228a6(mdo sde): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang mdangs 'phrog pa 'am/ sman dang / sngags kyi sbyor ba bya bar mi nus so// de dag gis mngal na bu yod pa'i ma rnam par tho btsams pa
228a7(mdo sde): dang / mngal na bu gnas pa yang sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// nying mtshams sbyor ba'i lus kyis dbang po thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gzugs bzang ba lta
228a8(mdo sde): na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa dag dang / shin tu blo dang ldan po dag dang / bde legs su ma'i lto nas byung zhing / brjed ngas pa med pa'i sems
228b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dag du gyur to// de dag skyes pa tsam gyi mod la yang lha stobs dang ldan pa dbang che bar grags pa re re la yang 'khor brgya stong pa dag bsrung ba dang / rjes su sba bar/
228b2(mdo sde): byed par kun tu gnas so// de dag mi dang mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar gang gis kyang rnam par tho btsam pa 'am/ rnam par mtshe ba 'am/ lus bkrug pa 'am/ khams
228b3(mdo sde): dkrug pa 'am/ sems dkrug par bya bar mi nus so// mdangs blang bar bya bar yang mi nus so// gsang sngags dang sman gyis kyang rnam par tho 'tsham par mi nus so// gang
228b4(mdo sde): gis phyir sems can de dag mchog tu gzugs dang ldan pa dang / tshe rabs dran pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par blta ba dang / byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
228b5(mdo sde): snying rje chen po dang ldan pa dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims la rjes su dga' ba dang / bzod pa dang / yon tan dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / dben
228b6(mdo sde): ba la dga' zhing bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' ba dag dang / de thob par byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad
228b7(mdo sde): par 'gro ba 'phags pa'i nges par 'byin pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa dag tu gyur to// sems can nye bar zhi ba la gnas pa nyon mongs pa chung ba de lta bu de dag la lha dang /
228b8(mdo sde): klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis rim 'gro bya bar brtson pa dag yin te/ mi de dag kyang mchog tu 'khor ba la skyon tu lta ba dang / byang grol gyi bde ba 'dod pa dag tu gyur to/
229a1(mdo sde): de dag gis gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de dag ris 'thun pa de nyid kyis myur tu/ byang chub kyi sems
229a2(mdo sde): ma bskyed par byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// ci ste rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems bskyed na/ de dag myur du skye ba dang 'jig pa dang / rjes su
229a3(mdo sde): 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// ji ste sems can dag kyang nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems bskyed par byed na/ sems can de dag ris 'thun par nyid kyis bden pa
229a4(mdo sde): dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par byed do// sems can de dag thams cad kyang ngan song gsum dang bral ba dang / mtho'i ris su 'gro ba dag tu gyur to// rigs
229a5(mdo sde): kyi bu ngas thabs la 'jug pa sbyor ba la brtul ba des/ sems can dag yongs su smin par byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yang dag par
229a6(mdo sde): bsgrubs so// rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba yin no// rigs kyi bu ngas sems can nad pa gang dag mthong ba de dag la
229a7(mdo sde): rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'dis sman si ra ha kI ra la brams nas/ nad pa la byin na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to// gang na sman sing ha krI ri med
229a8(mdo sde): par yang ngas de'i mdun du bza' ba dang btung ba gang yin pa la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs lung bstan pas brams nas/ nad pa la byin na nad pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to//
229b1(mdo sde): gal te de yang med par gyur na ngas sman bkus te bor ba la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs gi ba'i sngags kyi gni dag gis brams nas na dbul byin na/ nang thams cad rab tu zhi bad
229b2(mdo sde): gyur to// rigs kyi bu ngas thabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la btul ba des/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
229b3(mdo sde): kyang yang dag par bsgrubs so// gang na shing ljon pa dag me tog dang 'bras bu mi skye ba der yang ngas yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gsang sngags kyi gzhi chen po dag gis char
229b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshul brams nas/ shing dag la btab na shing de dag lo mang por chu med kyang me tog dang 'bras bu dag dang ldan par gyur to// de bzhin du bu ram gyi shing dang / dgun
229b5(mdo sde): 'brum dag dang / 'bru dang / sman dag gi bar la yang byas so// gang na char mi 'bab cing chu med pa der yang ngas ru sbal gyi snying la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gsang
229b6(mdo sde): sngags kyi gzhi 'dis brams nas/ shing tsam pa ka'i mdab mas dkris te/ klu'i mtsho'i 'gram du bzhag na char chen po dang / chu chen po'i tshogs byung bar gyur to// der chu
229b7(mdo sde): chen po byung bas sems can rnams kyi khyim dang zhing dang kun dga' ra ba'i bar chud za bar gyur na/ der yang ngas sbrul gyi rnal po'i nor bu la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi
229b8(mdo sde): ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'dis brams nas/ klu'i gnas su bzhag na char chu rab tu zhi bar gyur to// gang na dus ma yin par rlung dang nyi ma dang / dus ma yin
230a1(mdo sde): bar sprin dang mun pa dang / rtul gyi char ba dang / grang ba dang / dro ba dang / dus phyin ci log tu 'byung ba'i bar dang / dmag tshogs dang / zla ba dang /
230a2(mdo sde): nyi ma dang / bza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo rnams yang dag par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i bar la ngas snying rjes sems can rnams kyi ched du
230a3(mdo sde): zhag bdun pa gcig gi nyin mtshan du khrus byas nas/ 'o ma dang 'bras can gyi kha zas za zhing tshangs po'i gnas pa bsgom pa la mngon par dga' bas rig pa yod pa'i
230a4(mdo sde): sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa 'di las gzhan mi byed par brjod de/ nyin bdun pa la gal te yul yongs su ma sbyangs na/ der nga'i mdun du rang gi dam bcas pas mi gnas
230a5(mdo sde): ba yin no// der yang ngas rtsi lcam pa sbrul gyi snying dang bcas pa la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'dis brams shing / skyug sman ma da na'i 'bras bu
230a6(mdo sde): dag dang bsres te/ lha rten sar bzhag pas der dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang nyi ma dang / sprin dang / mun pa dang / rdul gyi char pa dag dang / grang ba dang dro ba thams cad zhi
230a7(mdo sde): bar gyur to// yang dag pa'i dus tshigs dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / bza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / zla ba byed pa dang / lo drag yang dag par byung bar gyur to//
230a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu des na gang na sems can dge mtshan dang / bkra shis dang so sor ldan pa dag dang / lta ba phyin ci log du gyur pa'i bar gyi sems can de dag yo ngas rig pa yod
230b1(mdo sde): thub ba 'i 'asung ldan pa chen pa 'ad cas bsan tu/ gang dang ga da sems ca rnams byas pas pa dang du yang na mongs bcu drug tu sbyar to// dbe stan
230b2(mdo sde): bkra shis dang lta ba ngan pa thams cad spangs te/ de'i phyir dge ba'i las dang yang dag par ldan par byams pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / smon lam dag mnga' ba nges pa'i
230b3(mdo sde): phung po dag tu gyur to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du ngas thabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la brtul ba las sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas shing pha rol tu phyin pa
230b4(mdo sde): drag gi bar yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ rig pa yod pa'i sbubs
230b5(mdo sde): zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni/ de ltar sems can rnams la gces smras byed pa yin no// de ltar phan yon che ba yin te/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed
230b6(mdo sde): ba nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bud med sbrum ma thams cad srung bar byed pa/ rab tu thar par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ phung
230b7(mdo sde): dang khams thams cad yongs su shes par byed pa/ chos thams cad rnam par 'byed par byed pa/ thabs thams cad yang dag par ston par byed pa/ byang grol gyi bde
230b8(mdo sde): pa thams cad yongs su rtogs par byed pa/ sems can thams cad rab tu dad par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi bde ba la 'jug par byed pa/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba tham
231a1(mdo sde): r+ya/ cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod par byed pa/ bdud kyi yul thams cad nges par 'dul bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i
231a2(mdo sde): sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni/ bdud rnams tshar gcod par byed cing / nyon mongs pa rnams pham par byed pa yin te/ lha rnams dga' bar byed pa/ gnod sbyin
231a3(mdo sde): rnams yang dag par mgu bar byed pa/ lha ma yin rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ nam mkha' lding rnams dngang bar byed pa/ mi 'am ci rnams dad par byed pa lto 'phye
231a4(mdo sde): chen po rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / mu ge dang / 'chi ba dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char
231a5(mdo sde): pa dang / nad thams cad rnam par zhi bar byed pa/ drang ba dang / dro ba dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / rtsub ba dang / hud hud po dang / reg par dga' ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar
231a6(mdo sde): byed pa/ chos kyi chu la 'bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ston par byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi chad par byed pa/ 'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs
231a7(mdo sde): 'byin par byed pa/ zad pa shes pa skye bar byed pa/ mi skye ba shes pa rang gi mngon gsum du byed pa/ ma rig pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa/ sdug bsngal
231a8(mdo sde): gyi khur 'dor bar byed pa yin no// rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung ston pa chen po 'di yin to// thad ya thA/ ma na k+sha/ ya bAk+ka/ g+ha sa kA/ dza ne kra/ marman krA/ k+ka bAk+ka/
231b1(mdo sde): man d+hak+ka/ na Ta kra/ na DA ra ta/ bi sa na Da/ kha ga na Da/ a Tu na Ta/ ku na Ta/ pa ri kun Ta/ nA Ta na Ta/ pa ri ka na TAH/ u ta ran rba/ bi na Ta/ kun dza na Ta/ tsa dAm b+ha ra na Ta/ kha ga ma/
231b2(mdo sde): ba nA Te/ pu kle ra na Ta/ sing ha ru tra na Ta/ sa mA yA ne+e Ta/ shi ri ku sa kuM ne Ta/ la ta mA ru ta/ kha bi te hu krA ba ti/ ra kA dA ma ri dzu/ bA ha na pu Ti/ san ti ra Na/ dza ba/ e mo ho/ ra ka dza
231b3(mdo sde): la/ a tri Na a tra NA/ ra ba/ sa tri nI k+ka/ marga tI nA kra/ a Sha a bA na to du kha s+ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di snyan pa na/ 'khor des srog chags bye ba phrag
231b4(mdo sde): drug bcu ni rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod par 'gyur to/ bkrigs phrag drug bcu dag kyang skyon med pa la zhugs par 'gyur to// rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba
231b5(mdo sde): lung bstan pa chen po 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa shakya thub pa la ngas khyod kyi lag nas bskur ro// der yang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa'i klu'i yul rnam
231b6(mdo sde): par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags la/ dad pa sbyin par mdzad do// rig pa yod pa'i sbubs
231b7(mdo sde): zhi ba 'di long la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der song shig/ nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shakya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la
231b8(mdo sde): reg par gnas sam zhes kyang zhus shig/ 'di skad du shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung brgyad bcu'i bye ma snyed 'das
232a1(mdo sde): @/ pa de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa sgra thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin
232a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs
232a3(mdo sde): ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas bcom ldan 'das la yongs su zhi ba'i slad du/ bdag mngags pa lags na/ bcu na bcom ldan 'das ci snyan mi mnga' lags sam/ khyod
232a4(mdo sde): kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba dag ma mchis lags sam/ gnod pa dag chung lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/ ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin du chos de
232a5(mdo sde): la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/ chos kyis gnas pa dag gis gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni bdud kyi yul dang / klu'i yul
232a6(mdo sde): bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu la gnas lags sam/ 'di na thogs pa ma mchis par 'khor lo rab tu bskor lags sam/ gang su dag sangs rgyas
232a7(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'dir 'khor lo rab tu bskor lags sam/ gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa de dag gi ched du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog
232a8(mdo sde): gi snying po des nyi ma'i snying po chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi lus 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags la dad par
232b1(mdo sde): rtsol bar mdzad cing de nas reg pa chen po yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po'i mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba 'di skur lags te/ sems can thams cad la phan par bgyid pa/
232b2(mdo sde): nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa zhes bya ba nas/ sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor par bgyid pa zhes bya ba'i bar rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di
232b3(mdo sde): lags so zhes kyang gsol cing / de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar thob cing rmad du byang ba nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
232b4(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad la ma thogs pa'i ye shes dang gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar to// mchog tu ngo mtshar to// de ltar lags pas da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la sngon ma
232b5(mdo sde): thos pa 'di ltar zab pa'i rig pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa'i kho na bstan to// gang la yon tan 'di lta bu grangs med
232b6(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa de dag mchis pa 'di la/ mkhas pa byang chub tshol bar byed pa su zhig mngon par rtson par mi bgyid/ de na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di
232b7(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// sems can gang su dag 'khor bas skrag cing byang grol gyi bde ba mngon par 'tshal ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa dang /
232b8(mdo sde): rig pa mtshan pa'i sbubs zhi ba gzungs sngags kyi mi bsgrubs pa na dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / gus pas sems can rnams kyi rnyed pa chen po dang / dge
233a1(mdo sde): ba'i phyogs rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur lags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
233a2(mdo sde): kyi bu de bzhin no// khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu nga byang chub sems dpar gyur te/ brtson par 'dis spyod pa spyod pa na smon lam 'di lta bu btab
233a3(mdo sde): po/ bdag byang chub thob nas sems can gang su dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni sbyin pa la brtson pa'i bsam pa can zhes bya ba nas/ shes rab la brtson
233a4(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa can zhes bya ba'i bar dag gis bdag gi ming sgrogs par byed cing sems can thams cad kyis sems par byed na/ gal te de dag la lha dang / lha ma yin du
233a5(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ sems can la la pha rol tu phyin pa de dang de dag gi bar chad byed par nus pa zhig yod na sems can de dag gi dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba brgya stong
233a6(mdo sde): du mar gyur cig/ sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu'i rgyu ni ma gtogs so// bdag kyang re shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
233a7(mdo sde): bar ma gyur cig/ gang yang bud med bu la mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba nas/ bu'i khung gyis skyo ba zhes bya ba'i bar dang / gang bud med sbrum ma zhes bya ba'i bar dag phyag
233a8(mdo sde): 'tshal bar byed cing / sems can thams cad kyis dga' ba dang gus pa dang dad pas bdag gi ming yongs su sgrogs par byed la/ gal te ma 'am mngal na yod pa de la/ mi
233b1(mdo sde): 'am mi ma yin pa sdang ba'i sems kyis rnam par tho 'tsham par byed dam sman dang / gsang sngags kyi sbyor bas kyang rung ste/ lus kun tu 'khrugs par byed dam/ sems kun tu
233b2(mdo sde): 'khrug par byed dam zhes bya ba nas/ btsas pa tsam gyi bar la yang tha na yud tsam gcig tsam yang rnam par tho 'tsham par byed na/ bdag re shig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
233b3(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces sngon nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i smon lam de lta bu btab bo// de bzhin du da ltar yang sems can gang
233b4(mdo sde): dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ sdug bsngal de lta bus gzir ba dag kyang zhes bya ba nas ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin/ sems can thams cad kyis dga' ba dang /
233b5(mdo sde): gus pa dang / dad pas bdag gi ming yongs su sgrogs par byed pa thams cad sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur te bzhin du ma yin no// sbyangs pa ma yin
233b6(mdo sde): na sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu'i rgyu ni ma gtogs so// / 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi mi'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo//
233b7(mdo sde): / bam po lnga pa/ des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad ni ngo mtshar lags te/ de na sems can rnams mchog tu sdang ba gzu lums can sgrub pa phrag dog
233b8(mdo sde): dang ldan pa snying brtse ba ma mchis pa bgyis pa mi gzo ba tshig sgrub bor smra ba log par lta ba dag lags pas/ de kha cig gis bdag la rnam par tho btsams na mi rung ste/ bdag mchis
234a1(mdo sde): pas ci yang mi sman lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing / go skabs med de/ sus dmigs pa med
234a2(mdo sde): med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa legs par bsgoms shing / legs par yid la byas par gyur pade la ni/ bdud bye bas kyang rnam par tho ba tsam pa 'am/ bar chad byed par nus pa 'di ni gnas
234a3(mdo sde): med do// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis yun ring po nas/ dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa shin tu bsgoms shing legs par yid la byas zin gyis ma 'jigs shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod la gsang
234a4(mdo sde): sngags gang dag gis sdang ba thams cad dad par 'gyur ba dang / rmongs par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis bzod pa dang dran pa dang / rab tu dang ba thob par byed pa'i gzungs sngags dmigs pa med pa'i
234a5(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyu mthun pa byams pa chen po sbyin par mdzad do// tad+ya thA bo bri ha/ bu bu la/ e la pa ra/ i la sa ha/ ha Ta ga Tu/ ga ga na kA/ sha ma sha ma/ myed tra/ tsakra brti/ ti le/
234a6(mdo sde): sa g+ha ra/ ti le/ dur+b+ha li/ hi hi le/ ha ba he/ na ra dza ne/ ya ba na myid tre/ myid tra rA me/ myid tra kha gA/ sarba to dza mi tre/ ma na brta mi tre/ d+hi tI shwa ra mid te swA hA// rigs kyi bu spang
234a7(mdo sde): bzhi par byed pa dang / rmongs par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs sngags 'dis tsam pa ka'i 'o brum mar la lan bdun bya bas pas lag pa gnyis bskus nas/ sngang
234a8(mdo sde): ba thams cad dad par byed rmongs par byed cing / sdang ba'i sbubs dang / sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / gral bum dang / srul po dang / bdud bye ba brgya stong yang rung ste/
234b1(mdo sde): sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gis ji yang byed par mi nus so// gal te sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad kyis gling bzhi pa gang bar gyur sbyor
234b2(mdo sde): chu gcig gis thams cad de'i mod kho na la med par 'gyur ro// gal te chu rnyog pa can gyis rgya mtsho bzhi yongs su gang bar gyur kyang rung / sbyor chu gcig kho nas rab tu dang
234b3(mdo sde): bar byed de/ 'di la the tsom med kyis long la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du song shig/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag ta med
234b4(mdo sde): pas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen
234b5(mdo sde): bkur bgyi ba dang / 'dus pa chen po blta ba dang / nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gzhan pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las
234b6(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags de yang mnyan par 'tshal lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te der bdag cag kyang mchir gnang ba lta na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzod du
234b7(mdo sde): bdag cag mchi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag thams
234b8(mdo sde): cad so so nas gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / yo byad dang / spyod lam gyis lhan cig 'thun par deng shig/ de nas bya ba
235a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu de dag thams cad gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / yo byad dang / spyod lam
235a2(mdo sde): mngon par sprul/ nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la stsogs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
235a3(mdo sde): 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas nam mkha' la 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang rin po che las byas pa'i pad ma mdab ma stong pa
235a4(mdo sde): bdun dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang mngon par sprul to// spyod lam de lta bus de nas chas te/ de dag thams cad skad cig thar cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
235a5(mdo sde): mi mjed 'dir 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shakya thub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed
235a6(mdo sde): thams cad du kha cig gis ni gser gyis phyi ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab po// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shakya thub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
235a7(mdo sde): la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ kha cig gis ni dngul gyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab po// kha cig gis ni spos kyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cig
235a8(mdo sde): gis ni mu tig gi char mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cig gis ni gser skad dag mngon par rab tu phab po// kha cig gis ni mu tig gi do shal dag mngon par rab tu bdang/
235b1(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni dpung brgyan gyi rgyan dag mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cig gis ni ras dang ras bcos bu dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi char mngon par tu phag ste/
235b2(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// theg pa chen po 'dus pa chen po mdo nyi ma'i
235b3(mdo sde): snying po'i le'u las pa nyi'i ste/ gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos sngon ma mthong ba 'tshangs pa chen po dang brgya byin dang / sred med kyi bu
235b4(mdo sde): dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba grangs med pa dpag tu med pa mthong nas/ mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ stan las langs nas ha cang yang thag mi ring bar 'dug go//
235b5(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi pho nya bzhi po de dag 'khor dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der logs su thal
235b6(mdo sde): mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shags kyi snying pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shakya thub pa ga la ba de
235b7(mdo sde): logs su me tog tsam pa ka'i 'phreng ba dag gtor te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to// rkang gnyis dam pa 'gro ba'i snang ba 'dzin lta ba nyams
235b8(mdo sde): pa 'gro ba'i lam stsol pa/ mnyam nyid ldan pa 'gro la phan mdzad khyod// bdud dang klu rnams myur du 'dul mdzad khyod/ gdul dka' 'gro ba'i nyon mongs thar mdzad khyod/
236a1(mdo sde): chos 'dir snang ba yun ring bar mdzad khyod/ bsam gtan sgo 'di dag gis skyes mchog ldan/ shing mang thams cad shin tu mdzes par mdzad/ rgyal
236a2(mdo sde): ba skyes mchog skye bo mkhas dgu la/ rgyang ri nas ni zhing 'di brjod pa mdzad/ 'gro ba'i chos kyi dus 'di dka' ba ste/ de mthong ba dag 'dir chos chen tshogs su mchis/
236a3(mdo sde): 'gro bar mir skye ba ni rnyed par dka'// shin tu ring nas mir skye rnyed nas kyang / nyon mongs chen pos zin gyur thub khyod ni/ rab myur nyon mongs dra ba gcod mdzad lags/
236a4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal 'tsho dang nyon mongs klang ltung ba// khyod kyis glang chen lta bur 'gro ba sbrul/ rgyal bas phan tshun bdag cag pho nyar mngags// khyod kyi chos kyi gter
236a5(mdo sde): la yi rang mdzad btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bye ma rnyed 'das pa de na/
236a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams ma dros pa zhes bgyi ba mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsam pa
236a7(mdo sde): ka'i mdog ces bgyi ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag 'dir mngags te de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyid ma'i
236a8(mdo sde): stong ba'i chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa
236b1(mdo sde): la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing gnod pa chung ngam/ skyong ba yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ni/
236b2(mdo sde): snyun mi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags
236b3(mdo sde): sam/ ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/ chos kyi gnas pas gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas
236b4(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'di na/ bdud kyi yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig pu lags sam/ 'di na thogs pa ma mchis par 'khor los skor lags sam/
236b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di na gang su 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur pa de dag gi don tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog de/ khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po chos kyis gnas pa
236b6(mdo sde): klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa sbyin par mdzad lags so// de nas dben pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags
236b7(mdo sde): mthu che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags
236b8(mdo sde): thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad zad par bgyid pa 'di yang skur lags so zhes bya ba ji
237a1(mdo sde): ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin te/ rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni bdud rnams tshar gcod pa/ klu rnams pham par bgyid pa/ lha rnams dga' bar bgyid pa/
237a2(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams tshim par bgyid pa/ lha ma yin rnam par 'jom par gyid pa/ rje'u rigs rnams dga' bar bgyid pa/ dmangs rigs rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa/ bud med
237a3(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyid pa/ mang du thos pa rnams skyo bar bgyid pa/ rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ 'thab
237a4(mdo sde): ba dang / thab mo dang / mu ge dang / dus ma lags pa'i nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / rlung dang / char ba dang / chu bo dang / grang ba dang / dro ba thams cad rnam par zhi bar bgyid
237a5(mdo sde): pa/ kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / ro mi bro ba dang / sgrub pa dang / hud hud po dang / reg par dka' ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ chos tshul 'bar bar gyid pa/ chos kyi tshul
237a6(mdo sde): rgyun mi 'chad par bgyid pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bston par bgyid pa/ 'khor bas skrag pa dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa/ zad pa shes pa skyed par bgyid pa/ mi skye bar
237a7(mdo sde): shes pa rtogs par bgyid pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa/ sdug bsngal gyi khung 'dor bar bgyid pa/ srid pa'i klung skems par bgyid pa/ 'di
237a8(mdo sde): mang skur lags te// tad ya\u0f88\u0f90/ Sha ya/ b+ha sa pa re bI re/ bA he/ bcu ba ri da re/ bri zab pa ri be re/ sa bes pa pa rid re/ ti teng ba ri re/ mi sems pa rid de/ 'ge
237b1(mdo sde): kha ga pa ri bA re/ a lo ke/ a lo ka ba ri bA re/ s+tha me/ swa ma pa ri ba re/ ra dzer dza pa ri bA re/ si le si la ba ri bA re/ ga me ga ma pa ri bA re/ a bo ma a bo ma pa ri da re/ ma la ma la la/
237b2(mdo sde): la mAM la ma/ ra lA rA lA/ ra la ma bidi d+ha gnya' nam b+hud tang ga me/ b+hu'u tang ga ma pa ri bA re/ tsak+ku gra ha ba ri bA re/ shrid tra ga he/ shrod tra gra he/ ba re bA re/ gA na gra he/ g+ha na gra te/
237b3(mdo sde): ba ri bA re/ dzi tA gra he dzaM tA gra ha pa ri bA re/ kA ya ga he/ ka ya gra hai/ pa ri bA re/ ma na gra ha pa ri bI re/ swarbA gra he/ swaR+sha gra he ba ri da re/ be dan gra te/ pa ri dA re/ tri shwa gre he/
237b4(mdo sde): shA gra ha pa ri bA re/ u bA nA da gA he/ a ba da na gra ha pa ri bA re/ b+ha ba gra he/ b+ha ba gra he ba ri bA re/ dza ti gri he/ dza ta gra he pa ri bA re/ dza rA ma rA na gra he/ pa ri bA re/ du khaM san tA
237b5(mdo sde): ba gra he/ du kha san tA gra ha ba ri bA re/ A rA bA ra ran+ta dze/ A rA pA ra d+ha dza ga ha pa ri bA re/ a ra pA ra dwi dza gra he/ a ra pa ra dI dza gra ha pa ri bA re/ A ba rta/ ba bi ta s+ya/ a pa ra mu
237b6(mdo sde): pa ma sA s+ya/ bI ha bi ni brta/ ar+ya ra shI sa pA ga shan taM swA hA// / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog des bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod
237b7(mdo sde): ba bskur ba ni 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lhags pas kyang legs so/
237b8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba byin te/ bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa dag ni ma gtogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka'
238a1(mdo sde): stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'dir nga stan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin sems can rnams la don bcas pa tshig 'bru dang / bcas pa lhag chad med pa'i bden pa dang
238a2(mdo sde): rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa rgya cher ston par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog gis/ gang khyod 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe bsrungs pa'i phyir byin pa/
238a3(mdo sde): lus kyi khyad par thams cad sgrub pa zhes bya ba nas/ shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i nyi ma'i spyan pad ma'i spu'i gsang sngags de khyod kyis kyang
238a4(mdo sde): ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// tad ya thA/ sid d+ha ma de/ bi lo ka ma de/ e le ke ti
238a5(mdo sde): ra shi/ ru tse s+phu ru tse b+had d+he bi bud d+he/ ma ha bud de/ un mud te/ un mud ta pra ti She d+ha ne/ rA ga dra ba/ ra ba d+ha ba/ pri ti She d+ha ne/ bin da/ bin du ma te/ tsi ta tsi ta pa ti She d+he ne//
238a6(mdo sde): a rke tsan dre d+he/ ha ha tsi ti/ ha ta ni rmi/ ha ta ga ma be ge/ ha ta po'u na rba ba dza re/ ha ta kra sa ma te/ ha ta bi ma ta mud tre/ ha ta mu g+he/ ha ta ya gI/ ha ta sa mu tra dza be/ ha ta bi ma na ra dze/
238a7(mdo sde): ha ta hi he/ ha ta tsi tsa te/ ha da da dza ra dze/ ha ta brdza ma te/ ha ta u pa ga ma te/ ha ta ro ga ra shrI/ ha ta ro g+ha ra sh+mi/ ha da da dza swe ti/ ha darda dze na mad/ gnya' gzhaganya ba dza/ gnyagaH
238a8(mdo sde): sa rba mA rkang gnya'/ e ngon te sangs du khe swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog des bdag chas pa'i dus kyi che/ bsrung ba'i skad du/
238b1(mdo sde): nyi ma'i spyan pad ma'i gzungs sngags stsal pa ni 'di lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa la bka' stsal pa/ snyan pa khyod kyis nyi ma'i
238b2(mdo sde): snying pos spyan pad ma'i gzungs sngags 'di zung shig/ snyan pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par
238b3(mdo sde): dka'o// de bas kyang nyi ma'i spun pad ma'i gzungs sngags 'di ches rnyed par dka'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis kyang rung / gang gis kyang ri'i rgyal
238b4(mdo sde): po ri rab 'am rgya mtsho chen po'i yon tan dang phan yon brjod par nus so// nyi ma'i spun pad ma'i gzungs sngags 'di'i yon tan dang phan yon ni bskal pa 'am bskal pa lhag
238b5(mdo sde): bar yang rung ste/ brjod par mi nus so// nyi ma'i spyan gzungs sngogs 'di ni de ltar zab pa yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nyi ma'i spyan pad ma'i gzungs sngags 'di zung
238b6(mdo sde): shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ 'khor bzhi pa dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / der sems can rnams 'dod chags thams cad spong bar
238b7(mdo sde): 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/ zag pa thams cad zad pa dang / byang grol gi bde ba dang ldan pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po ches
238b8(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// shing gi rgyal po'i drung du bdud ni gcig pus khyod kyis bcom// byang chub rab mchog dam pa yang ni gcig pus brnyes pa lags/ lha dang
239a1(mdo sde): @/ mi dang gnod sbyin gcig pus khyod kyis dbang du mdzad/ rgyal ba nyi marab grol ye shes mchog gi 'od gzer lags/ 'din mu stegs gzhan ni
239a2(mdo sde): gcig pus 'od dang bral mdzad pa/ 'jig rten kun nas srin bu me khyer dag la gnyis ltar mdzes// thub pa 'dus na sems can bsgrol ba'i don kyang mdzad lags te/ dkon
239a3(mdo sde): mchog gsum gi gdang dang chos tshul yun ring gnas pa mdzad// khyod gcig pu la mchod phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams lhags pa/ dge dang byang chub yongs su btsal
239a4(mdo sde): phyir chos don gnyer ba lags// rgyal ba khyod ni sdug sngal thams cad gcod pa'i chos ston pa/ khyod ni ye shes byang chub spyod pa rab mchog ston par mdzad// gcig pus
239a5(mdo sde): zhi ba'i bdud rtsis sems can rnams kyang zhi mdzad pa/ yang srid ma mchis mdzad slad srog chags khrag khrig sgrol ba khyed// zag pa zad cing lta dang bral ba nyon mongs
239a6(mdo sde): spangs gyur pa/ gang na mya ngan byed med zhi ba'i grong khyer gshegs pa khyod/ 'di ni 'jig rten kun tu khyod gcig sman dang mtshungs te legs/ rgyal ba las kyis khyod la
239a7(mdo sde): zhu ba'i slad du po nyar mngags/ rig pa'i rgya mtsho thugs rje mnyam pas gnas par mdzad pa po/ thub pa zla ba chos dang gnas nas gsungs kyang bskur ba lags/ btsun
239a8(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas dper bgyid na/ grong khyer rgyan dpag tshad tsam mchis pa/ bye mas bltam pa de snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas
239b1(mdo sde): kyi zhing dag 'das nas/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams snyigs ma'i rgyas mtshan zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang gi rgyal po/
239b2(mdo sde): zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag 'dir mngags lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying
239b3(mdo sde): de'i chos gyis gnas pa dang / klu'i yul rnams rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la/
239b4(mdo sde): dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing / gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na/ btsun pa bcom
239b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji snyan mi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/
239b6(mdo sde): ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin du de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/ chos kyi gnas pas gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na
239b7(mdo sde): bdud kyi yul dang / klu'i yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/ 'di na thogs pa ma mchis par chos kyi 'khor lo skor
239b8(mdo sde): lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gang su dag 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don tu de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po/
240a1(mdo sde): chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa sbyin
240a2(mdo sde): pa lags so// de nas stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags 'thu che ba'i yan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad pa bgyid
240a3(mdo sde): ba/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal
240a4(mdo sde): thams cad zad par bgyid pa zhes bgyi ba nas/ ji ltar sngar bshad pa'i par dang / sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pI bar 'di yang skur lags te// tad ya tha/
240a5(mdo sde): d+ha ma te/ d+ha ma te/ a kli d+ha ma te/ pra b+ha sa/ d+ha ma te/ sarba kA sha/ d+ha ma te/ a bAM kha g+h+ra/ bI mI ta kha g+ha/ a be krA kha g+ha/ a mo ha kha g+ha/ a na mya kha g+ha/ bya brid ti kha g+ha/ san
240a6(mdo sde): ru tsa kha g+ha/ a nai ma kha g+ha/ le tsa na kha gA/ shi khi kha g+ha/ bi ti mi ra kha g+ha/ u kro ma kha g+hA/ u ra kha g+ha/ a kri kha gA/ ya pad ma no kha g+ha/ ru 'u ba kha g+hA/ ya bad bi gnya' na
240a7(mdo sde): kha gA/ tsakrA d+ha tA kha grA/ ya pad ma no bi gnya' na d+ha tu kha g+ha/ pri thi bI d+ha du kha g+ha/ ya bde gnya' na d+ha du kha g+ha/ tsa tu sbrid t+yA sman kha g+ha/ yo bad a be ni ka kha g+ha/ du kha kha g+ha/
240a8(mdo sde): ya bad ma rga kha g+hA/ bib pa na bi k+ka ba/ a na na/ su mud tra nan/ sarba kA na na/ sarba sang s+than bi shu'u pa na na/ a kin tsa na na na/ k+ka b+ha k+ka/ i li i i le me le swA hA/ bcom
240b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang gi rgyal pos khyod la/ stong pa nyid dang rjes 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags skur ba ni 'di lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas
240b2(mdo sde): legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lhags pas kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa dag ni ma
240b3(mdo sde): gtogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'dir bstan 'di nyid
240b4(mdo sde): la bzhugs bzhin sems can rnams don dang bcas pa/ tshig 'bru dang bcas pa/ lhag chad med pa'i stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags rgya cher ston par mdzad
240b5(mdo sde): do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal pos kha gang khyod 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe bsrung ba'i phyir byin pa mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa sems can rnams kyi sems
240b6(mdo sde): dang tshor ba sgrub pa yang dag par 'du ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa dang / bdud bzhin gdul ba sgrub pa'i gnas dang / chos kyi tshul dang / dkon mchog gsum
240b7(mdo sde): gyi gdung sgrub pa mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa'i bar de khyod kyis kyang ston cing / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po ches 'di skad ces
240b8(mdo sde): gsol to// tad ya thA/ shar ni bya ya/ sha krA bya ya/ smi ti bya ya/ pra ha na bya ya/ ring d+hi bya ya/ In dri ya bya ya/ ba la bya ya/ bo dang ga bya ya/ sa mA d+hi bya ya/ d+ha ra Ni bya ya/
241a1(mdo sde): k+ka ti bya ya/ d+ha ra ni bya ya/ ma ru'u bya bya ya/ a nin dza bya ya/ marka bya ya/ a b+ha gnya' bya ya/ pra ti sa ma bi dbya ya/ b+hu'u mi bya ya/ mid t+ya bya ya/ ma ha mai tI r+ya
241a2(mdo sde): ya/ bri thi bI bya ya/ srad tA bya ya/ d+harma bya ya/ ta ma bya ya/ a lo ka bya ya/ pri ti b+ha sa bya ya/ pra ti shud ka bya ya/ ga ga na bya ya/ ma ra bya ya/ shu'u na twA bya ya/ pra ti t+ya byA ya/
241a3(mdo sde): a pra Ni hi ta bya ya/ a ni mi tA bya ya/ ru ta bya ya/ g+ha Sh+Ta bya ya/ a ki na tsan bya ya/ ma bi sa ga/ a na na/ a no na/ a ba ha/ tsa tsa ra/ tsa tsa nA ra bi mu/ tsa tsi tsak+ka/ tsa rba ra byi mu byA
241a4(mdo sde): ya/ bi mu kra yi bi mu/ A ba bya ya/ bi mu/ a sa mu d+ha tsa ra bi mu/ tshwa da bi mu/ a kA sha bi mu/ byA pa sha ma bi mu/ a na b+ha sa bi mu/ a pA ra ba mu/ u pa sha ma sa li la bi mu sA hA/
241a5(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po des bdag chas pa'i dus kyi tshe/ bdag srung ba'i slad du mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi gzungs sngags stsal pa pa ni 'di
241a6(mdo sde): lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shakya thub pas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di na la bka' stsal to// ko'u di n+ya khyod kyis mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi gzungs sngags 'di zud
241a7(mdo sde): shig/ ko'u di na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o// de nas kyang mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa 'di ches rnyed par dka'o//
241a8(mdo sde): ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis kyang rung / bskal pa brgya stong gis sems can thams cad kyis sems kyi skad cig bgrang bar nus so// gang dag mi
241a9(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs
241b1(mdo sde): zad pa'i sbubs kyi gzungs sngags 'dir mun pa med par 'dug pas zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dres pa bcwo brgyad po de dag ni gad kyis kyang bgrang bar mi nus so//
241b2(mdo sde): ko'u di na de ltar bas na mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa'i chos nyid ji ltar thob pa 'khor bzhi po de dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / de dag
241b3(mdo sde): chos de thos pas las thams cad zad pa thob par 'gyur ba nas spobs pa thogs pa med pa dag dang / spobs pa gcad du med pa dag dang / spobs pa rgyun mi gcad
241b4(mdo sde): ba'i bar dag thob par 'gyur zhing / khams gsum las khyad par du 'phyags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag tu'ang 'gyur ro// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
241b5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying pos dpal de bzhin gshegs pa shakya thub pa ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
241b6(mdo sde): gsol to// 'gro drag sdug bsngal gyis khrid cing / nyon mongs nad kyis kun tu g.yengs// khyod ni mkhas pa mgon gyur khyod// rgal nas 'gro ba sgrol mdzad khyod/
241b7(mdo sde): dbang po drag la rmongs gyur cing / bdud kyi zhags pas nyer zin la/ yang dag lam ni ston pa khyod// 'jig rten na ni rab rnyed dka'// yan lag drag ldan khyim
241b8(mdo sde): kyi gzhi// mkhas pa'i me yis spangs pa lags/ khyod ni 'jig rten kun gyi gnyen/ chos kyi mu ge 'jig mdzad pa/ mngon shes drag ldan sgom chen lags//
242a1(mdo sde): / bden pa gsum pa drang srong che/ sems can 'khor bar zhugs pa rnams/ 'ching ba dam las grol mdzad khyod/ khyod kyi sngags la dad nas su/
242a2(mdo sde): zhing 'dir yang ni lhags pa lags/ 'dir ni 'jig rten mgon po yis// bdag cag pho nyar mngags kyis gson// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nub phyogs na
242a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams snying po'i rgyal mtshan zhes
242a4(mdo sde): bgyi ba mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//
242a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyi gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par
242a6(mdo sde): mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa las dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing // gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang
242a7(mdo sde): ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang 'dri bar mdzad lags sam// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci snyun mi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags
242a8(mdo sde): sam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba mchis sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'chal ba lags sam/ ji ltar chos rjes su thos pa bzhin du yang / chos
242b1(mdo sde): de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags skam/ chos kyi gnas pas gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang klu'i yul bcom
242b2(mdo sde): lags sam/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig pu lags sam/ 'di na thogs pa ma mchis par 'khor lo skor lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gang su dag 'khor lo skor bar
242b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de dag gi non tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer
242b4(mdo sde): gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa sbyin par mdzad lags so// de nas smon pa med pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba
242b5(mdo sde): phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad yang dag par zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dog chags thams
242b6(mdo sde): cad yang dag par zad par bgyid pa/ nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad yang dag par zad par bgyid pa 'di yang skur lags
242b7(mdo sde): so zhes bgyi ba nas/ ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa/ sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor par bgyid pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar du/ ji lta
242b8(mdo sde): sngar bshad pa bzhin no// tad ya thA/ shan sha ra/ sha ma na shar/ a ba k+ku ba sha/ tsa k+ka b+ha ba sha pa/ shro tra sha ba/ g+hA na sha ba/ dza bi ha sha ba/ kA ya sha gA ma na sha ba/ k+ka ta
243a1(mdo sde): bid d+h+yaHkru/ br-i thi bi kra b+hU/ dza~M ba hA bA yuk+ka ba/ man so dzak+ka b+hA/ a lo ka gnya' nakrA b+ha/ bI dza sang kra mak+ka b+ha/ yang kur kha g+ha kra d+hA/ sha ma kA ru ka d+ha/
243a2(mdo sde): kA ya/ ra sak+ka b+ha/ shan ta byaM sraklA b+ha/ na ton ten ton/ a ba nair tron/ na ya ba na yin ton/ me sha san te/ du kha s+ya swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
243a3(mdo sde): pa ye shes dpal rtsegs rgyal po des smon pa med pa rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags bskur pa ni 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo //
243a4(mdo sde): bsam gtan dang ldan pa rnams ma gtogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi nang du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba
243a5(mdo sde): byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu bstan pa 'di
243a6(mdo sde): nyid la bzhugs gzhin sems can rnams la don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po lhag chad med pa/ smon pa med pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags 'di rgya cher
243a7(mdo sde): ston par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal rtsegs/ rgyal pos gang khyod la 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe/ byin pa rigs sngags kyi rten gyi lung bstan
243a8(mdo sde): pa de khyod kyis kyang ston cing / lung bstan pa des ni 'dir sems can rnams kyi sred pa chu ngu dang / 'bring dang chen po nyon mongs pa sred pa'i rgyu rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/
243b1(mdo sde): de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i nyon mongs pa srid pa'i rgyu rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// bskal gang ga'i klung gi bye mas rnyed kyang bsnyil bar 'gyur ro// las 'byung
243b2(mdo sde): ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin te bstan par bgyi ba lags so// tad ya thA/
243b3(mdo sde): bA g+ha pa ri che de/ garba ri bid d+yA pra ga ga kle krA ya yo ga pra ti hA re sha man nA si ka the sam me ga dza she/ a krA ya na the/ krA b+ha ba dze/ nid d+ha dza she/ a d+ha sha ya dzA she/ bi bra ba sha dzA she/
243b4(mdo sde): shai kA dza she/ se na dza ba dzA shai/ sa li la gu h+ya dzA she/ sa la gu h+ya be krI b+ha na kro she sa d+ha na ko no/ sI ba tha nan b+he/ bI ta prid te u pa kra ma pa te/ an che d+ya pra khe sa kad thA shes
243b5(mdo sde): lo tsa na ba me kro d+ha d+ha re/ ka ma sa she/ a ka sha kha ge na g+ha kun dze/ bid d+yA ba ne ka ba ne/ u rba ba ne sa ma ma ka re/ shwa ri ya ra ne/ mo gA dza be/ ha ri ko na ba/ na ya na mu khe/ sa ra k+ka ko le
243b6(mdo sde): nA rA yu dzu ne/ in dra sA sa na/ o a a ba a/ sa ra ba a/ ba ra a bA ra sa me g+ha/ du kha ni sti ra ni ni drA he swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
243b7(mdo sde): dpal rtsegs rgyal po des/ bdag chas pa'i dus kyi tshe/ bsrung ba'i slad du rigs sngags kyi rten gyi lung bstan pa stsal pa 'di lags so// de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
243b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis rigs sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di zung shig/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin
244a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o// de bas kyang rigs sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs
244a2(mdo sde): sngags 'di ches rnyed par dka'o// sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis kyang rung / bskal pa brgyas gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
244a3(mdo sde): kyi sa'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab rnams bgrang ba'am rtogs par nus so// rigs sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di'i mtha' ni bskal pa brgya stong gis kyang brjod
244a4(mdo sde): par mi nus so// rigs sngags kyi rten gyi lung bstan pa 'di ni de ltar zab pa yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis rigs sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di yang zung shig/ kun chub
244a5(mdo sde): bar byos shig/ 'khor bzhi po dag la yang rgyas par ston cig/ yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / der thos pas kyang / sems de dag gi sred pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang
244a6(mdo sde): chen po srid pa'i rgyu rnams dang / gzungs sngags gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa srid pa'i rgyu rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
244a7(mdo sde): snyed kyang rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro// bud med mtshams med pa byed pa'i las kyi sgrib pa sred pa'i rgyu rnams zad par 'gyur zhing / lhag ma med pa'i bar du yang 'gyuraro//
244a8(mdo sde): zad pa thams cad zad pa dang / byang grol gyi bde ba dang ldan pa'i bar du yang 'gyuraro// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan
244b1(mdo sde): 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// khyod ni ded dpon gcig pa lags/ chos rnams kun la nges pa ste/
244b2(mdo sde): mthong ba'i gus pa skyes pa yis// bshes gnyen dpal yang nye bar 'dzin/ me tog gcig dang bdug pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod bgyis na/ yan lag kun gyi mchog
244b3(mdo sde): ldan pa'i// bshes gnyen sdug pa nye bar 'dzin/ tshogs ni chen po sdus pa yis/ dus cig du ni 'dir mdzad pas/ lha rnams thams cad bsngags bgyid cing / bshes gnyen
244b4(mdo sde): dpal yang nye bar 'dzin/ der ni 'jig rten mgon po yis/ 'di ni lan cig kho na bstan/ rtag tu lha min shes rab ldan/ bshes gnyen dpal yang nye bar 'dzin/ dpal
244b5(mdo sde): gyis me tog snying po ni/ dpal rnams kun gyis kun tu brgyan/ de yis shag kya'i dpal zhu bar/ bdag cig pho nyar mngags pa lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
244b6(mdo sde): byang phyogs kyi phyogs chan sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung brgyad bcu'i bye ma snyed 'das nas/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de na/ 'jig rten
244b7(mdo sde): gyi khams spos thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bgyi ba mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
244b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag 'dir mngags te/ de bzhin
245a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las
245a2(mdo sde): 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes
245a3(mdo sde): kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci snyan mi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal pa ma mchis sam/
245a4(mdo sde): gnod pa chung lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/ ji ltar chos rjes su 'thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag
245a5(mdo sde): lags sam/ chos kyis gnas pas gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang / klu'i yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi
245a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis zhing gcig pu lags sam/ 'di na thogs pa ma mchis par chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na se gang su dag 'khor
245a7(mdo sde): lo skor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don tu de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po de khyod dang / nyi ma'i snying po chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnams par 'jig
245a8(mdo sde): pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa sbyin par mdzad legs so// de naso zhi ba rig pa mchis pa'i sbu bu'i
245b1(mdo sde): gzungs sngags mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ sems can thams cad la phan bgyid pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dal bar bgyid pa/ bung
245b2(mdo sde): po dang skye mched thams cad yongs su shes par bgyid pa/ chos thams cad rnam pa 'byed par bgyid pa/ thabs thams cad yang dgra par smon par bgyin pa/ byang grol gyi
245b3(mdo sde): bde ba thams cad yongs su mong bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad rab tu dad par bgyid pa/ chos thams kyi bde ba la 'jug par bgyid pa/ bdud dang phas kyi
245b4(mdo sde): rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun par tshar gcod par bgyid pa/ bdud kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa/ 'di yang skar lags te/ rig pa mchis
245b5(mdo sde): pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni bdud rnams tshar gcod par bgyid pa/ phas kyi rgol ba rnams pham par bgyid/ lha rnams dga' bar bgyid pa/ gnod
245b6(mdo sde): sbyin rnams yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pa/ lha ma yin rnams rnam par 'jom par bgyid pa/ nam mkha' lding rnams yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pa/ mi 'am ji
245b7(mdo sde): rnams dad par bgyid pa/ lto 'phye chen po rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyid pa/ phas kyi rgol ba rnams 'dul bar bgyid pa/ rgyal rigs rnams mngon par dga'
245b8(mdo sde): par bgyid pa/ bram ze'i rigs rnams 'jug par bgyi ba/ rje'u rigs rnams rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa/ dmangs rigs rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa/
246a1(mdo sde): / bud med 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyid pa/ bud med sbrum ma bde legs su yongs su thar par bgyid pa/ mang du thos pa rnams dran par bgyid
246a2(mdo sde): ba/ rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba bgyid pa/ 'thab pa dang thab mo dang / mu ge dang 'chings dang / nad dang / kha
246a3(mdo sde): rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / chu bo dang / dgrang ba dang dro ba dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / rtsab pa dang / hud hud po dang / 'dus
246a4(mdo sde): te reg par dka' rnams rnam paro zhi bar bgyid pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ston par bgyid pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi
246a5(mdo sde): 'chad par bgyid pa/ 'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa/ zad pa shes pa skyed par bgyid pa/ mi skye ba shes pa rang gi mngon sum du bgyid pa/ mun pa'i
246a6(mdo sde): phung po rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa/ sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa/ mthu che lags so// tad ya thA/ mA na k+ka/ A na kra/ g+ha sa krA dza la k+ka/ mA na k+ka/ k+ka bA k+ka/ na ma kra/
246a7(mdo sde): na da kra/ na dar hu bi san tra/ kha ga na ta/ a Ta na Ta kunA ta/ pa ri ku sa na Ta na Ta/ pu ri ka na ta/ u ta ra na ta/ ka bi na Ta/ kun dza na Ta/ a me kha na Ta/ tsa bam b+ha na Ta/ kha gam
246a8(mdo sde): b+ha na Ta pu k+ka ra na ta/ hi sa du hra ne Ta sa mA la yA na Ta/ shir ku mang ko'u ta Ta mA ta gur ba/ tratwe hu k+ka ba ni ra du/ d+ha na mar dzu'u pa g+ha na pu te/ san ti ra ba dza ga
246b1(mdo sde): ma ho ra ga dza lA/ a tri na/ a ti NA rba ba/ a tri TA kra/ a ba ha mArga ti/ na kA/ e shod to/ du kha b+ha ra s+ya swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me/
246b2(mdo sde): tog gi snying pos rig pa ma mchis pa'i sbubs zhi ba/ lung bstan pa chen po/ mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'di 'dir bskur pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya
246b3(mdo sde): thub pas legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo // bsam gtan la brtson pa rnams ma gtogs par/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du lhags pa'i sems can thams cad dang
246b4(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces
246b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu bstan pa 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin sems can ci rnams la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gzungs sngags don dang bcas pa/ tshig
246b6(mdo sde): 'bru dang bcas pa/ lhag chad med pa'i rgya cher ston par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des/ gang khyod chas pa'i dus kyi tshe/ gsang
246b7(mdo sde): sngags gang dag gis sdang ba thams cad dad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags sdang ba zhi bar byed pa dang ba/ gnyid kyis log par byed par dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs
246b8(mdo sde): pa'i gnas rgyu 'thun pa byin pa de khyod kyis kyang ston cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bstan par bgyi lags so// tad ya thA/ ba bri ha/ bu bu ra/ ta lar pa/
247a1(mdo sde): i la sa ha/ ha du ha du/ ga ga Na k+ka/ sha ma ming tra/ sha tsa kra ba trI/ ti le sA ga ra/ ti li/ du'u Na hi le/ ha ba he/ ha ba he/ na ra dza te/ ya ba na mi tri/ kri te mi tre/
247a2(mdo sde): ba ra mi t+ye/ shi khi mid tre/ ma ru ta mid traM/ kha ga mid tre/ sa rdo dza mid tre/ sarba gra ma mid tre/ ma nA ba ra mid tre/ d+ha nya shwa ra mid tre swA hA/ kye byang chub sems dpa' sems
247a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos sdang ba zhi bar byed pa/ gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i bstan pa 'di bshad pa na sdang ba'i sbrul thams cad rang gi na gnas su dong nas/
247a4(mdo sde): gnyid kyis log par gyur te/ gang dag bzod pa thob pa rnams dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// srid
247a5(mdo sde): pa na gang dag sdang ba'i gnod sbyin rnams dang / gang dag sdang ba'i lha ma yin rnams dang zhes bya ba nas/ sdang ba'i nam mkha' lding rnams shes bya ba'i bar dang / sdang ba'i mi 'am
247a6(mdo sde): ci rnams shes bya ba'i bar dang / yi dgas rnams shes bya ba'i bar dang / sha za rnams shes bya ba'i bar dang / srul po rnams shes bya ba'i bar dang / gang dag snang ba'i lus
247a7(mdo sde): srul po rnams shes bya ba'i bar de dag rang gi gnas su dong nas/ gnyid kyis log par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams dang / phyir mi ldog pa/
247a8(mdo sde): rnams ni ma gtogs so// gang dag sdang ba'i mi gzu lums can dang sgrub pa dang / snying rtse ba med pa dang / phan tshun mi 'thun pa dang / rtag tu khro ba spyod pa dang / 'jig
247b1(mdo sde): rten pha rol gyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa dang / 'phags pa la bskur ba 'debs pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
247b2(mdo sde): ldan pa de dag kyang ldang ba zhi par byed pa/ gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i snyan pa 'di thob pas thams cad mchog tu byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / snying rje'i sems
247b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dag dang / snying rtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / khon med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / chos la dmigs pa'i
247b4(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa dag dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi lhag par gus pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / chos la/
247b5(mdo sde): dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu gnas par gyur to// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
247b6(mdo sde): pa dpal me tog gi snying po des bdag chas pa'i tshe/ bsrung ba'i slad du gang sdang ba zhi bar bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags stsal pa ni 'di lags so// de na de bzhin gshegs pa
247b7(mdo sde): shAkya thub pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis sdang ba zhi bar byed pa/ gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i gzungs sngags dmigs
247b8(mdo sde): pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i rgyu 'thun pa 'di zung shig/ mo'u dgal gyi bu la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten
248a1(mdo sde): @/ du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o// de bas kyang sdang ba zhi bar byed pa/ gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i gzungs sngags dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas
248a2(mdo sde): kha'i rgyu 'thun pa 'di ches rnyed par dka'o// mo'u dgal gyi bu sdang ba zhi bar byed pa/ gnyid kyis log par byed pa/ 'di ni bskal pa brgya stong du las gzhan mi byed par
248a3(mdo sde): stan kyang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / tha na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang rung / gang gis kyang don zung bar mi nas//
248a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ni ma gtogs te/ de ltar zab cing de ltar don che ba yin la/ de ltar phan yon che ba yin no// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
248a5(mdo sde): lam dang / bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhing / sems can yongs su smin pa'i snying rje chen po yang thob par byed pa'o// mo'u dgal gyi bu de lta bas na sdang
