330a7(mdo sde): byi bozhi yin/ tshes bcu gsum la nag pa ste/ tshes bcu bzhi la sa ro yin/ zla rangs tshes ni bco lnga la/ sa ga yin te sa ga yi/ go rims brjod bya byang phyogs su/ kha ltas
330a8(mdo sde): nyi ma yongs su 'khor/ mtshan mo mnyam mtshungs rnam pa ste/ bco lnga bco lngar bshad pa yin/ nag pas mtshan mo 'thob par byed/ nyin par yang ni smin drug yin// grib
330b1(mdo sde): tshad dag kyang gom pa drug/ nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ lha min bla ma pa bsangs/ 'dir yang zhing zhes gdags pa yin/ khyim gling yin te mkhas pa rnams kyis//
330b2(mdo sde): zla ba bdun po bshad pa yin/ dbyar zla ra ba'i mar gyi de'i// dang po tshes gcig lha 'tshams smrab/ tshes gnyis la ni snron yin te/ tshes gsum la ni snrums yin no//
330b3(mdo sde): tshes bzhi la ni chu stod yin/ tshes lnga la ni chu smad yin/ tshes drug la ni byi zhin te/ tshes bdun la ni gro zhin yin/ tshes brgyad la ni mon gum ste/ tshes dgu la ni mon gre
330b4(mdo sde): yin/ tshes bcu la ni khrums stod yin/ chos bcu gcig la khrums smad yin/ tshes bcu gnyis la nam gra ste/ tshes bcu gsum la tha skar yin/ tshes bcu bzhi la bra
330b5(mdo sde): nye yin/ tshes bco lnga la smin drug ste/ de ni zla phyed zla ba yang / tshes gcig la ni snar ma sgrub/ tshes gnyis la ni mgo yin te/ tshes gsum la ni lag yin no// tshes bzhi
330b6(mdo sde): la ni nab so te/ tshes lnga la ni rgyal yin no// tshes drug la ni skag yin te/ tshes bdun lnga ni mchu yin no// tshes brgyad la ni gre yin te/ tshes dgu la ni dra bo yin no// tshes
330b7(mdo sde): bcu la ni me bzhi ste/ tshes bcu gcig la nag pa yin/ tshes bcu gnyis la sa ri ste/ tshes bcu gsum la sa ga yin/ tshes bcu bzhi la lha 'tshoms te/ tshes bco lnga
330b8(mdo sde): la snron yin no// ngas dbyar zla ra ba'i rim brjod bya/ byang phyogs kha bltas nyi ma 'khor/ 'phel byed nyen par bcu drug du/ shes bya mtshan mo 'ang bcu bzhi yin/
331a1(mdo sde): sags mtshan mo 'thob par byed// nyi ma'i mdun na mgo yin no// grib tshod dgom pa bzhi yin te/ de ni yongs su 'khor bar byed/ der zhing gza'
331a2(mdo sde): lha ga nyi ma'i bu/ 'jom por byed pa'i gza' yin no// sbyor ba khyim yin nyin par 'gro/ brgyad pa yin par brjod pa yin/ dbyar zla 'bring ba'i tshes gcig la/ snrums
331a3(mdo sde): ni sgrub par byed pa yin/ tshes gnyis la ni chu stod yin/ chos gsum la ni chu smad yin/ tshes bzhi la ni byi zhin te/ tshes lnga la ni gro yin no// tshes drag la ni mon gru mi ste/
331a4(mdo sde): tshes bdun la ni mon gre yin/ tshes brgyad la ni khrums stod yin/ tshes dgu la ni khrums smad yin/ tshes bcu la ni nam gu ste/ tshes bcu gcig la tha skar yin/ tshes
331a5(mdo sde): bcu gnyis la bri nyi ste/ tshes bcu gsum la sprin drag yin/ tshes bcu bzhi la snar ma ste/ tshes bco lnga la mgo yin no// de ni zla ba phyed yin no// zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la/
331a6(mdo sde): lag ni sgrub par byed pa yin/ ches gnyis la ni nab so yin/ tshes gsum la ni rgyal yin te/ tshes bzhi la ni skrag yin no// tshes lnga la ni mchu yin te/ tshes drug la ni gre
331a7(mdo sde): yin no// tshes bdun la ni dbo yin te/ tshes brgyad la ni me bzhi yin/ tshes dgu la ni nag pa ste/ tshes bcu la ni sa ri yin/ tshes bcu gcig la sa ga ste/ tshes bcu gnyis
331a8(mdo sde): la lha 'tshams yin/ tshesra bcu gsum la snron yin te/ tshes bcu bzhi la snrums yin no// zla nya zla bar chu ston yin/ bdag gis dbyar 'bring rim brjod bya/ byang phyogs
331b1(mdo sde): bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ltas/ nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ zhin par yud tsam bcu bdun te/ mtshan mo yang ni bcu gsum yin/ snron gyis kyang ni mtshan mo 'thob//
331b2(mdo sde): mar bcas na nam so yin/ grib tshod gom pa gnyis yin te/ nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ zla ba zhes bya zhing yin te/ lag dang yang dag ldan pa yin/ 'dir khyim sbal
331b3(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba/ zla ba dgu par bshad pa yin/ dbyar zla tha chungs mar gyi ngo'i// tshes gcig la ni chu smad sgrub/ tshes gnyis la ni byi zhin te/ tshes gsum la ni mon grum yin/
331b4(mdo sde): tshes bzhi la ni mon gre ste/ tshes lnga la ni khrums stod yin/ tshes drag la ni khrums smad yin/ tshes bdun ya ni nam gru ste/ tshes brgyad la ni tha skar yin/ tshes dgu la ni bra
331b5(mdo sde): nye ste/ tshes bcu la ni sprin drug yin/ tshes bcu gcig la snar ma ste/ tshes bcu gnyis la ni mgo yin no// tshes bcu gsum la lag yin no// tshes bcu bzhi la nab so yin/
331b6(mdo sde): tshes bco lnga la rgyal yin te/ de ni zla ba phyed yin no// zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la/ skag ni sgrub par byed pa yin/ ches gnyis la ni mchu yin no// tshes gsum la ni/
331b7(mdo sde): gri yin te/ ches bzhi la ni dpe yin no// tshes lnga la ni me bzhi ste/ tshes drug la ni nag pa yin/ tshes bdun la nI sa ri ste/ tshes brgyad la ni sa gra yin/ tshes dgu la ni
331b8(mdo sde): lha 'tshams te/ tshes bcu la ni snron yin no// tshes bcu gcig la snrums yin te/ tshes bcu gnyis la chu stod yin/ tshes bcu gsum la chu smad yin/ tshes bcu bzhi la byi/
332a1(mdo sde): bzhin te/ zla ba rangs la gro yin no// bdag gis dbyar mtha'i rim brjod bya/ de bzhin byang phyogs su ni/ nyi ma gdong phyed ltas te 'khor/ nyin par bco brgyad
332a2(mdo sde): thob nas kyang / mtshan mo yang ni bcu gnyis te/ chu snod kyis ni mtshan mo 'thob/ nyi ma'i mdun ni mchu yin no// grib tshod gom pa phyed yin te/ nyi ma yongs su 'khor
332a3(mdo sde): bar byed/ 'drir zhing nyi ma ldan pa'o// las kyang gzer ni gtong bar byed/ 'dir khyim seng ger shes par gyis/ zla ba bcu po bshad pa yin/ ston zla ra ba mar gyis
332a4(mdo sde): de'i// dang por tshes gcig mon gram skrag tshes gnyis la ni mon gre ste/ tshes gsum la ni khrums stod yin/ tshes bcu la ni khrims smad yin/ tshes lnga la ni nam gru ste/ tshes
332a5(mdo sde): drag la ni tha skar yin/ tshes bdun la ni bra nye ste/ tshes brgyad la ni smin drug yin/ tshes dgu la ni snar ma ste/ tshes bcu la ni mgo yin no// tshes bcu gcig la lag yin
332a6(mdo sde): te/ tshes bcu gnyis la ni nab so yin/ tshes bcu gsum la rgyal yin te/ tshes bcu bzhi la skag yin no// tshes bco lnga la mchu yin te/ de ni zla ba yar gyis tshe sra gcig la/
332a7(mdo sde): gre ni sgrub par byed pa ste/ tshes gnyis la ni dpe yin no// tshes gsum la ni me bzhi ste/ tshes bzhi la ni nag pa yin/ ches lnga la ni sa ri ste/ tshes drug la ni sa ga
332a8(mdo sde): yin/ ches bdun la ni lha 'tshams te/ tshes brgyad la ni snron sa yin te/ tshes dgu la ni snrums yin te/ tshes bcu la ni chu stod yin/ tshes bcu gcig la chu smad
332b1(mdo sde): yin/ gro zhin byi zhin tshes bcu gnyis/ tshes bcu gsum la mon gum ste/ tshes bcu bzhi la mon gre ste/ zla ba nya ba zla rangs la/ khrums stod ces ni bya ba yin/ bdag gis
332b2(mdo sde): ston zla rab 'bring brjod/ lho phyogs nyi ma'i 'khor lo ldog/ nyin par yang ni bcu bdun te/ mtshan mo yang ni bcu gsum yin/ gro zhin gyis kyang mtshan mon 'thob/
332b3(mdo sde): ma'i bdun na gro zhin te/ grib tshod dag kyang gom pa gnyis/ nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ zla bu gza' lhag zhes bya ba/ der ni zhing la yang dag gnas/ der khyim bu
332b4(mdo sde): mo bzhag pa ste/ zla ba bcu gnyis bdag gis bshad/ sbron zla 'bring po mar gyis ngo'i/ dang por tshes gcig khrums smad sgrub/ tshesra gnyis la ni nam gu ste/ tshes gsum
332b5(mdo sde): la ni tha skar yin/ tshes bzhi la ni bra nye ste/ tshes lnga la ni sman drag yin/ tshes drag la ni snar ma ste/ ches bdun la ni mgo yin no// tshes brgyad la ni chu smad yin/ tshes
332b6(mdo sde): dgu byi zhin gro zhin te/ tshes bcu la ni mon grum yin/ tshes bcu gcig la mon gre ste/ tshes bcu gnyis la khrums stod yin/ tshes bcu gsum khrims slad yin/
332b7(mdo sde): tshes bcu bzhi la nam gru ste/ zla rangs nyi tshangs tha skar yin/ de ni zla ba phyed yin no// zla ba yar tshes gcig nag pa sgrub/ tshes gnyis la ni sa ri ba ste/ chos gsum
332b8(mdo sde): la ni sa ga yin/ ches bzhi la ni lha 'tshams te/ tshes lnga la ni snron yin no// tshes drag la ni snrums yin te/ tshes bdun la ni chu stod yin/ tshes brgyad la ni lag yin te/
333a1(mdo sde): / tshes dgu la ni nub so yin/ tshes bcu la ni rgyal yin te/ tshes bcu gcig la skag yin no// tshes bcu gnyis la mchu yin te/ tshes bcu gsum
333a2(mdo sde): la gre yin te/ tshes bcu bzhi la dbo yin te/ tshes bco lnga la me bzhi ste/ ston zla 'bring po'i ngo la ni/ lo skor bdag gis brjod par byed/ lho'i phyogs su kha ltas
333a3(mdo sde): twe/ nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ nyin par bcu drag 'khor byed cing / mtshan mo yang ni bcu bzhi yin/ khrims stod kyis ni mtshan mo 'thob/ nyi ma'i mdun nag pa
333a4(mdo sde): yin/ grib tshod dag ni gom bzhi ste/ nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ lha mis bla ma pa ba sangs/ gzab ni zhing la rnam par gzhag/ 'dir khyim srang zhes bya ba gzhag/
333a5(mdo sde): zla ba bcu gnyis bshad pa yin/ yongs su 'khor ba de yis ni/ le ni de ltas 'gro bar byed/ mig stong yang dang yang du ni/ 'das te chos kyi phyogs la ltos/ khyod ni
333a6(mdo sde): shes rab gzhi yin na/ chos ma yin pa 'ang bzlog par gyis/ chos gnag tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/ thob phyag mkhas pa bsam gtan pa/ de dag khyod kyis chos
333a7(mdo sde): gos dang / bza' btung rnams kyis rjes su srungs/ yang dag gnas de brgya byin gyis/ rnga bong la ni thal sbar nas/ rab tu smras pa bdag gis cag/ bya ba yang ni bsko/
333a8(mdo sde): khar gyis/ smras pa/ lha'i bla ma khyod kyis su/ rtag par tshangs par spyod pa sungs/ rigs sngags sman dang gsang sngags rnams/ thams cad la ni bya ba bsgrubs/
333b1(mdo sde): las kun drang srong zla ba dang / zla ba chung dang bzhag dang bzhi/ bzo'i las kyi mtha' kan la/ gtso bo yin par bkod pa yin/ drag po dang gi sna can dang / dgon pa dang ni/
333b2(mdo sde): lte ba ste/ gnod sbyin bzhi po de dag ni/ mchod sbyin rim par gtso bor bkod/ rgya mtsho chu lce 'jog po dang / rin chen skyong dang ring du 'gro/ sa yin tshes dang zla ba srung / gnas
333b3(mdo sde): thar byed pa rgya mtsho ni/ gtso bor bzhag ste ma dros dang // khab kyis lus 'bigs chu lhas 'byin// ri dgas 'khrugs pa klu de bzhin/ klu rnams kyi ni gtso bor bkod/
333b4(mdo sde): khyod ni dge ba rab skyed pa/ ne tse yi ni khyab byed pa/ mkhas pa zhing gi gtso bo ste/ de 'dra ba ni ji lta bu/ khyod ni snying po kho nas kyang / me'i rtse ma'i gtso bo ste/ khyod
333b5(mdo sde): ni rlung dmar mgul g.yo ba/ rlung yang ba'i gtso bo yin/ rdo rje sa'i mig dang seng ge'i mig/ legs mthong lag na mdun sum thogs/ lha mo bzhi po de dag ni/ grod
333b6(mdo sde): khyor gtso bor bkod pa yin/ gong ma'i chang skyes rtsibs mu khyad/ 'khor lo smon pa gnod sbyin bzhi/ de dag rin chen brtag pa la// nyo 'tshong byed pa'i gtso bor
333b7(mdo sde): bkod/ phyogs mtshams su ni bzhi yin te/ bsrung ba'i phyir ni yang dag gnas/ yul 'khor grong khyer thams cad du/ bsrung ba'i phyir ni 'byung po bkod/ drang
333b8(mdo sde): srong dag ni thams cad dang / lha'i tshogs dang klu rnams dang / lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyi/ bar yang rjes su yi rang byed/ lhas brten rab tu rgyal ba mchog/ thug pa
334a1(mdo sde): yi ni gtso bo ste/ khyim ni skye dang 'gags pa dang / zas dang ro dang me tog mchog/ khyod ni dri 'phel byed pa ste/ shu dag rdzogs byed 'bras bu'i mchog/ khyod ni lan
334a2(mdo sde): bde skyed pa ste/ rnam par 'tshe las rgyal ba'i gtso/ dga' bo dang ni nye dga' gnyis/ ri bo rnams kyi gtso bor bkod/ nor rgyal bu dang thang shing zhing / lci mchog mig mar rmugs
334a3(mdo sde): byed skye ma/ khyod ni dbyangs can chu'i gtso// khyod ni grab dang yid 'phrog pa/ zla ba 'phrog par byed pa ste/ bcud kyis len gyi gtso bo yin/ gza' dang rgyu skar dus kyang yin/ khyim
334a4(mdo sde): rnams thams cad rnam par gzhag/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang yin/ skal ldan rgyar ni rnam par gzhag/ lus ngas gnod byin rnams kyis gtso/ grol bum rnams kyi 'phags
334a5(mdo sde): skyes por klu rnams kyi ni mig mi bzang / dri za rnams kyi yul 'khor srung / thams cad gling chen po bzhi dang / gling gzhan brgyad khye thams cad du/ drang srong rnga bong gis
334a6(mdo sde): gang yongs su sbyor ba ma bkod par btang ba'i gnas ci yang med do// der lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' rdzing dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
334a7(mdo sde): po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byas par gyur to// drang srong rnga bong gi bya ba de la yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar gyur to//
334a8(mdo sde): bya ba de ni mchod pa dang rim gro bya bar so sor gnas par gyur to// de'i rjes la shin tu yun ring ba zhig na drang srong thub pa'i las bya ba byang ste/ des kyang skar ma'i dpyad
334b1(mdo sde): tu byas so// zhag gis mi thub pa dag/ shol yod pa yang bshad do// yang de'i tshe drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten ga la bar klu thams cad 'dus te/ drang srong skur ma la dga'
334b2(mdo sde): ba la mchog tu bla ma lags pa dang / gces par byed pa skyes te/ de la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir ci nus su brtson par gyur to// 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen de'i
334b3(mdo sde): mdo' las/ nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs te/ rgyu skar gyi sbyor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i li'u// rdzogs s+ho// / 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen
334b4(mdo sde): po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo'o// / bam po bcu gcig pa/ rgya mtshos smras pa// nam mkha' la ni rgyu skar tshogs// ji ltar bzhag pa bzhin
334b5(mdo sde): du ni// khyod kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs dran// mkhas khyod srid gsum kun gyi gtso// khyod kyi snying rje byams pa dper// shes gsal 'gro la snying brtse bzhin// kun dpal 'di nas khyod
334b6(mdo sde): kyis ni// lag 'gro thams cad thar bar gyis// srid gsum tshul brtul mtshungs med khyod/ lag 'gro bde kun tshig byed khyod/ khyod ni drang srong kun gyi blo/ mi rnams kyis ni
334b7(mdo sde): mchod par 'os/ 'gro ba'i kun dpal khyod la ni/ lha dang lag 'gro gnod sbyin tshogs/ rten gyis yul rnams thams cad la/ lag 'gro myur du thar bar gyis/ de nas drang srong skar
334b8(mdo sde): ma la dga' ba/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu yid dang bskyed par 'dod nas de lta bu'i klu'i tshogs thams cad la shin tu rigs pa'i tshig snyan pa dag gis 'di skad ces smras//
335a1(mdo sde): yon tan de dag bdag la med/ drang srong blong bdag ma yin/ khyod cag 'di nas thar byed pa/ bdag gis nus pa'i yin no// gang gis skal ba du mar ni/ dka'
335a2(mdo sde): thub dka' ba bzod pa spyad/ khyod cag thar par byed pa'i/ drang srong gzhan de blta bar gyis/ rtag tu brtson zhing sbyin pa byin/ mkhas shing glang chen rta dag dang / shing rta bu dang
335a3(mdo sde): chung ma dang / nor gyis sems can phan pa byas/ ska lag mgo dang rna ba dang / mig dang pags pa khrag dang ni/ bu bron bran mo bza' btung mar/ mar cha kha zas sngon chad ba tang /
335a4(mdo sde): snying rje dang ni byams pa yis/ khyod cag thar byed srid gsum na/ mtshungs med bsam gtan dga' 'byung ba/ de ni drang srong bong rnga ste/ kun tu brtse zhes byang chub sem/
335a5(mdo sde): sngon chad ri dgas pha rol byin/ sems can mang po sdug bsngal gyis/ nyams thag pa'i thar par byas// sems can gcig gi ched du yang / sngon gyi tshe ra bas de gsal
335a6(mdo sde): par/ dbul par 'gro bzod de ri dgas/ de ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'byung / sems can sdug bsngal nyam thag kun/ sdug bsngal thar mdzad rnga bong yin/ sems
335a7(mdo sde): can sprin phyir brtson 'gras dang / snying rje brtan pos de srin 'khor/ ngarnga bong de ni skyes pa ni// rgyal sras bu ram shing pa'i// rims su zas gtsang gi ni sras/ des ni/
335a8(mdo sde): bcos ma thag tu khyab/ srid gsum bde byung 'jig rten dpal/ yid bde rnam pa sna tshogs dang / lha dang klu'i bu rnams dang / 'byung po gnod sbyin rgyal pos khyab/
335b1(mdo sde): der ni mchod spyir thams cad lhags/ des yis gom pa bdun bor te/ ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa'i/ sa ni thams cad 'khrugs par gyur/ 'gro ba rga nad sdug bsngal dang /
335b2(mdo sde): 'chi bas gzir las ngan 'grol zhing / zhi ba bde ba mya ngan med/ skam la dgod ces shag sras srang / me tog dri dang rin tshe dag/ lho klu rnams kyis gtor gyur cing // 'byung
335b3(mdo sde): po'i tshogs rnams sna tshogs kyis/ sras po la ni bston gyur po// bskal pa mang po du mar yang / sngon chad khyod kyis dul ba dang / sbyin dang bsam gtan dgyes la bsten/
335b4(mdo sde): sems can kun ces sdug bsngal bzod/ 'di la skye ba 'di yang ni/ thams cad kyi ni tha ma lags/ sdug bsngal thams cad zhi mdzad par// ring po mi thogs khyod 'tshang rgya/
335b5(mdo sde): des kyang dpa' bo brtan par gyur/ mtshungs pa med de bud med tshogs/ dug khri tham pa spangs nas su/ spyod pa rab brtan dragra spyod/ g.yo sgyu can ni sder bcas pa'i/ bdud
335b6(mdo sde): ni gcig pus bcom nas kyang / byang chub zhi mchog gzhal med bsnyes/ mya ngan med las don dam gzigs/ byams dang ye shes thugs rje yis/ sems can kun dang /
335b7(mdo sde): mi mnyam pa'i/ 'byung po dang ni thams cad la/ de ni byams pa'i thugs mnyam pa/ sems can dag la yang tho mi 'tsham/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las/
335b8(mdo sde): thar par mdzod cing de yang ni/ rnam bcangs brtson ra thar mdzad ga ma gdan de gnas shing / 'gro ba'i nang na chos kyang ston/ de la khyod kyang gsol ba thog byams/
336a1(mdo sde): / pa'i yid kyis rnam par ltos/ drang srong mchog gi thad du der/ 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las/ khyod cag yongs su thar par byed/ rang nyid
336a2(mdo sde): kyang ni 'dod par gyis/ dga' mchog bde ba 'dod rnams kyis/ phyin chad mkhas ldi ngo thams cad las/ 'jigs pa khyod la mi 'byung ngo // rtag bde sdug bsngal bral dgar
336a3(mdo sde): gyis/ brtson ra 'di na g.yo sbyar can// bdud ni khyod la rnam par 'tshe/ ji ltar nga yis bshad pa bzhin/ thams cad kyang ni bshad par gyis/ yang de'i tshe drang srong thub pa'i
336a4(mdo sde): gnas rten du/ klu chen po po dang mo dang / khye'u dang bu mo gang dag thams cad 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo rab tu sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// 'jig rten
336a5(mdo sde): thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa/ chos thams cad kyi dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad pa/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par
336a6(mdo sde): mdzad pa/ dga' ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rtag tu byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa/ thugs rje thams cad kyis khyab pa/ 'phrin las thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa/
336a7(mdo sde): lam thams cad ston pa/ lha dang klu rnams kyis mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// srid pa gsum gyi dgra bcom pa/ mchod pa thams cad 'os pa/ bdag gis
336a8(mdo sde): thams cad sdug bsngal zhing brtsonar 'dir 'khyams lags na/ 'di nas bdag gis thar par mdzad par gsol/ klu de dag dang lhan cig bdag cag gnas par bgyi'o//
336b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de dag thams cad sngon gyi lus kyi gzugs ji lta bzhin du bkod de/ gnas de nas 'gro bar ni ma nus so// de dag thams cad kyis drang srong skar ma la dga'
336b2(mdo sde): ba la smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bden te/ sems can thams cad la bde bar bzhed pa/ rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i chos nyid yin no// de la bdag cag skabs su nye bar gnas so//
336b3(mdo sde): 'di nas myur du bzhud cig/ bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las bdag cag thar par 'dzod cig/ skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong ses
336b4(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa thams cad mkhyen pa thug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'khor bar
336b5(mdo sde): 'khor lo rnams par ldog par bya ba'i phyir dang / byang chub kyi los rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sems can yang dag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nas/ sangs
336b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi spyan gyi bar du thob par bya ba'i phyir dang por ma byung ba la dmigs pa dang / nyan thos dang thun med pa sems la dmigs pa mchog bstan to// yang byang chub sems dpa'
336b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po slob dpon la rag las pa rnams la rgyu las yang dag par byung ba dang / so sor brtag pa la dmigs pa tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan to// de ltar de
336b8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa dag tu med pa dpag du med pa rdul phra rab snyed na/ theg pa bla na med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug
337a1(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir
337a2(mdo sde): dang / bdud bzhi gdul ba'i phyir dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir chos kyi chus khrus mdzad do// da ltar shin tu kun tu rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa'i
337a3(mdo sde): tshogs kyi sems can gyi khams la dmigs pa med pa'i kun nas ldang ba med pa/ rgyu ba med pa/ gzhi med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ chags pa med pa/ rnam par
337a4(mdo sde): gzhag pa med pa rdul med pa/ mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ gsal byed med pa/ spyod pa med pa/ tha mi dad pa nyid ces bya ba nas/ phung po dang / khams
337a5(mdo sde): dang / skye mched dang / 'byung ba chen po thams cad dang / mig gi rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i srid po zhes bya ba'i bar nas/ yid kyi rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i snyed
337a6(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i bar nas/ yid kyi rang bzhin tshor ba'i med pa'i sred pa'i bar la smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / 'jug pa med pa'i chos kyi
337a7(mdo sde): dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / de bzhin nyid 'dres pa med pa dang / gang 'jug pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings don dam pa bstong pa
337a8(mdo sde): nyid dang / phyir mi zlogs pa'i chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis sgrol ba/ phyed pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa la dmigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
337b1(mdo sde): pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dag la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/ sems nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ ma
337b2(mdo sde): chags pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid thob pa lta ba thams cad kyi bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom pa rnams la tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa
337b3(mdo sde): ston to// kye drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na yang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab ces bya ba dang / klu'i zla
337b4(mdo sde): ba la rtsab pa zhes bya ba dang / kwa'i rgyal po rin skyong zhes bya ba de dag byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba smon bstsags pa'i smon lam yang dag par rjes su dran pas te/
337b5(mdo sde): dag snang ba dang / rnam par bsgyings pa dang ldan pa'i gzugs thob par gyur to// de'i tshe klu gzhag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni byang chub kyi sprod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon lam yang dag
337b6(mdo sde): par rjes su dran pas byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' skar ma la dga' ba la de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so//
337b7(mdo sde): khyod bzhun la snying chen po thob pa gang gis 'dir bdag cag bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las yongs su thar par bgyid pa de bzhin gshegs pa snying rjes chen po thob pa de la
337b8(mdo sde): bdag cag gis tshig gis gsol ba thob shig/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba drang srong gi cha byad
338a1(mdo sde): / kyis 'khor drang srong stong phrag mang po dang // de nas rdzu 'phrul gris song ngo // 'brags pa 'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las brgyad
338a2(mdo sde): pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das la klu thams cad skyabs su byur gnas pa bdud sdig can gyis thos te/ shes cher 'khrugs shing skrag la/ rgya shag gi mdab ma bzhin du
338a3(mdo sde): lus rab tu 'dar zhing lus rdal ba dang lag pa gnyis bsgreng ste 'di skad ces smras so// lag 'gro rnams ni skyabs su dong / skye dgu thams cad rmongs gyur cing / 'chi
338a4(mdo sde): med lam laM gzhog byed pa/ mi zad g.yo sgyu cad la ltos/ de'i tshe bdud kyi bu mo mun bral mo zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so sems can gang dag thos can gyis/
338a5(mdo sde): dge sbyong la ni skyabs su mchis/ gang dag de'i tshig thos shing / de mthong ba lta smos ci 'tshal/ brtson pa sna tshogs sbyor ba yis/ khyod kyis yun ni ring du gzigs/
338a6(mdo sde): bka' mchid sna tshogs lhan cig mdzad/ de'i sgyu ni ma bslabs sam/ bdud kyis slar smras pa/ dge slong go'u ta ma brtan pa yin/ rang bzhin mkhas pa chen po ste/ stong
338a7(mdo sde): pa'i chos la yang dag zhags rgyal nas skye dgu sgrol bar byed/ mun bral mas smras pa/ ston pa la ni gang zhugs pa/ bdud rnams bye bas mi bskyod de/ byang grol bde
338a8(mdo sde): ba smin bgyid pa/ de la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ mtshan nyid ma mchis ldan pa'i/ de bzhin nyid la gang rten cing / ye shes kyi ni pha rol phyin/ de la bdag ni skyabs su/
338b1(mdo sde): mchis/ sgyu de bdag gis bslab par bgyi/ sems can thams cad rnam par grol/ chos rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba'i zla med sangs rgyas grub par shog/ bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya
338b2(mdo sde): snyed bdud kyi gnas der 'khod nas byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur te/ bdud sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing dngangs te/ rmongs nas stobs kyi shags kyis 'chag
338b3(mdo sde): sa bzhugs te/ bdud kyi ston nas kyi shugs kyi cho 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlab pa de lta bu byin gyis brlabs so gang gis drang srong skar ma la dga' ba de na so song nas ring
338b4(mdo sde): po ma lon par/ drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten der bdud kyi gnas de nas song nas ring po ma lon par/ nam mkha' las rdo'i char pa mer rab tu 'bar ba'i char mngon par rab
338b5(mdo sde): tu 'bab par brtsams te klu thams cad thal bar klag par 'dod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus der me tog gi char pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu bab ste/ klu thams
338b6(mdo sde): cad rab tu dga' bar gyur to// dga' khyab mas smras pa/ kye ba dad kyi bu mo dag khyed ltos shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling der dge sbyong go'u ta ma la klu gang dag skyabs
338b7(mdo sde): su drong ba de dag thams cad 'dis sdug bsngal mang por gnod par byed ni/ gang dag 'dir 'khod nas dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skyabs su dong ba rang gi bu mo khyod la lta smos
338b8(mdo sde): kyang ci 'tshal/ bdud kyi bu mos 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas skyabs su sems can su 'gro ba/ bdud rnams bye bas gsad par mi nus te/ tshul khrims nyams
339a1(mdo sde): shing blo ni 'khrugs zin kyang / de ni nges par skye ba'o pha rol 'gro/ ston pa la ni me tog gcig gtor zhing / byang chub smon lam brtan po bskyed pas na/ de
339a2(mdo sde): ni bdud rnams du mas gsad mi nus/ nem nur med par 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur/ de'i bslab pa'i gzhi ni gcig blangs shing / tshig gi don cig tsam yang nyan byed
339a3(mdo sde): la/ byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bskyed pa de/ sems can khal sbyar ba nem nur med/ yab klu tshogs 'di mthong ste sangs rgyas kyis/ der ni me tog char pa sna tshogs
339a4(mdo sde): 'bebs/ sangs rgyas yul gcig gis ni khyod la bsngos/ der ni ci yang nus par ma gyur to// gang gis sems can de dag sdig zad cing bdag cag gis ni las kyi sgrib
339a5(mdo sde): 'byung ba/ rig pa gcig kyang der ni ston pas gsungs/ bdud sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing gshi ste/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba skyes nas mya ngan gyi khang par
339a6(mdo sde): gcig pur 'dag gi/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba bcom ldan 'das kyi tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa'i gtam gyi
339a7(mdo sde): tha mar 'jug thogs su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der phyin te 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
339a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// dga' khyab mas smras pa/ kye bdud kyi bu mo dag khyod ltos shing // 'dzam
339b1(mdo sde): bu'i gling der dge sbyong go'u ta ma la klu gang dag skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad kyang 'dis sdug bsngal mang pos gnod par byed na/ gang dag 'dir 'khod nas dge sbyong
339b2(mdo sde): go'u ta ma la skyabs su dong ba rang gi bu mo khyed la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bdud kyi bu mos 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas skyabs su sems can su 'gro ba bdud rnams
339b3(mdo sde): bye bas gsad par mi nus te/ tshul khrims nyams shing blo'i 'khrugs zin kyang / de ni nges pa skye ba'i pha rol 'gro/ ston pa la ni me tog gcig gtor zhing / byang chub smon
339b4(mdo sde): lam brtan po bskyed pas na/ de ni bdud rnams du mas gsad mi nus/ nem nar med par 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur/ de'i bslab pa'i gzhi ni gcig blangs shing /
339b5(mdo sde): tshig gi don gcig tsam yang nyan byed la/ byang chub phyir ni sems kyang skyed pa de/ sems can kha lo sgyur 'gyur nem nar med/ yab klu tshogs 'di mthong ste sangs
339b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyis/ der ni me tog char pa sna tshogs 'bebs/ sangs rgyas yul gcig gis ni khyod la bsngos/ der ni ji yang nus par ma gyur to// gang gis sems can de dag
339b7(mdo sde): sdig zad cing / bdag cag gi ni las kyi sgrib 'byang ba/ ched du lung bstan pa de ni nyan pa'i/ rig pa gcig kyang der ni ston pas gsungs/ bdud sdig can shas cher
339b8(mdo sde): 'khrugs shing gshe ste/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde skyes nas mya ngan gyi khang par gcig pu 'dug go// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar
340a1(mdo sde): ma la dga' bcom ldan 'das kyi tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa'i gtam gyi mthar 'jug thogs su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der phyin
340a2(mdo sde): te 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes
340a3(mdo sde): bya ba'i bar du'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bshad par gsol/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi
340a4(mdo sde): de dag gis ni sngon bdag gis gnyis bram ze'i khye'u gnyis su gyur pa na/ lus kyi slad du rgyal po rgyal gyi la nongs pa bgyis pas 'gum pa la thug ste/ brtson rar stsal nas
340a5(mdo sde): zla ba phyed zas dang bral zhing bcing ba lngas bcings nas/ de bzhin gshes pa man da ra ba'i gsung la/ yid la gzhan mi sems par gsol ba btab pa lags so// de
340a6(mdo sde): nas de bzhin gshegs pa man da ra ba'i gsung bdag cag la thugs brtse bas rang gi gnas kyi shal kar bzhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
340a7(mdo sde): lung bstan pa de lta bus/ bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus brtson ra der bdag cag gi rna lam du dod dang bcas
340a8(mdo sde): tshig 'bru dang bcas par grags so// gsang sngags yid la bgyid pa de dag gis bdag cag dga' ba dang dad yang dag par bskyed nas/ de'i tshe bdag cag gi mthong
340b1(mdo sde): ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang / skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang //
340b2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / smin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyid pa nas shes rab kyi sbyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar dang nye bar
340b3(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / long spyod kyi sgrib pa dang / tshe'i 'di byed pas pa'i sgrib pa dang / bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dgu pa rnams
340b4(mdo sde): su 'gro ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bas shing / der bdag cag bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid lo bgyid pa'i gzugs sngags thos pa tsam gyi mdo la mgrin pa 'ching ba
340b5(mdo sde): lha las grol te/ brtson ra nas rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thob gyur cing / de nas nam mkha' las chas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa man dar ba'i gsung gi thad du
340b6(mdo sde): du nye bar phyin to// de nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri ba'i 'od ces bgyi bar skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi mdog gi thad du rab tu/
340b7(mdo sde): 'byung nas zhes bgyi ba nas/ slan chad bskal dpag tu ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnams su bdag cag ma skyes so// zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de bzhin
340b8(mdo sde): do de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzadzod thams cad du 'di dang 'og min la thug pa'i bar gyi thams cad sems can mi dang mi ma legs pa dpag tu ma mchis pas khyab ste/
341a1(mdo sde): de dag ni las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa rnams pa sna tshogs kyis zin to zhes bgyi ba
341a2(mdo sde): nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa dag gis bsgribs te ma mchis par mi nus pa lags so zhes bgyi ba'i bar du'o// sems kyi las kyis gzungs sngags thos
341a3(mdo sde): ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi mthong ba'o chos la myong bar 'gyur ba dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs
341a4(mdo sde): pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba nas/ shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyi sgrib pa
341a5(mdo sde): dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi sgrib po mchis pa thams cad dang / thos ma thag tu skye bo'i sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro ba'i sgrib pa
341a6(mdo sde): ma mchis pa thams cad yongs su bas par 'gyur ba dang / chos bstan pa der sems can rnams bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs thos par 'gyur ba dang /
341a7(mdo sde): ji srid 'tsho ba'i mtha'i bar du der mchi ba'i dus bgyis nas/ sems can rnams ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du srid par skye ba len par rngo thog par 'gyur ba dang / tshe rabs
341a8(mdo sde): dran par 'gyur ba dang / rtag por rgyun tu brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par len pa dang / log par mi ltung ba'i chos rnams su
341b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drag la mngon par brtson pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la mngon par brtson pa dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la rim gro bgyi ba dang / bsam
341b2(mdo sde): gtan gyis rnam par rol pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad du bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las
341b3(mdo sde): 'das pa'i bar du chos de dag dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bzhi par gyi
341b4(mdo sde): mtha' gnas yid la bgyi ba'i gzungs sngags de legs par bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i
341b5(mdo sde): phyir zhugs legs so legs so zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// dge slong ngam/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyis bu mo dad pa
341b6(mdo sde): can su la la theg pa gsum las/ theg pa gang yang rung bas srid pa'i rgya mtsho las rgal/ 'bar 'dod pa'i ni myur du theg pa de yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa yin
341b7(mdo sde): la/ sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms par 'dod pa yin/ thos pa thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'dod pa yin/ lus dang ngag dang yin gyi gnas ngan len thams cad las
341b8(mdo sde): yongs su thar par 'dod pa yin/ bston pa bsrung bar 'dod pa yin/ snyan pa 'dod pa dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / bza' ba dang btung ba mang po 'dod pa dang / dbang phyug
342a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang / gzugs 'dod pa dang / stobs 'dod pa dang / 'khor 'dod pa dang / nor dang 'bru 'dod pa dang / thu bo 'dod pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams
342a2(mdo sde): cad kyis mchod pa dang 'os par 'dod pa dang / rtag tu lus 'dod pa yin/ rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kun tu gnod par 'dod pa yin zhing myur du bsam gtan dang /
342a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrub par 'dod
342a4(mdo sde): ba yin no// de lta yang las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas cher 'phags pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shes par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
342a5(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnams kyis bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba blangs pa de'i bar gyis/ myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs de lta bu de dag bsgrub mi nus te/ las kyi sgrib
342a6(mdo sde): pa de lta bu de dag gis zin pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos shing / kha zas gtsang ma dang mal gtsang ma der dkyil mo'i krung ngam 'chag pas kyang
342a7(mdo sde): rung ste/ rjes su 'thun pa'i tshes brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs yid la byed pas gzhan yin la mi sems par zhes bya ba nas las gzhan mi byed cing sems rnam par
342a8(mdo sde): g.yengs pa'i bar gyis re shig mtshan gcig gam zhes bya ba dang / mtshan bdun gyi bar du gnas par byed na/ der rang gi sku byad du sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//
342b1(mdo sde): gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs chu ngur rtag par byed na chung du kho nar mthong ngo // yang na chad med par rtog par byed na/ gzugs kyi sku tshad med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
342b2(mdo sde): des mtshan thog thag mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mthong ngo // mtshan gang las kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba mthong ba'i mtshan gcig po de nyid la yid kyis rjes su bltas
342b3(mdo sde): nas gsang sngags 'di dag brjod do// tadra ya thA/ bri dzi na b+ha/ bi dzin b+ha/ ud pA da/ bya ya/ bi dz+rim b+ha/ sna pa ba ra/ a nun ta thA ta/ b+hU ta ko ti/ bi dzI ma b+ha swa hA/ ji srid du des kha
342b4(mdo sde): sngo dag sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba rnam par spel nas/ de nas byung ste/ rang gi mgo'i spyi bor zhugs pa de srid du des mtshan gcig la rnam par mo g.yeng ba'i yid kyis rjes su bltas nas/
342b5(mdo sde): tshig 'di dag brjod cing mi skrag par bya/ mi dngang bar bya'o// rang gi lus la mer rnam par blta bar bya ste/ ji lta zhe na/ des kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba rang gi lus kyi yan lag dang
342b6(mdo sde): nying lag thams cad du 'gro ba mthong nas/ rang gi lus thams cad rab tu 'bar ba mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas/ thal ba bzhin du mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar dang / phyogs bzhir rlung /
342b7(mdo sde): gis ma lus par khyer ba stong pa bzhin du mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ phyogs thams cad du de la gzugs snang ba gang yang mi 'byung ba 'di ni de'i thams cad grub pa yin// /
342b8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu la la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de ltar bu bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yin la byed pa'i gzungs sngags shin tu bsgoms shing mchod sbyin legs par byas la/
343a1(mdo sde): shin tu yid la byas na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa zhes bya ba nas/ ma lus pa'i ba'i bar du yongs
343a2(mdo sde): su byang bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa'i las rnams dang / dam pa'i chos pangs pa rnams dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// de 'dod na
343a3(mdo sde): de ltar nyin mtshan gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung thams cad dang / phyi rol pa'i bstan bcom thams cad dang / rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad dang / gzhan yang gang dag snyan dngags
343a4(mdo sde): su byas pa'i rnams/ des the tsom med par shin tu kun 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nyin mtshan gcig gis bsam gtan bzhi dang / gong ma rdzu 'phrul gyi skang pa dang tshangs pa'i
343a5(mdo sde): gnas pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom par 'dod na/ des shin tu bsgoms par 'gyur ro// de 'dod na
343a6(mdo sde): skad cig gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang sems kyi spyod pa rab tu shes par 'gyur ro// de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis
343a7(mdo sde): nam mkha' thams cad rang gi lus sam sangs rgyas kyi sku 'am/ brgya byin gyi bar ram/ srid med kyi bu bar rom/ dbang phyug chen po'i bar ma/ rgyal chen bzhi'i bar ram/ 'khor
343a8(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i bar ram/ chu'i bar ram/ me'i bar ram/ sa'i bar gyis gang bar byed do// de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis nam mkha' thams cad me tog gi bar dang / rin po che'i phreng
343b1(mdo sde): ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / ras bcos bu dang / chos gos dang / rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar dag gis gang bar byed do// sus bzhi pa rab
343b2(mdo sde): kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de lta bu shin tu bsgoms pa yin zhing shin tu yid la byas pa yin pa de'i las tshad med pa de lta bu ma lus par byang
343b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// de de ltar bsod nams dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / rnam par ro'ang ba dang / mngon par shes
343b4(mdo sde): pa tshad med par 'gyur ro// des de lta gang yang rung ba dag yongs su rdzogs par byas na/ myur du 'khor ba las rnam par thar par 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
343b5(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos spangs pa dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// de lta yin yang mtshams med pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la
343b6(mdo sde): skar pa 'debs pa de yang bdun phrag bdun du bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di/ 'dir ji ltar bstan pa bzhin sgom par byed na/ bdun
343b7(mdo sde): phrag bdun po de 'das nas las kyi sgrib pa sum cham zad cing / lhag ma skyon med par ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro// bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed na/ sangs rgyas
343b8(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa bsgom pa de lta bu de ni de ltar don che ba yin no// la la bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di de ltar thos pa tsam rnam lam
344a1(mdo sde): du thos na de la mi 'chi mi ma yin par de nye bar brtags nas/ dad pa dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skye'o// de brtson ra'i 'ching ba dang po las
344a2(mdo sde): yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// gang su dag sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i sems can thams cad kyang sdug bsngal dag las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// longs spyod kyi sdug
344a3(mdo sde): bsngal dang / chad pa dang / brdeg pa dang / g.yang sa dang / me dang chu dang dug dang / dgra thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / nad kyis 'jigs pa dang / gnas kyi 'jigs
344a4(mdo sde): pa dang / rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ bra gyi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// bde
344a5(mdo sde): 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// su sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de lta bu thos pa tha ma rnam lam du grags na/ de la nye bar brtags nas dad pa skye ste/ de ltar don che zhing phan yon che ba yino//
344a6(mdo sde): su ji ltar bstan pa bzhin de bzhin du sgom pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon yongs su spang ba sprad pa dkrigs pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad
344a7(mdo sde): bcu rtsa drag ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin de thob par gyur to// ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du yon tan dang yang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe srog chags khrag khrig brgyad cu
344a8(mdo sde): rtsa bzhi ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can dpag yas pa kha cig ni mthar kyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor dang 'bras bu dang
344b1(mdo sde): bo la gnas par gyur to// kha cig ni dgra bcom pa'i nyid kyi bar thob par 'gyur to// de'i tshe sems can dpag yas pa'i ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub/
344b2(mdo sde): tu sngon ma bskyed pa'i sems bskyed do// mun bral ma la stsogs pa bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdud kyi gnas su 'khod bzhin sems yongs
344b3(mdo sde): su sbyin pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i lung bstan pa 'di thams cad thos so// thos nas kyang bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur te/ skyes pa 'di nyid thob bo// gang dag
344b4(mdo sde): sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par gyur to// ji skad sngar bshad pa bzhin du yon tan dang ldan par gyur to//
344b5(mdo sde): de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po'i cha byas du/ bdag cag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ tshangs pa chen po re re yang bye ba brgya stong phrag mang pos yongs su bskor cing / bye ba
344b6(mdo sde): brgya phrag mang pos mdun gyis bltas te/ sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa byed pa brgya phrag mang pos yongs su bskor nas de dag bdud kyi gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa bkod nas/
344b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang spos dang / byug pa dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rin po che'i
344b8(mdo sde): ras bcos bu dang / chos gos sna tshogs gtor cing mngon par gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
345a1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal to// phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran
345a2(mdo sde): ba dag pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu lag 'gro'i
345a3(mdo sde): tshogs thams cad kyi zhal ta byos shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dus
345a4(mdo sde): lags kyis gshegs shig/ bcom ldan 'das gang khyod kyi mdzod pa mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas lag
345a5(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i las bstan pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa yongs su 'byung ba lung bstan pa bshad pa rab tu bstan pa'i dus yin no// yang de'i tshe lha thams cad ces bya ba nas/ gral bum
345a6(mdo sde): thams cad ces bya ba'i me tog dang / spos dang / rin po che dang / ras bcos bu dang / chos gos dang / rgyan dang / sbed pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bi dan gyi char pa dag
345a7(mdo sde): rab tu 'bebs shing / sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rol mo'i sgra 'byin la mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i yon tan gyis/ bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das
345a8(mdo sde): gdan las mngon par bzhengs te/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ga la bar byang phyogs su nye bar gshegs so// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na sprod pa'i lha thams cad kyis kyang gang
345b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor te/ ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par bzhed
345b2(mdo sde): par shes so// de ltar rig nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun las byas pa ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i
345b3(mdo sde): me tog bkram pa'i them skas phul nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul rnams kyis kyang /
345b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir 'dzam bu'i gser gyi them skas tsan dag sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ba sna tshogs bkram dag sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
345b5(mdo sde): cag gi them skas rnams las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu 'phral pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir them skos can dan sa mchog sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad
345b6(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi bai du ra'i them
345b7(mdo sde): skas dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshes par gosol/ lha'i
345b8(mdo sde): bu rab 'thab bral gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ lha rdzas kyi bai dUr+ya'i them skas lha rdzas kyi phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
346a1(mdo sde): bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir mu tig dmar po'i them skas lha rdzas
346a2(mdo sde): kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma sna tshogs kyis yongs su khebs pa sprul nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ rgyal po chen
346a3(mdo sde): bo bzhis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ lha rdzas kyi rin po'i tshe rdo'i snying po las byas pa lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu sna tshogs kyis rab tu khebs pa'i them skas de nyid sprul
346a4(mdo sde): nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par gsol/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas
346a5(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi spos kyi them skas lha rdzas kyi gser gyi phye ma sna tshogs kyis yongs su khebs pa de nyid sprul nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
346a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par gsol de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag la thugs brtse nas/ bdag nyid bdun pas bdag dang 'dra
346a7(mdo sde): ba sangs rgyas kyi sku drag sprul nas/ sangs rgyas bdun po de dag lha'i dbang po dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyi mdun du nyan thos kyi mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems
346a8(mdo sde): dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po de lta bus ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs so// sangs rgyas bdun po de dag mchog tu lhan ne lhang
346b1(mdo sde): nges ri rab kyi rtse mon bzhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi sku re re las 'od zer 'di lta bu byung ste/ dper na zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba phrag stong shar ba'i bzhin no// klu gang dag drang srong thub pa'i
346b2(mdo sde): gnas rten du lhags pa de dag thams cad kyis de mthong nas/ ltad mor gyur te gcig pa gcig dris pa/ snang ba chen po'i nang na rten pa'i ri rab kyi rtse mo la gnas pa bdun
346b3(mdo sde): po de dag ga las 'ongs/ dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis smras pa/ ri rab rtse la lha rnams lhan cig tshangs pa'i bdun na 'don pa 'di gnas pa/ kun mchog lha'i dbang /
346b4(mdo sde): phyug shin tu mkhas pa rnams kyi rig pa'i pha rol phyin/ bdag cag la ni brtse bas 'dir gnas dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis ni longs spyod byed/ 'ching ba rnams las thar par
346b5(mdo sde): byed kyis kun kyang de la mgo bos phyag tshol cig/ ma dros pas 'di skad ces smras so// de 'di ma yin 'di bdud sdig can 'gro gtso 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rdzu 'phral can/ khyed
346b6(mdo sde): la snying brtse ba yis bu dang skye bos yongs bskor 'di na gnas pa yin/ 'di na gang zhig la la 'dod khams sdug bsngal bkres shing skom pa'i nad kyis 'jigs/ sems
346b7(mdo sde): nad de yang rab tu thar byed khyed cag myur du sdug bsngal rnams las thar par byed/ sa'i dbang phyug gi 'di skad ces smras so// de lta ma yin 'di rgyal lha dbang 'thab
346b8(mdo sde): bral dga' ldan 'phrul pa gzhan 'phrul la/ de dag khyod la snying brtse ba yis ri la gnas shing klu'i tshogs la lta/ bdag cag yongs su skyobs shes kun gyis gsang
347a1(mdo sde): s+ya/ mthor de dag la ni 'o dod pos/ de dag rtag tu bde dang ldan pas khyed cag brtson ra dag nas zhi bar byed/ rgya mtshos smras pa/ de dag ma yin 'di ni lha dbang
347a2(mdo sde): brgya byin tshogs bcas gzi brjid lhang nge ba/ de ni gling bzhi'i nang na chos dang ldan pa su yod brtse ba'i yid kyis lta/ khyed cag thams cad byams pa'i yid du gyis la
347a3(mdo sde): khro ba myur du dor de yis myur du lag 'gro thar byed 'di nas 'jigs pa kun las thar bar byed/ shin tu brtan gyis smras pa/ de lta ma yin 'di kun gzugs rten lha tshogs
347a4(mdo sde): bsam gtan bde ldan gzi brjid can/ sems can rnams kyi ched du drang srong 'dir 'dzegs 'khod nas brtse bas phyogs rnams su/ myur drang srog chags rnams kyi 'gro ba'i
347a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal zhi byed chos chu'i char pa 'babs/ lha yid kyis thams cad de la phyag 'tshol 'di nas bdag cag thar par byed/ klu lus 'byigs pa'i khab kyis 'di skad
347a6(mdo sde): ces smras so// 'di ni gzugs na rten pa'i lha min bzhi po 'di dag bdud kyi 'byor pa yin/ lus ngan skyes mchog bdud rtsi'i sgom dang rgyu bar brtag pa 'di dag gnas
347a7(mdo sde): pa'i/ gnod sbyin sde dang bcas pas yongs bskor phyogs bzhi sbyong byed sdig pa'i skye bo sgrol/ de dag gis ni bdag cag sems gzhan mthong nas myur du thar par byed/ klu
347a8(mdo sde): rin chen skyong gis 'di skad ces smras so// de dag ma yin de ni mgo bregs dar smrig gos can 'khod par snang ba yin/ de dag la ni kun lha thal mo spyir 'khod skar ma'i nang
347b1(mdo sde): na zla ba bzhin/ bdun po de dag cher bsgrubs brtul zhugs brtan pa mgo bregs bdag gis mthong ba yin/ dur smrig gos bgos mtshan gyis rab brgyan 'gro ba kun gyis/
347b2(mdo sde): mchod par 'os par mthong / kla lus 'byigs pa'i khab kyis 'di skad ces smraso// 'di ni bdag nyid kyis kyang 'jig rten 'den pa yin te nga la de ltar snang / sems can rnams
347b3(mdo sde): kyi mnyam mnyen 'gro ba skyob pa sdug bsngal rgya mtsho sel byed pa/ gang dag lhan cig snang ba drang srong gzhan rnams kyang ni de yis sprul pa yin/ bdag cag la ni brtse bas
347b4(mdo sde): 'dir gnas khyed cag sdug bsngal rnams las thar bar byed/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ri be rab kyi rtse mos de la bzhugs ma thag tu/ ri rab dpag tshad brgyad cu rtsa bzhir
347b5(mdo sde): 'khor brgya stong yod par gyur to// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa na sbod po'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du lha rdzas
347b6(mdo sde): kyi rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'og min gyi lha'i gnas la thug pa'i bar man chad sna tshogs pa blta na sdug pa/ dpag tshad brgya stong du mang spras pa/
347b7(mdo sde): de srid cig sprul to/ de na bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu dang chos gos dang rgyan dang / spyad pa dang / gzugs dang / rgyal
347b8(mdo sde): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan par sprul pa yin no// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyan byin pa
348a1(mdo sde): bos te bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ni nga dang sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan
348a2(mdo sde): thos chen po rnams dang / drang srong rnams dang / bdud rnams dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin rnams dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis shin tu longs
348a3(mdo sde): spyad zin te de bzhin du da ltar ri rab 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis shin tu longs spyad zin te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis zhing thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems
348a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po de dag dang lnga che bar grags rnams kyis shin tu longs spyad zin to// ri rab kyi rtse mo na gnas pa'i 'byung po khyed la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom
348a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das gal te bdag cag la thugs brtse bar mdzad na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / ri rab longs spyod par
348a6(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad na gal te yang gang su dag bdud dam brgya byin dang / tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po 'am gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am/
348a7(mdo sde): dri za'i dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ sems can dbang che bar grags pa/ dbang che bar grags
348a8(mdo sde): pa'i lha'i drang srong gi bar zhes bgyi ba nas/ mi'i drang srong gi bar de dag thams cad 'dir lhogs par gyur na/ 'dir bdag cag la shas cher phan pa dang / bde bar gyur lags so//
348b1(mdo sde): bder bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/ de'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / lebargan dang / shel gyi kha dog
348b2(mdo sde): ltar bu rnam pa sna tshogs byung ngo // 'od zer de dag gshegs nas bdud kyi gnas bye ba phrag brgya dang / brgya byin gi gnas bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs pa'i gnas zhes bya ba nas
348b3(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po'i thams cad kyi gnas dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas dang // drang srong gi gnas bye ba phrag brgya'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ji snyed pa thams cad du 'od zer de dag
348b4(mdo sde): zhugs so// de dag de dag tu sems can dbang che bar grags pa/ dbang che bar grags pa/ bdud dam zhes bya ba nas drang srong rnams shes bya ba'i bar du ming btags pa de
348b5(mdo sde): dang de dag thams cad la rab tu go bar mdzad nas/ bdud ces bya ba nas/ drang srong zhes bya ba'i bar de dang de dag de nas chas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang sangs rgyas
348b6(mdo sde): kyi sku drug po de dag ga la bar skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig gis 'dir ri rab kyi rtse mor 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa dag rgyun bcad nas bka' stsal pa/
348b7(mdo sde): nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyi nang na/ ri rab 'di ni mchog dang phul yin par ngas bshad de/ ri rab 'di na 'dus
348b8(mdo sde): pa chen po thams cad kyis longs spyad pa yin zhing / ri rab thams cad kyi rgyal po yin no// de thos nas rgya byin ko'u shi ka dang zhes bya ba nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zhes bya ba'i
349a1(mdo sde): bar mchog tu bde dang rangs pa skyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus klu'i rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten de nas dor ste/ klu'i/
349a2(mdo sde): rgyal po rgya mtsho ni 'di nas/ lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na 'jug mas 'dug nas/ ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de'i mgo bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'ba' shig la lha'o zhes
349a3(mdo sde): bya ba nas/ klu'i rgyal po rin chen skyong zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang / klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab ni byang phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang / klu'i rgyal po sgra
349a4(mdo sde): brtsub pa ni shar phyogs kyi rgya mchi chen po'i nang du mjug ma bzhag nas zhes bya ba nas/ ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de'i mgo bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'ba' shig la lta'o zhes bya ba'i
349a5(mdo sde): bar du'o// klu lhag ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa de dag ni de nas 'dong bar ma nus so// de dag thams cad kyis gsang bstod de 'di skad ces smras so// brtson ra 'di nas
349a6(mdo sde): bdag cag yongs su bskyab par gsol/ yongs su thar par mdzad par gsol/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo nas 'dir gsheg/
349a7(mdo sde): shing gnas 'dir bzhags nas/ klu rnams la chos ston par 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de dag gnyis gnas rten nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de srid kyi rang gi lus sprul to// de nas brgya
349a8(mdo sde): byin 'di snyam du sems te/ klu de dag ni lus rtsub cing 'dus te reg na 'dug pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil dag ral bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ des lhag/
349b1(mdo sde): 'gro'i lus lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu dag gis yos su g.yogs shing / mgo la yang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / ta ma la'i lo mo'i phye mas yongs su bsags te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog
349b2(mdo sde): dag mngon par gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten de rgyar dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi par sprul to// mi mjed kyi
349b3(mdo sde): bdag po tshangs pas de'i dbus su lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rab bcos bu dang / rgyan dang nor bu dang rin po che rnams kyi gdan dag bting ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ri rab
349b4(mdo sde): kyi rtse mo la bzhugs nas kun shes ko'u din n+yal bka' stsal pa/ ji nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du chud pa thams cad kyis thos par de la sangs rgyas kyi
349b5(mdo sde): yul gyi cho 'phral gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs de lta bus chos ston to// ko'u din n+ya gang mig gi skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'byung ba dang / nye bar len pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di ni
349b6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyi skye ba'o// 'di ni nad dang srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi gnas so// 'di ni rga shi'i 'byung ba'o// ko'u din n+ya gang rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi skye ba
349b7(mdo sde): dang / gnas pa dang 'byung dang / nye bar len pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi skye ba'o// 'di ni nad dang srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi gnas so// 'di ni rga shi'i 'byu
349b8(mdo sde): ba'o// ko'u din n+ya gang mig gi 'gog pa dang / nye bar zhi ba dang nub pa dang yin pa nye bar zhi ba'i sdug bsngal gyi 'gog pa'o// 'di ni srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba'o//
350a1(mdo sde): 'di ni rga shi'i nub pa'i/ ko'u da ni nung gang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi 'gog pa dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / nub pa dang nye bar len pa'i rnam par zhi ba 'di ni sdug
350a2(mdo sde): bsngal gyi 'gog pa'o// 'di ni srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba'o// 'di ni rga shi'i nub pa'o// chos gang gis nga lha dang bcos pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge
350a3(mdo sde): sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang mi bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten phul yin par grags pa dang / byams pa chen pos mchog yin par grags pa dang / snying rje chen pos
350a4(mdo sde): dam pa yin par grags pa dang / 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bla na med par grags pa dang / sbyin pa dang dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa rnams kyis sems can thams
350a5(mdo sde): cad la sems snyoms par grags pa'i chos kyi spyod pa dang / dul ba dang yang dag sdom pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsgoms
350a6(mdo sde): ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i chos de ni ngas sems can thams cad la rgya cher bstan to// gsal bar mdzad do// ston pa thugs brtse ba can phan par bzhed par/ gang nyan thos rnams la mdzad
350a7(mdo sde): pa ni ngas mdzad zin te/ da khyed cag gis bya ba yin no// rga shi mtha' dbyung ba'i phyir dgon pa rnams dang / shing dung dang / dur khrod dang / bas mtha'i gnas lam de dag tu/
350a8(mdo sde): phyis 'gyod pa can tu gyur pa mi rung gis sgoms shig rtsod cig nged kyi rjes su bstan pa 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sangs rgyas
350b1(mdo sde): kyi zhing mi mjed 'di'i gling bzhi pa'i bye ba phrag brgya gang yin pa thams cad du gling bzhi pa re rer yang sems can dkrigs pa bye ba brgya phrag stong mang po de dag gis ni/ dge ba'irtsa
350b2(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed do// kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang bar bzod pa rnams la rnam par gnas par gyur to// de bzhin du chos rnams la chos kyi mig bskyed do// /
350b3(mdo sde): cig ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams byung ngo zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i bar dang / kha cig ni gnod sbyin dbul po nyid
350b4(mdo sde): kyi bar dang / kha cig ni mi dbul po nyid du 'gro ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su byang ngo // nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad med par gyur to// sems can rnams brtson ra nas yongs
350b5(mdo sde): su thar par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ dge ba sna tshogs dri ma med pa'o// gser can spyod pa rnam dag thugs rjes phyag/
350b6(mdo sde): lha dang shel las skyes dang las 'gro'i dam pa nyon mos rnyog pa sel mdzad pa/ tshul khrims tho'i ris gnas po phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad 'dzum pa po/ lag
350b7(mdo sde): 'gro'i tshogs rab thar mdzad thugs rje brtan po sngon gyi dam bcas dgongs pa mdzod/ gzhan sems seMs can smad du sdug bsngal ji ltar thar pa bzhin/ lag 'gro skad cig mtha'
350b8(mdo sde): yas 'dir rmongs sdug bsngal sna tshogs thebs/ dgra yis phyag brtson brtan skye ba'i dgon pa las grol ba/ ye shes bar gyis lag 'gro thams cad tshim par mdzad du gsol/
351a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa 'das pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdog/ nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las ri rab la gshegs pa'i le'u bcu pa'o// 'phags pa shin
351a2(mdo sde): tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo'o// / bam po bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog dang rin po che dang chos gos
351a3(mdo sde): dag gi char rab tu 'bebs shing / sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dag gi rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin thams cad sdod pas/
351a4(mdo sde): ri rab kyi rtse nas gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar cing / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas/ drang srong thub pa'i
351a5(mdo sde): gnas rten gyi dbyas su gdan bting ba nyid la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ steng gi nam mkha' la lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lA ma yin
351a6(mdo sde): dang / mi 'am ci thams cad kyis rgyan dang phye ma sna tshogs dang me tog sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo// bcom ldan 'das la klu de dag gis kyang me
351a7(mdo sde): tog sna tshogs dang dri sna tshogs dang rin po che sna tshogs dang ras gos dang ras bcos bu dang / chos gos dang rgyan sna tshogs kyi mchod pa byas nas/ lan gsum bskor ba
351a8(mdo sde): nas/ kye bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas spyan sngar chos mnyam pa'i phyir 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgya mtshos 'di skad
351b1(mdo sde): ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sug las gang dag gis sems can rnams klu'i skye gnas su skyes lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po
351b2(mdo sde): las kyi sgrib pa bcus sems can 'byung po rnams myur du klu'i skye gnas su skye'o// bcu gang zhe na/ sems can gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson zhing bla na med
351b3(mdo sde): pa'i theg pa yongs su tshol ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag yin la myur du 'dod pa rnams la nyes dmigs su lta ba ma yin zhing / shin tu sbyin pa la mngon par brtson la/ lag brgyang
351b4(mdo sde): bdag yod de/ de dag smon lam gyi dbang gis klu rnams kI nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa yongs su tshol ba sems dang ldan zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol
351b5(mdo sde): tu phyin pa'i mngon par brtson bdag yin/ de dag gis tshul khrims thams cad rdzogs par skyon med par srung bar ni mi nus so// de dag sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas kyi 'jigs
351b6(mdo sde): bas skrag nas rang gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa yongs su tshol bar byed cing shin du nga rgyal gyis khebs pa dag
351b7(mdo sde): yod de de dag nga rgyal gyi mthus rang gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa dag yod de/
351b8(mdo sde): de dag shin tu khro ba mang ni ngo sems can gzhan rnams la rab tu sdang ste/ de dag sha kho na la bsten pas 'chi ba'i dus tha mar klu rnams kyi nang du smon lam 'debs te/ de dag
352a1(mdo sde): smon lam gyis der skye'o// yang sems can gang dge nyan thos kyi theg pa dang yang dag par ldan zhing / snod du gyur pa'i sbyin gnas yongs su 'chal ba dang /
352a2(mdo sde): mchod pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de dag rang gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag ser sna can dang / nga rgyal gyi skyon dang ldan pa dag
352a3(mdo sde): yod de/ de dag las des klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal la mngon par dga' zhing su nor smra ba la brdzun du sra ba dag yod de/ de dag las des klu rnams
352a4(mdo sde): kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi gces par byed pa yin pa mang ba dag yin zhing chos dang dge 'dun dang bslab pa dang / mkhan po dang deslob dpon dang / hA/
352a5(mdo sde): ma'i gnas lta bu dang / pha ma rnams la gces par byed pa ma yin pa mang bdag yod de/ de'i tshe de dag nga rgyal gyi rgyu dang / lus dang ngag dang yin chung ngus 'khrul pas klu rnams
352a6(mdo sde): kyi nang du spyi'i/ yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang gti mug gis zin kyis non cing ma dul la skyon med pa ma yin par spyod pa dag yod de/ de dag klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang
352a7(mdo sde): sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang bra ma smra ba dang / tshig rtsub po smras pa la goms dag yin te/ de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ klu rnams kyi nang du skye ste/ bcu po de dgra yin no//
352a8(mdo sde): chos gzhan gsum dang ldan na klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// gsum gang zhe na/ sems can gang dag lus dang ngag dang yin gyis nyes par skyed pa shin te dang po dag gis sems
352b1(mdo sde): can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dag yod de/ de dgra de nas shi 'phos nas nyes par spyod pa'i lhag ma chung ngus kyu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// de bzhin du dud 'gro rnams dang / de bzhin
352b2(mdo sde): du yi dgas nas shes bya ba'i bar du ste/ chos gsum po de dag gis sems can rnams klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// hUM mchos kyang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no//
352b3(mdo sde): btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'dri na klu gang dag longs spyod dang nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpag dang ldan pa lnga dang 'dra ba dag mchis pa nas/
352b4(mdo sde): mi smad rims dang 'dra ba mchis pa'i bar dag/ yi dgas dag 'dre ba dag mchis pa'i bar dang / gong dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang 'dra ba dang mchis pa'i bar nas/ klu gang
352b5(mdo sde): dag sems can dmyal ba dang 'dra ba dag gi bar mchis lags te/ de dag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur legs so// de nas klu'i rgyal po'i bu pad mo'i gdong zhes bya bar
352b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag sug las gang gis klu'i rigs su skyes nas/ gzugs mchog tu lham me zhing / lus kyis reg pa gang chung zad ci reg kyang kyi kun tu tshig cing
352b7(mdo sde): 'bar ba lags/ bdag dus thams cad du mchis lam bor nas/ gcer bur rgyu bar bgyid lags/ bdag gi pha de ni dpal phun sum tshogs pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa
352b8(mdo sde): mang ste/ dper na gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ kye lag 'gro sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sum
353a1(mdo sde): @cu rtsa gcig pa 'das pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba'i bar gtsug tor can zhes/
353a2(mdo sde): bya ba'i 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po me tog bral zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rgyal po me tog bral des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can nyan dang / byang chub
353a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i dge 'dun brgyad stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang ldan pa de la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad phul nas/ rtag tu chos mnyan te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
353a4(mdo sde): chub tu smon lam btab po/ bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa zhig kyang brtsigs so// rgyal po me tog bral de'i bu srid sgrub bcas shes
353a5(mdo sde): bya ba zhig yod do// de shin du 'khor bas skrag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ pha'i dge 'dun gyis kun dga' ba de rjes su skyong zhing 'dug go// de na bcom
353a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong gang dag gnas pa dang / de ni gang dag bza' bar dang / btung ba dang / lam cha la longs spyod par byed pa/ thams cad la me tog bral
353a7(mdo sde): bu gyi bu dge slong srid sgrub bcas de phrag dog byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi rnadage 'dun de dag kyang gnas de nas dong ngo // de yang yid mchog tu dga'
353a8(mdo sde): nas/ bdag nyid kyis kyang longs spyod par mi byed/ gzhan pa yang mi ster ro zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong de yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams
353b1(mdo sde): kyi nang du skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o de lo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba chen po'i nang du skyes nas bcos so// de de nas shi 'phos nas yi dgas
353b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de lo brgya stong phrag mang por der sdug bsngal myong ngo // phyis yang sems can dmyal ba dang yo dgas rnams kyi nang du sdug bsngal myong ngo // lag
353b3(mdo sde): 'gro 'khor bas skrag pa'i sems can dang ldan pa srid sgrub bcas shes bya ba rab tu byung ste/ de nas shi 'phos nas/ de ltar yun ring ngan song du sdug bsngal myong ba de bzhin zhig
353b4(mdo sde): yin par khyod sems na/ gzhan yin par yang lta bar mi bya ste/ de ltar las kyi sgrib pa dam pos zin pa yang khyod yin no// 'di phan chad bskam pa sum cu rtse gcig tu khyod
353b5(mdo sde): brtag par ngan song gsum gyi nang du skyes so// de'i las kyi sgrib pa lhag ma lus pa des 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes pa ni gzhan ma yin gyi khyod yin te/ sdug bsngal gyi
353b6(mdo sde): tshor ba de lta bu myong ngo / gang khyod 'od nas shi 'phos nas/ byis kyang sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas rnams kyi nang du rtag tu sdug bsngal gyis gzung bar
353b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yod do// klu'i bu de mchog tu yid mi dga' nas/ rab tu ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//
353b8(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byin pa ji lta ba dang / mos pa ji lta ba dang / mi gsal ba dang mi mkhas pa ji lta ba bzhin du nongs pa so sor chags lags so// nongs pa sa sod
354a1(mdo sde): 'chags lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsams pas sdom pa gzung bar bgyi'o// bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge bsnyen lags te/
354a2(mdo sde): ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog pa gcod pa spangs pa lags so// bdag bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so
354a3(mdo sde): legs so// khyod lhag pa'i bsam pas ngal skyabs su song bas khyod kyi nang 'gro thams cad yongs su zad do// 'di nas shi 'phos nas khyod kyis byams pa'i tshe na mi'i rnyed pa thos par
354a4(mdo sde): gyur te/ byams pa'i thad du rab tu byung bar 'gyur zhing / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe de'i dus na gang gis brtu gtor can 'khor dang bcas
354a5(mdo sde): pa la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas pa dang / de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi kun dga' bso byed thams cad phun sum tshogs par byas pa'i rgyal po me tog bral zhes
354a6(mdo sde): bya ba gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems na/ de gzhan yin par yang mi lta ste/ de ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di yin no// 'di ni skal ba sum cu rtsa gcig tu nam yang ngan 'gror ma skyes
354a7(mdo sde): so// lha'i dpal dang bskal pa bzang po phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgya chen po myong ngo // 'di ni bla na med pa'i theg pa phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes te/
354a8(mdo sde): 'dir dpal dang skal ba bzang po de lta bu myong ngo // de skad ces thos nas klu thams cad spro zhing mchog tu yid dga' nas bcom ldan 'das la mchog tu gus pa skyes shing nye bar rtog
354b1(mdo sde): pas gces par byed par gyur te/ de'i nang na klu rnams mig med pa long ba 'bras bu nyam chung ba zhes bya ba zhig yod do// des gsang bstod nas/ 'odod bos te gsol pa/ sems can
354b2(mdo sde): rnams la thugs brtse ba/ bdag cag yongs su bskyab par gsol/ yun ring bdag gi lus la sdug bsngal tshor ba rab mi bzad/ srin bu nyam pa skye bo srog chags sna tshogs 'tshal
354b3(mdo sde): bar bgyid/ bza' ba tung ba ma mchis chab nang na bdag gnas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ba 'jig rgyal bstan pa na/ sngon ni dge sbyong khyed gyur to//
354b4(mdo sde): mkhas shing gtsang sgra spyod lam ldan/ dben pa dag tu'ang sdig pa byed/ lhan cig gnas pa dag kyang mang / khyod bdag ston pa 'dra bar gyur/ dgra bcom rdzu 'phrul chen por yang
354b5(mdo sde): khyod la slob ma rnams kyis rjod/ rnyed dang bkur sti byung ba na/ khyod gcig pu yis longs spyad cing / khyod kyis dge slong des pa mthong / de dag la ni mi snyan brjod/ lhan cig gnas te
354b6(mdo sde): mi dgar gnas/ khyod ni tshe rabs stong dag du nged kyi zos su gyur cig ces/ de lta bu'i sems bskyed do// las kyi rnams par smin pa des 'dir yang khyod kyi lag 'gror skyes/ khyod rang
354b7(mdo sde): gi yang lhan cig gnas/ phyi phyir za bar byed pa yin/ chu tshan nang na gnas pa dang long bar de yis gyur pa yin kun tu 'bar 'i zangs ljags cad/ phyis kyang dmyal bar za bar 'gyur
354b8(mdo sde): stobs med yid ni mi dga' bas/ klu dbang kun gyi nang na du/ nyes pa so sor 'chags byas nas/ sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su 'grol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gser 'dra'i/
355a1(mdo sde): @phyag gis de'i bzhin dkyil 'khor reg/ spyod pa dga' ba dgongs mdzad nas/ ston pas 'di skad bka' stsal to// rgyal po mig bzangs dbyung bar tshe/
355a2(mdo sde): sngon che bden pa gang gis ngas bram ze long ba'i don tu ni mig dag gnyi ga phyung bar gyur/ bden pa'i tshig de kho na yin/ khyod kyis dri med mig thob shog/ nga yi legs par spyod pa
355a3(mdo sde): khyod/ sngon gyi las de byang bar shog/ tad ya thA/ tse krA kha ga ra sa na kha ba/ karma khags nan dza na/ ba ra dza phan na/ gnya' ma/ ni sa ra na/ two yangs he tsan dran de/ kri mi shud d+he/ e dzaH
355a4(mdo sde): ta dze ta le tan ta le/ bse d+ha sa ke/ ba sa te/ ru ra bi/ ti rad na/ pra te swA hA// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa'i tshig de bshad pa na/ klu 'bras bu nyam chung ba'i mig yongs
355a5(mdo sde): su dag par gyur to// klu gzhan stong phrag lnga bcu rtsa gsum gyi mig kyang yongs su dang par gyur to// gzhan gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / mi khrag
355a6(mdo sde): khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa zad cing mig yongs su dag par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangs thal mo rab tu sbyar ba btud nas smras pa/ 'jig
355a7(mdo sde): rten 'dren pa rnams kyi stobs la ltos/ rab tu lam med rnams la mig kyang byin/ gal te ston pa 'jig rten mi 'byung na/ su yang 'gro bar shi'i mig phyis mi 'thob/ de'i
355a8(mdo sde): tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang / ldan pa kun shes ko'u dani n+ya la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u dani n+ya khyod kyis gsang sngags chen po'i gzungs sngags kyi sgrub pa 'di zung shig/
355b1(mdo sde): da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ su la la sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi lhag ma dang / khams kun tu 'khrugs pa dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dang dug gi sbyor bar lod
355b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / chung zad mthong bar yang 'gyur ba des mig sgrub pa'i gzungs sngags 'di rang gis klag par bya'o// rang gi lag so sor gshegs par bya'o// des sems
355b3(mdo sde): can thams cad la byas pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom zhing las gzhan mi byed par zhag bdun phrag bdun du rang gi mig la byams na mig yongs su dag par
355b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// yang sems can gang dag med pa'i las lhag ma lus pas long bar gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos spong ba'i lhag ma lus pa dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i
355b5(mdo sde): lhag ma lus pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgrib pa'i lhag ma lus pa dang / glegs bam du bris pa rnam par 'jug pa'i lhag ma lus pa dang / gzhan gyi mig rnam par 'jug pa'i
355b6(mdo sde): las kyi lhag mas long bar gyur pa de dag gis gzungs sngags 'di yi ger 'drir bcug ste/ yang dang yang klog du gzhug go// las kyi sgrib pa bshad par bya'o// gzhan
355b7(mdo sde): yang rgya mtsho'i dbu' ba dang shing ngar dang sman kA tsa dang 'bras bu gsum dang / rus sbal gyi snying rnying pa sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig btab cing btsos pa gsal sngags 'di dag lan
355b8(mdo sde): stong rtsa brgyad mngon par brjod cing mig gi phyi rol bsku bar bya'o// gzhan yang rgya mtsho'i las gzhan mi byed par/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom zhing / sangs rgyas/
356a1(mdo sde): kyi sku gzugs kyang byas na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par 'gyur zhing / de'i mig yongs su dag par yang 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyi
356a2(mdo sde): gnas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' re ba byas na yang / de'i las kyi sgrib pa byang bar gyur to// phyis kyang 'khor bar mig ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i klu'i
356a3(mdo sde): 'khor des 'di skad ces gsol to// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad pa/ nad las rab tu thar par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
356a4(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe klu tshon rtsi sngon pos gsang bstod do// 'di skad ces gsol to// sdig pa thams cad sbyong ba khyod/ khyod ni dga' mdzad dpal kun ldan/ khyod kyi las kyang rab
356a5(mdo sde): tu mkhyen/ srog chags kyi ni rgyal po khyod/ bdag ni chu dang rnam grol zhing / cha ba'i rlung gis kun gdungs shing / 'brog dgon pa na gnas pa lags/ dri mi zhim pa'i gnas
356a6(mdo sde): na gnas/ lo ni bye ba phrag stong du/ zhag gcig bdag pa bde ma mchis/ rtag par 'khor dang lhan cig tu/ bdag ni gzhan gyis bza' ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das
356a7(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gang dag sdig byas nas/ phyis kyang bdag nyid bsod nams sgrub/ lus kyi gan Di brdungs nas su/ dge slong dge 'dun tshim byed nang / lus
356a8(mdo sde): kyi lhag ma de yis su/ gang dang gang du skyes par ni/ sdug bsngal ci dran 'byung 'gyur zhing / bza' btung dang ni yang rag ldan/ yang na klu'i skye gnas su/ sal gyis skye bar
356b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yin/ de'i mgo yi glad pa der/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur/ kun tu chu sbyin zhes bya ba/ chu sbyin byed pa'i klur 'gyur ro// gang na klu'i gnas byed pa/ de nas chu ni 'bab
356b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ sa 'am nam mkha' la yang rung / gang dang gang du 'gro ba des/ sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yong / chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ yang na sems can gang dag gis
356b3(mdo sde): mi'i dngos po thob nas su/ sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas/ dge 'dun rim mi byed na/ de dag sdug bsngal sna tshogs ni/ ngan yong gsum du myong nas kyang / de nas chad skye
356b4(mdo sde): gnas su/ skye ba thob par 'gyur ba yin/ de las kom tu chu mi 'byung / mgo le nor bu rin chen med/ stong pa skam pa'i gnas dag du// chu med par ni gnas par 'gyur/ sngan
356b5(mdo sde): 'das dus na khyod kyis ni/ rgyal po skar rgyal bstan pa la/ dge slong dgon pa bar gyur te/ phrag dog ser snar gyur pa yin/ dge slong glo bu'i 'ongs mthong na/ khro ga nyer
356b6(mdo sde): can ni sbyin byas nas/ de dag la ni sgrib btong byed/ de la yang ni mngon gsum gshe/ der ni gang dag chur yang / myur du mi gtsang ba yis bkang / chags su gnas khang dag
356b7(mdo sde): gri gnas/ dring ba yis bkang bar gyur/ dge slong des pa 'gro ba na/ brgyad dga' yis ni gshe bar 'gyur/ dge slong des bzhin dag kyang rgyang ring bar ni yongs su spangs
356b8(mdo sde): de phyir phrag dog sna'i rgyus/ ma mchod par ni khyod gyur nas/ dge sbyong su zhig la la mthong / myur du khros nas gshe bar gyur/ sbyin pa po la khro bas gshe/ ngo tsha khrel
357a1(mdo sde): \u0f7f/ yod rnam par spangs/ las kyis rnam par smin pa des/ sems can dmyal bar so sor skyes/ lus ni bye bas sems dmyal du/ sdug bsngal mang po
357a2(mdo sde): nyams su myong / yi dgas rnams su dus ring pos/ sdug bsngal rab te mi bzad myong / khyod ni klu'i skye gnas su/ skyes nas shin tu sdug bsngal gyur/ stong pa 'brog dgon
357a3(mdo sde): rdzong rnams su/ chu dang bral bar gnas pa yin/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su ni/ sdug bsngal tshor ba byi phyir myong / shin tu yun ring yi dgas dang // dud 'gror sdug
